verses.translation: And your wealth and your children are not capable of bringing you near to Us, but one who believes and did good deeds (is brought close); for them is double the reward – the recompense of their deeds and they are in high positions, in peace.

verses.content: وَالَّذِينَ يَسْعَوْنَ فِي آيَاتِنَا مُعَاجِزِينَ أُولَـٰئِكَ فِي الْعَذَابِ مُحْضَرُونَ
verses.translation: And those who strive in Our signs in order to defeat, will be brought into the punishment.

verses.content: قُلْ إِنَّ رَبِّي يَبْسُطُ الرِّزْقَ لِمَن يَشَاءُ مِنْ عِبَادِهِ وَيَقْدِرُ لَهُ ۚ وَمَا أَنفَقْتُم مِّن شَيْءٍ فَهُوَ يُخْلِفُهُ ۖ وَهُوَ خَيْرُ الرَّازِقِينَ
verses.translation: Say, “Indeed my Lord eases the sustenance for whomever He wills among His bondmen, and restricts it for whomever He wills; and whatever you spend in Allah's cause, He will restore it; and He is the Best Sustainer.”

verses.content: وَيَوْمَ يَحْشُرُهُمْ جَمِيعًا ثُمَّ يَقُولُ لِلْمَلَائِكَةِ أَهَـٰؤُلَاءِ إِيَّاكُمْ كَانُوا يَعْبُدُونَ
verses.translation: And on the day when He will raise them all, and then say to the angels, “Did they worship you?”

verses.content: قَالُوا سُبْحَانَكَ أَنتَ وَلِيُّنَا مِن دُونِهِم ۖ بَلْ كَانُوا يَعْبُدُونَ الْجِنَّ ۖ أَكْثَرُهُم بِهِم مُّؤْمِنُونَ
verses.translation: They will say, “Purity is to you – only you are our Supporter, not they; in fact they worshipped the jinns; most of them believed only in them.”

verses.content: فَالْيَوْمَ لَا يَمْلِكُ بَعْضُكُمْ لِبَعْضٍ نَّفْعًا وَلَا ضَرًّا وَنَقُولُ لِلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوا ذُوقُوا عَذَابَ النَّارِ الَّتِي كُنتُم بِهَا تُكَذِّبُونَ
verses.translation: So this day you will not have the power to benefit or hurt one another; and We shall say to the unjust, “Taste the punishment of the fire which you used to deny!”

verses.content: وَإِذَا تُتْلَىٰ عَلَيْهِمْ آيَاتُنَا بَيِّنَاتٍ قَالُوا مَا هَـٰذَا إِلَّا رَجُلٌ يُرِيدُ أَن يَصُدَّكُمْ عَمَّا كَانَ يَعْبُدُ آبَاؤُكُمْ وَقَالُوا مَا هَـٰذَا إِلَّا إِفْكٌ مُّفْتَرًى ۚ وَقَالَ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا لِلْحَقِّ لَمَّا جَاءَهُمْ إِنْ هَـٰذَا إِلَّا سِحْرٌ مُّبِينٌ
verses.translation: And if Our clear verses are recited to them, they say, “He is nothing but a man who wishes to turn you away from the deities of your forefathers!”; and they say, “This is nothing but a fabricated lie”; and said the disbelievers regarding the truth when it reached them, “This is nothing but obvious magic.”

verses.content: وَمَا آتَيْنَاهُم مِّن كُتُبٍ يَدْرُسُونَهَا ۖ وَمَا أَرْسَلْنَا إِلَيْهِمْ قَبْلَكَ مِن نَّذِيرٍ
verses.translation: And We did not give them any Books which they may read, nor did We send to them any Herald of Warning before you.

verses.content: وَكَذَّبَ الَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِهِمْ وَمَا بَلَغُوا مِعْشَارَ مَا آتَيْنَاهُمْ فَكَذَّبُوا رُسُلِي ۖ فَكَيْفَ كَانَ نَكِيرِ
verses.translation: And those before them had denied – and these have not reached even a tenth of what We had given them – so they denied My Noble Messengers; so how did My rejection turn out?

verses.content: قُلْ إِنَّمَا أَعِظُكُم بِوَاحِدَةٍ ۖ أَن تَقُومُوا لِلَّهِ مَثْنَىٰ وَفُرَادَىٰ ثُمَّ تَتَفَكَّرُوا ۚ مَا بِصَاحِبِكُم مِّن جِنَّةٍ ۚ إِنْ هُوَ إِلَّا نَذِيرٌ لَّكُم بَيْنَ يَدَيْ عَذَابٍ شَدِيدٍ
verses.translation: Proclaim, “I advise you just one thing; that stand up for Allah's sake, in twos and ones, and then think”; there is not a trace of insanity in this companion of yours; he is not but a Herald of Warning for you, before the advent of a severe punishment!

verses.content: قُلْ مَا سَأَلْتُكُم مِّنْ أَجْرٍ فَهُوَ لَكُمْ ۖ إِنْ أَجْرِيَ إِلَّا عَلَى اللَّهِ ۖ وَهُوَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيْءٍ شَهِيدٌ
verses.translation: Say, “Whatever fee I might have asked from you upon this, is yours; my reward is only upon Allah; and He is Witness over all things.”

verses.content: قُلْ إِنَّ رَبِّي يَقْذِفُ بِالْحَقِّ عَلَّامُ الْغُيُوبِ
verses.translation: Proclaim, “Indeed my Lord sends down the truth; the All Knowing of all the hidden.”

verses.content: قُلْ جَاءَ الْحَقُّ وَمَا يُبْدِئُ الْبَاطِلُ وَمَا يُعِيدُ
verses.translation: Proclaim, “The truth has come, and falsehood dare not commence nor return.”

verses.content: قُلْ إِن ضَلَلْتُ فَإِنَّمَا أَضِلُّ عَلَىٰ نَفْسِي ۖ وَإِنِ اهْتَدَيْتُ فَبِمَا يُوحِي إِلَيَّ رَبِّي ۚ إِنَّهُ سَمِيعٌ قَرِيبٌ
verses.translation: Proclaim, “If I stray, I stray only for my own harm; and if I attain guidance, it is because of what my Lord has sent down to me; indeed He is All Hearing, Close.”

verses.content: وَلَوْ تَرَىٰ إِذْ فَزِعُوا فَلَا فَوْتَ وَأُخِذُوا مِن مَّكَانٍ قَرِيبٍ
verses.translation: And if only you see, when they will be forced into a terror from which they will be unable to escape, and are seized from a place nearby. (Wherever they go, they are never far).

verses.content: وَقَالُوا آمَنَّا بِهِ وَأَنَّىٰ لَهُمُ التَّنَاوُشُ مِن مَّكَانٍ بَعِيدٍ
verses.translation: And they will say, “We accept faith in it”; and how can they attain it from so far away? (After they have crossed the limit of life allotted to them.)

verses.content: وَقَدْ كَفَرُوا بِهِ مِن قَبْلُ ۖ وَيَقْذِفُونَ بِالْغَيْبِ مِن مَّكَانٍ بَعِيدٍ
verses.translation: For they had disbelieved in it before; and they hurl allegations without seeing, from far away.

verses.content: وَحِيلَ بَيْنَهُمْ وَبَيْنَ مَا يَشْتَهُونَ كَمَا فُعِلَ بِأَشْيَاعِهِم مِّن قَبْلُ ۚ إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا فِي شَكٍّ مُّرِيبٍ
verses.translation: And a barrier is set between them and what they desire*, as was done for their earlier groups; indeed they are in a doubt that deceives. (To accept faith or return to earth)

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ الْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ فَاطِرِ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ جَاعِلِ الْمَلَائِكَةِ رُسُلًا أُولِي أَجْنِحَةٍ مَّثْنَىٰ وَثُلَاثَ وَرُبَاعَ ۚ يَزِيدُ فِي الْخَلْقِ مَا يَشَاءُ ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدِيرٌ
verses.translation: All praise is to Allah, the Maker of the heavens and the earth, Who assigns angels as messengers – who have pairs of two, three, four wings; He increases in creation whatever He wills; indeed Allah is Able to do all things.

verses.content: مَّا يَفْتَحِ اللَّهُ لِلنَّاسِ مِن رَّحْمَةٍ فَلَا مُمْسِكَ لَهَا ۖ وَمَا يُمْسِكْ فَلَا مُرْسِلَ لَهُ مِن بَعْدِهِ ۚ وَهُوَ الْعَزِيزُ الْحَكِيمُ
verses.translation: No one can withhold the mercy which Allah opens to mankind; and whatever He withholds – so after it, none can release it; and only He is the Most Honourable, the Wise.

verses.content: يَا أَيُّهَا النَّاسُ اذْكُرُوا نِعْمَتَ اللَّهِ عَلَيْكُمْ ۚ هَلْ مِنْ خَالِقٍ غَيْرُ اللَّهِ يَرْزُقُكُم مِّنَ السَّمَاءِ وَالْأَرْضِ ۚ لَا إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ ۖ فَأَنَّىٰ تُؤْفَكُونَ
verses.translation: O people! Remember the favour of Allah upon you; is there a Creator other than Allah who can provide you sustenance from the sky and the earth? There is no God except Him; so where are you reverting?

verses.content: وَإِن يُكَذِّبُوكَ فَقَدْ كُذِّبَتْ رُسُلٌ مِّن قَبْلِكَ ۚ وَإِلَى اللَّهِ تُرْجَعُ الْأُمُورُ
verses.translation: And if they deny you, many Noble Messengers were denied before you; and towards Allah only is the return of all matters.

verses.content: يَا أَيُّهَا النَّاسُ إِنَّ وَعْدَ اللَّهِ حَقٌّ ۖ فَلَا تَغُرَّنَّكُمُ الْحَيَاةُ الدُّنْيَا ۖ وَلَا يَغُرَّنَّكُم بِاللَّهِ الْغَرُورُ
verses.translation: O people! Allah’s promise is indeed true; therefore do not ever let the worldly life deceive you; nor ever let the great cheat deceive you in respect of Allah’s commands.

verses.content: إِنَّ الشَّيْطَانَ لَكُمْ عَدُوٌّ فَاتَّخِذُوهُ عَدُوًّا ۚ إِنَّمَا يَدْعُو حِزْبَهُ لِيَكُونُوا مِنْ أَصْحَابِ السَّعِيرِ
verses.translation: Indeed Satan is your enemy, therefore you too take him as an enemy; he only calls his group so that they become the people of hell!

verses.content: الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا لَهُمْ عَذَابٌ شَدِيدٌ ۖ وَالَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَعَمِلُوا الصَّالِحَاتِ لَهُم مَّغْفِرَةٌ وَأَجْرٌ كَبِيرٌ
verses.translation: For the disbelievers is a severe punishment; and for those who accepted faith and did good deeds is forgiveness, and an immense reward.

verses.content: أَفَمَن زُيِّنَ لَهُ سُوءُ عَمَلِهِ فَرَآهُ حَسَنًا ۖ فَإِنَّ اللَّهَ يُضِلُّ مَن يَشَاءُ وَيَهْدِي مَن يَشَاءُ ۖ فَلَا تَذْهَبْ نَفْسُكَ عَلَيْهِمْ حَسَرَاتٍ ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ عَلِيمٌ بِمَا يَصْنَعُونَ
verses.translation: So will one whose misdeeds are made seeming good to him – so he deems them good – be ever equal to the one who is upon guidance? Therefore indeed Allah sends astray whomever He wills, and guides whomever He wills; so may not your life be lost in despairing after them; Allah knows their deeds very well.

verses.content: وَاللَّهُ الَّذِي أَرْسَلَ الرِّيَاحَ فَتُثِيرُ سَحَابًا فَسُقْنَاهُ إِلَىٰ بَلَدٍ مَّيِّتٍ فَأَحْيَيْنَا بِهِ الْأَرْضَ بَعْدَ مَوْتِهَا ۚ كَذَٰلِكَ النُّشُورُ
verses.translation: And it is Allah Who sent the winds – so they raise clouds and We then direct it towards a dead city – so with it We revive the earth after its death; and this is how the resurrection will be.

verses.content: مَن كَانَ يُرِيدُ الْعِزَّةَ فَلِلَّهِ الْعِزَّةُ جَمِيعًا ۚ إِلَيْهِ يَصْعَدُ الْكَلِمُ الطَّيِّبُ وَالْعَمَلُ الصَّالِحُ يَرْفَعُهُ ۚ وَالَّذِينَ يَمْكُرُونَ السَّيِّئَاتِ لَهُمْ عَذَابٌ شَدِيدٌ ۖ وَمَكْرُ أُولَـٰئِكَ هُوَ يَبُورُ
verses.translation: Whoever desires honour – therefore all honour belongs to Allah!* Towards Him only ascends the pure good speech, and He raises high the pious deed; and for those who conspire evil is a severe punishment; and their own conspiracy will be destroyed. (It is Allah Who bestows honour, to whomever He wills.)

verses.content: وَاللَّهُ خَلَقَكُم مِّن تُرَابٍ ثُمَّ مِن نُّطْفَةٍ ثُمَّ جَعَلَكُمْ أَزْوَاجًا ۚ وَمَا تَحْمِلُ مِنْ أُنثَىٰ وَلَا تَضَعُ إِلَّا بِعِلْمِهِ ۚ وَمَا يُعَمَّرُ مِن مُّعَمَّرٍ وَلَا يُنقَصُ مِنْ عُمُرِهِ إِلَّا فِي كِتَابٍ ۚ إِنَّ ذَٰلِكَ عَلَى اللَّهِ يَسِيرٌ
verses.translation: And Allah created you from clay, then a drop of liquid, then made you as couples; and no female conceives or gives birth except with His knowledge; and every aged being that is given the age, and every one whose life is kept short – all this is in a Book; indeed this is easy for Allah.

verses.content: وَمَا يَسْتَوِي الْبَحْرَانِ هَـٰذَا عَذْبٌ فُرَاتٌ سَائِغٌ شَرَابُهُ وَهَـٰذَا مِلْحٌ أُجَاجٌ ۖ وَمِن كُلٍّ تَأْكُلُونَ لَحْمًا طَرِيًّا وَتَسْتَخْرِجُونَ حِلْيَةً تَلْبَسُونَهَا ۖ وَتَرَى الْفُلْكَ فِيهِ مَوَاخِرَ لِتَبْتَغُوا مِن فَضْلِهِ وَلَعَلَّكُمْ تَشْكُرُونَ
verses.translation: And the two seas are not alike; this is sweet, very sweet and palatable – and this is salty, bitter; and from each you eat fresh meat and extract the ornament which you wear; and you see the ship cleaving through it, so that you may seek His munificence, and in some way become grateful.

verses.content: يُولِجُ اللَّيْلَ فِي النَّهَارِ وَيُولِجُ النَّهَارَ فِي اللَّيْلِ وَسَخَّرَ الشَّمْسَ وَالْقَمَرَ كُلٌّ يَجْرِي لِأَجَلٍ مُّسَمًّى ۚ ذَٰلِكُمُ اللَّهُ رَبُّكُمْ لَهُ الْمُلْكُ ۚ وَالَّذِينَ تَدْعُونَ مِن دُونِهِ مَا يَمْلِكُونَ مِن قِطْمِيرٍ
verses.translation: He brings the night in a part of the day and He brings the day in a part of the night; and He has subjected the sun and moon; each one runs to its fixed term; such is Allah, your Lord – only His is the kingship; and those whom you worship instead of Him do not own even the husk of a date-seed.

verses.content: إِن تَدْعُوهُمْ لَا يَسْمَعُوا دُعَاءَكُمْ وَلَوْ سَمِعُوا مَا اسْتَجَابُوا لَكُمْ ۖ وَيَوْمَ الْقِيَامَةِ يَكْفُرُونَ بِشِرْكِكُمْ ۚ وَلَا يُنَبِّئُكَ مِثْلُ خَبِيرٍ
verses.translation: If you call them, they do not hear your call; and supposedly if they heard it, they cannot fulfil your needs; and on the Day of Resurrection they will deny your ascribed partnership; and none will inform you like Him Who informs.

verses.content: يَا أَيُّهَا النَّاسُ أَنتُمُ الْفُقَرَاءُ إِلَى اللَّهِ ۖ وَاللَّهُ هُوَ الْغَنِيُّ الْحَمِيدُ
verses.translation: O people! You are dependant on Allah; and Allah only is the Independent (Absolute, Not Needing Anything), the Most Praiseworthy.

verses.content: إِن يَشَأْ يُذْهِبْكُمْ وَيَأْتِ بِخَلْقٍ جَدِيدٍ
verses.translation: If He wills, He can take you away and bring other creatures.

verses.content: وَمَا ذَٰلِكَ عَلَى اللَّهِ بِعَزِيزٍ
verses.translation: And this not at all difficult for Allah.

verses.content: وَلَا تَزِرُ وَازِرَةٌ وِزْرَ أُخْرَىٰ ۚ وَإِن تَدْعُ مُثْقَلَةٌ إِلَىٰ حِمْلِهَا لَا يُحْمَلْ مِنْهُ شَيْءٌ وَلَوْ كَانَ ذَا قُرْبَىٰ ۗ إِنَّمَا تُنذِرُ الَّذِينَ يَخْشَوْنَ رَبَّهُم بِالْغَيْبِ وَأَقَامُوا الصَّلَاةَ ۚ وَمَن تَزَكَّىٰ فَإِنَّمَا يَتَزَكَّىٰ لِنَفْسِهِ ۚ وَإِلَى اللَّهِ الْمَصِيرُ
verses.translation: And no burdened soul will carry another soul’s burden; and if a burdened soul calls another to share the burden, no one will carry any part of it, even if he is a close relative; O dear Prophet (Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him), your warning only benefits those who fear their Lord without seeing and who keep the prayer established; and whoever cleansed himself, has cleansed for his own benefit; and towards Allah only is the return.

verses.content: وَمَا يَسْتَوِي الْأَعْمَىٰ وَالْبَصِيرُ
verses.translation: And the blind and the sighted are not equal!

verses.content: وَلَا الظُّلُمَاتُ وَلَا النُّورُ
verses.translation: And neither are darkness and brightness!

verses.content: وَلَا الظِّلُّ وَلَا الْحَرُورُ
verses.translation: And neither are the shadow and the hot sunshine!

verses.content: وَمَا يَسْتَوِي الْأَحْيَاءُ وَلَا الْأَمْوَاتُ ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ يُسْمِعُ مَن يَشَاءُ ۖ وَمَا أَنتَ بِمُسْمِعٍ مَّن فِي الْقُبُورِ
verses.translation: And not equal are the living and the dead! Indeed Allah causes them to listen*, whomever He wills; and you cannot make those who are in the graves** listen. (* Listen to guidance **The disbelievers are referred to as dead, whose fates are sealed.)

verses.content: إِنْ أَنتَ إِلَّا نَذِيرٌ
verses.translation: You are purely a Herald of Warning.

verses.content: إِنَّا أَرْسَلْنَاكَ بِالْحَقِّ بَشِيرًا وَنَذِيرًا ۚ وَإِن مِّنْ أُمَّةٍ إِلَّا خَلَا فِيهَا نَذِيرٌ
verses.translation: And O dear Prophet (Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him), We have indeed sent you with the Truth, giving glad tidings and heralding warnings; and there was a Herald of Warning in every group.

verses.content: وَإِن يُكَذِّبُوكَ فَقَدْ كَذَّبَ الَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِهِمْ جَاءَتْهُمْ رُسُلُهُم بِالْبَيِّنَاتِ وَبِالزُّبُرِ وَبِالْكِتَابِ الْمُنِيرِ
verses.translation: And if these disbelievers deny you, those before them had also denied; their Noble Messengers came to them with clear proofs and scriptures and the bright Book.

verses.content: ثُمَّ أَخَذْتُ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا ۖ فَكَيْفَ كَانَ نَكِيرِ
verses.translation: Then I seized the disbelievers; so how did denial My rejection turn out?

verses.content: أَلَمْ تَرَ أَنَّ اللَّهَ أَنزَلَ مِنَ السَّمَاءِ مَاءً فَأَخْرَجْنَا بِهِ ثَمَرَاتٍ مُّخْتَلِفًا أَلْوَانُهَا ۚ وَمِنَ الْجِبَالِ جُدَدٌ بِيضٌ وَحُمْرٌ مُّخْتَلِفٌ أَلْوَانُهَا وَغَرَابِيبُ سُودٌ
verses.translation: Have you not seen that it is Allah Who causes the water to descend from the sky? So with it We have grown various colourful fruits; and among the mountains are tracks white and red, of different hues, and others dark black.

verses.content: وَمِنَ النَّاسِ وَالدَّوَابِّ وَالْأَنْعَامِ مُخْتَلِفٌ أَلْوَانُهُ كَذَٰلِكَ ۗ إِنَّمَا يَخْشَى اللَّهَ مِنْ عِبَادِهِ الْعُلَمَاءُ ۗ إِنَّ اللَّهَ عَزِيزٌ غَفُورٌ
verses.translation: And similarly the colours of men and beasts and cattle, are different; among the bondmen of Allah, only the people of knowledge fear Him; indeed Allah is the Most Honourable, Oft Forgiving.

verses.content: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ يَتْلُونَ كِتَابَ اللَّهِ وَأَقَامُوا الصَّلَاةَ وَأَنفَقُوا مِمَّا رَزَقْنَاهُمْ سِرًّا وَعَلَانِيَةً يَرْجُونَ تِجَارَةً لَّن تَبُورَ
verses.translation: Indeed those who read the Book of Allah, and keep the prayer established, and spend from what We have bestowed upon them in secret and publicly, are hopeful of a trade in which there is never a loss.

verses.content: لِيُوَفِّيَهُمْ أُجُورَهُمْ وَيَزِيدَهُم مِّن فَضْلِهِ ۚ إِنَّهُ غَفُورٌ شَكُورٌ
verses.translation: In order that He may reward them with goodness in full, and further increase it with His munificence; indeed He is Oft Forgiving, Most Appreciative.

verses.content: وَالَّذِي أَوْحَيْنَا إِلَيْكَ مِنَ الْكِتَابِ هُوَ الْحَقُّ مُصَدِّقًا لِّمَا بَيْنَ يَدَيْهِ ۗ إِنَّ اللَّهَ بِعِبَادِهِ لَخَبِيرٌ بَصِيرٌ
verses.translation: And the Book which We have divinely revealed to you – that is the Truth, confirming the Books which were before it; indeed Allah is Aware of His bondmen, All Seeing.

verses.content: ثُمَّ أَوْرَثْنَا الْكِتَابَ الَّذِينَ اصْطَفَيْنَا مِنْ عِبَادِنَا ۖ فَمِنْهُمْ ظَالِمٌ لِّنَفْسِهِ وَمِنْهُم مُّقْتَصِدٌ وَمِنْهُمْ سَابِقٌ بِالْخَيْرَاتِ بِإِذْنِ اللَّهِ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ هُوَ الْفَضْلُ الْكَبِيرُ
verses.translation: We then made Our chosen bondmen the inheritors of the Book; so among them is one who wrongs himself; and among them is one who stays on the middle course; and among them is one who, by the command of Allah, surpassed others in good deeds; this is the great favour!

verses.content: جَنَّاتُ عَدْنٍ يَدْخُلُونَهَا يُحَلَّوْنَ فِيهَا مِنْ أَسَاوِرَ مِن ذَهَبٍ وَلُؤْلُؤًا ۖ وَلِبَاسُهُمْ فِيهَا حَرِيرٌ
verses.translation: They shall enter the Gardens of everlasting stay (Eden) – in which they shall be given to adorn armlets of gold and pearls; and their garment in it is silk.

verses.content: وَقَالُوا الْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ الَّذِي أَذْهَبَ عَنَّا الْحَزَنَ ۖ إِنَّ رَبَّنَا لَغَفُورٌ شَكُورٌ
verses.translation: And they will say; “All praise is to Allah Who has put away our grief; indeed Our Lord is Oft Forgiving, Most Appreciative.”

verses.content: الَّذِي أَحَلَّنَا دَارَ الْمُقَامَةِ مِن فَضْلِهِ لَا يَمَسُّنَا فِيهَا نَصَبٌ وَلَا يَمَسُّنَا فِيهَا لُغُوبٌ
verses.translation: “The One Who has, by His munificence, established us in a place of serenity; in which no hardship shall ever reach us nor any fatigue affect us.”

verses.content: وَالَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا لَهُمْ نَارُ جَهَنَّمَ لَا يُقْضَىٰ عَلَيْهِمْ فَيَمُوتُوا وَلَا يُخَفَّفُ عَنْهُم مِّنْ عَذَابِهَا ۚ كَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِي كُلَّ كَفُورٍ
verses.translation: And for those who disbelieved is the fire of hell; neither does their final seizure come that they may die, nor is its punishment lightened for them; this is how We punish every extremely ungrateful person.

verses.content: وَهُمْ يَصْطَرِخُونَ فِيهَا رَبَّنَا أَخْرِجْنَا نَعْمَلْ صَالِحًا غَيْرَ الَّذِي كُنَّا نَعْمَلُ ۚ أَوَلَمْ نُعَمِّرْكُم مَّا يَتَذَكَّرُ فِيهِ مَن تَذَكَّرَ وَجَاءَكُمُ النَّذِيرُ ۖ فَذُوقُوا فَمَا لِلظَّالِمِينَ مِن نَّصِيرٍ
verses.translation: And they shall be screaming in it; “Our Lord! Extricate us, so that we may do good deeds, the opposite of what we used to do”; (It will be said to them) “And did We not give you an age long enough, in which anyone who wants to understand would have understood? And the Herald of Warning did come to you; therefore now taste it – for the unjust do not have any supporter.”

verses.content: إِنَّ اللَّهَ عَالِمُ غَيْبِ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ ۚ إِنَّهُ عَلِيمٌ بِذَاتِ الصُّدُورِ
verses.translation: Indeed Allah is All Knowing – of all the hidden things in the heavens and in the earth; indeed He knows what lies within the hearts.

verses.content: هُوَ الَّذِي جَعَلَكُمْ خَلَائِفَ فِي الْأَرْضِ ۚ فَمَن كَفَرَ فَعَلَيْهِ كُفْرُهُ ۖ وَلَا يَزِيدُ الْكَافِرِينَ كُفْرُهُمْ عِندَ رَبِّهِمْ إِلَّا مَقْتًا ۖ وَلَا يَزِيدُ الْكَافِرِينَ كُفْرُهُمْ إِلَّا خَسَارًا
verses.translation: It is He Who has made you the successors of your predecessors in the earth; so whoever disbelieves – (the harm of) his disbelief falls only on him; and for the disbelievers, their disbelief increases nothing in their Lord’s sight except disgust; and for the disbelievers, their disbelief increases nothing for them except ruin.

verses.content: قُلْ أَرَأَيْتُمْ شُرَكَاءَكُمُ الَّذِينَ تَدْعُونَ مِن دُونِ اللَّهِ أَرُونِي مَاذَا خَلَقُوا مِنَ الْأَرْضِ أَمْ لَهُمْ شِرْكٌ فِي السَّمَاوَاتِ أَمْ آتَيْنَاهُمْ كِتَابًا فَهُمْ عَلَىٰ بَيِّنَتٍ مِّنْهُ ۚ بَلْ إِن يَعِدُ الظَّالِمُونَ بَعْضُهُم بَعْضًا إِلَّا غُرُورًا
verses.translation: Proclaim, “Just show me your partners (false deities) whom you worship other than Allah; show me which part of the earth have they created – or do they have any share in the heavens?” Or have We given them some Book, so they are on its clear proofs? In fact the unjust do not give promises to each other, except of deceit.

verses.content: إِنَّ اللَّهَ يُمْسِكُ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضَ أَن تَزُولَا ۚ وَلَئِن زَالَتَا إِنْ أَمْسَكَهُمَا مِنْ أَحَدٍ مِّن بَعْدِهِ ۚ إِنَّهُ كَانَ حَلِيمًا غَفُورًا
verses.translation: Indeed Allah restrains the heavens and the earth from convulsing; and were they to convulse, who could stop them except Allah? Indeed He is Most Forbearing, Oft Forgiving.

verses.content: وَأَقْسَمُوا بِاللَّهِ جَهْدَ أَيْمَانِهِمْ لَئِن جَاءَهُمْ نَذِيرٌ لَّيَكُونُنَّ أَهْدَىٰ مِنْ إِحْدَى الْأُمَمِ ۖ فَلَمَّا جَاءَهُمْ نَذِيرٌ مَّا زَادَهُمْ إِلَّا نُفُورًا
verses.translation: And they swore by Allah most vehemently in their oaths, that if a Herald of Warning came to them, they would be more upon guidance than any other group; then when a Herald of Warning did come to them, he increased nothing in them except hatred.

verses.content: اسْتِكْبَارًا فِي الْأَرْضِ وَمَكْرَ السَّيِّئِ ۚ وَلَا يَحِيقُ الْمَكْرُ السَّيِّئُ إِلَّا بِأَهْلِهِ ۚ فَهَلْ يَنظُرُونَ إِلَّا سُنَّتَ الْأَوَّلِينَ ۚ فَلَن تَجِدَ لِسُنَّتِ اللَّهِ تَبْدِيلًا ۖ وَلَن تَجِدَ لِسُنَّتِ اللَّهِ تَحْوِيلًا
verses.translation: Priding themselves in the earth and scheming evil; and the evil scheming falls only upon those who scheme it; so what are they waiting for, except the tradition of the earlier nations? So you will never find the traditions of Allah changing; and you will never find Allah’s law being avoided.

verses.content: أَوَلَمْ يَسِيرُوا فِي الْأَرْضِ فَيَنظُرُوا كَيْفَ كَانَ عَاقِبَةُ الَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِهِمْ وَكَانُوا أَشَدَّ مِنْهُمْ قُوَّةً ۚ وَمَا كَانَ اللَّهُ لِيُعْجِزَهُ مِن شَيْءٍ فِي السَّمَاوَاتِ وَلَا فِي الْأَرْضِ ۚ إِنَّهُ كَانَ عَلِيمًا قَدِيرًا
verses.translation: And did they not travel in the land in order to see what sort of fate befell those who were before them, whereas they exceeded them in strength? And Allah is not such that anything in the heavens or in the earth can break away from His control; indeed He is All Knowing, Able.

verses.content: وَلَوْ يُؤَاخِذُ اللَّهُ النَّاسَ بِمَا كَسَبُوا مَا تَرَكَ عَلَىٰ ظَهْرِهَا مِن دَابَّةٍ وَلَـٰكِن يُؤَخِّرُهُمْ إِلَىٰ أَجَلٍ مُّسَمًّى ۖ فَإِذَا جَاءَ أَجَلُهُمْ فَإِنَّ اللَّهَ كَانَ بِعِبَادِهِ بَصِيرًا
verses.translation: If Allah were to seize people upon their deeds, He would leave no creature walking on the surface of the earth, but He gives them respite till a fixed term; and when their term comes – so indeed Allah is observing all His bondmen!

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ يس
verses.translation: Yaa-Seen (Alphabets of Arabic language – Allah and to whomever He reveals, know their precise meanings.)

verses.content: وَالْقُرْآنِ الْحَكِيمِ
verses.translation: By oath of the wise Qur’an.

verses.content: إِنَّكَ لَمِنَ الْمُرْسَلِينَ
verses.translation: You (O dear Prophet Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him) are indeed one of the Noble Messengers.

verses.content: عَلَىٰ صِرَاطٍ مُّسْتَقِيمٍ
verses.translation: On the Straight Path.

verses.content: تَنزِيلَ الْعَزِيزِ الرَّحِيمِ
verses.translation: (The Qur’an is) Sent down by the Almighty, the Most Merciful.

verses.content: لِتُنذِرَ قَوْمًا مَّا أُنذِرَ آبَاؤُهُمْ فَهُمْ غَافِلُونَ
verses.translation: So that you may warn these people whose ancestors were not warned, they are therefore unaware.

verses.content: لَقَدْ حَقَّ الْقَوْلُ عَلَىٰ أَكْثَرِهِمْ فَهُمْ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ
verses.translation: Undoubtedly, it (their disbelief) has proved true for most of them, so they will not believe.

verses.content: إِنَّا جَعَلْنَا فِي أَعْنَاقِهِمْ أَغْلَالًا فَهِيَ إِلَى الْأَذْقَانِ فَهُم مُّقْمَحُونَ
verses.translation: We have indeed put shackles around their necks reaching up to the chins, so they remain facing upwards.

verses.content: وَجَعَلْنَا مِن بَيْنِ أَيْدِيهِمْ سَدًّا وَمِنْ خَلْفِهِمْ سَدًّا فَأَغْشَيْنَاهُمْ فَهُمْ لَا يُبْصِرُونَ
verses.translation: And We have set a wall before them and a wall behind them, and covered the top – so they are unable to see anything.

verses.content: وَسَوَاءٌ عَلَيْهِمْ أَأَنذَرْتَهُمْ أَمْ لَمْ تُنذِرْهُمْ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ
verses.translation: And it is the same for them, whether you warn them or do not warn them – they will not believe.

verses.content: إِنَّمَا تُنذِرُ مَنِ اتَّبَعَ الذِّكْرَ وَخَشِيَ الرَّحْمَـٰنَ بِالْغَيْبِ ۖ فَبَشِّرْهُ بِمَغْفِرَةٍ وَأَجْرٍ كَرِيمٍ
verses.translation: You warn only him who follows the advice and fears the Most Gracious without seeing; therefore give him glad tidings of forgiveness and an honourable reward.

verses.content: إِنَّا نَحْنُ نُحْيِي الْمَوْتَىٰ وَنَكْتُبُ مَا قَدَّمُوا وَآثَارَهُمْ ۚ وَكُلَّ شَيْءٍ أَحْصَيْنَاهُ فِي إِمَامٍ مُّبِينٍ
verses.translation: We will surely bring the dead to life and We record what they send ahead and the signs they will leave behind; and We have accounted all things in a clear Book.

verses.content: وَاضْرِبْ لَهُم مَّثَلًا أَصْحَابَ الْقَرْيَةِ إِذْ جَاءَهَا الْمُرْسَلُونَ
verses.translation: And relate to them the signs of the people of the city – when two emissaries came to them.

verses.content: إِذْ أَرْسَلْنَا إِلَيْهِمُ اثْنَيْنِ فَكَذَّبُوهُمَا فَعَزَّزْنَا بِثَالِثٍ فَقَالُوا إِنَّا إِلَيْكُم مُّرْسَلُونَ
verses.translation: When We had sent two towards them and they denied them both, so We fortified them with a third, and they all said, “Indeed we have been sent to you.”

verses.content: قَالُوا مَا أَنتُمْ إِلَّا بَشَرٌ مِّثْلُنَا وَمَا أَنزَلَ الرَّحْمَـٰنُ مِن شَيْءٍ إِنْ أَنتُمْ إِلَّا تَكْذِبُونَ
verses.translation: They said, “You are nothing but mortals like us; the Most Gracious has not sent down anything – you are nothing but liars.”

verses.content: قَالُوا رَبُّنَا يَعْلَمُ إِنَّا إِلَيْكُمْ لَمُرْسَلُونَ
verses.translation: They answered, “Our Lord knows that surely, without doubt, we have been sent towards you.”

verses.content: وَمَا عَلَيْنَا إِلَّا الْبَلَاغُ الْمُبِينُ
verses.translation: “And our duty is nothing but to plainly convey (the message).”

verses.content: قَالُوا إِنَّا تَطَيَّرْنَا بِكُمْ ۖ لَئِن لَّمْ تَنتَهُوا لَنَرْجُمَنَّكُمْ وَلَيَمَسَّنَّكُم مِّنَّا عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٌ
verses.translation: They (the people of the city) said, “We think you are ominous; indeed, if you do not desist, we shall surely stone you to death, and you will surely face a grievous torture at our hands.”

verses.content: قَالُوا طَائِرُكُم مَّعَكُمْ ۚ أَئِن ذُكِّرْتُم ۚ بَلْ أَنتُمْ قَوْمٌ مُّسْرِفُونَ
verses.translation: They said, “Your evil omens are with you! What! You get annoyed for being advised? In fact you are a people who transgress the limits!”

verses.content: وَجَاءَ مِنْ أَقْصَى الْمَدِينَةِ رَجُلٌ يَسْعَىٰ قَالَ يَا قَوْمِ اتَّبِعُوا الْمُرْسَلِينَ
verses.translation: And from the outermost part of the city came a man running; he said, “O my people! Obey those who have been sent.”

verses.content: اتَّبِعُوا مَن لَّا يَسْأَلُكُمْ أَجْرًا وَهُم مُّهْتَدُونَ
verses.translation: “Obey those who do not ask any fee from you, and they are on guidance.”

verses.content: وَمَا لِيَ لَا أَعْبُدُ الَّذِي فَطَرَنِي وَإِلَيْهِ تُرْجَعُونَ
verses.translation: “And what is the matter with me that I should not worship Him Who created me, whereas it is towards Him that you are to return?”

verses.content: أَأَتَّخِذُ مِن دُونِهِ آلِهَةً إِن يُرِدْنِ الرَّحْمَـٰنُ بِضُرٍّ لَّا تُغْنِ عَنِّي شَفَاعَتُهُمْ شَيْئًا وَلَا يُنقِذُونِ
verses.translation: “What! Shall I appoint Gods other than Allah? So that if the Most Gracious should wish me any harm, their intercession would be of no use to me, nor would they be able to save me?”

verses.content: إِنِّي إِذًا لَّفِي ضَلَالٍ مُّبِينٍ
verses.translation: “Undoubtedly, I am then in open error.”

verses.content: إِنِّي آمَنتُ بِرَبِّكُمْ فَاسْمَعُونِ
verses.translation: “Indeed I have believed in your Lord, so heed me.”

verses.content: قِيلَ ادْخُلِ الْجَنَّةَ ۖ قَالَ يَا لَيْتَ قَوْمِي يَعْلَمُونَ
verses.translation: It was said to him, “Enter Paradise”; he said, “If only my people knew!”

verses.content: بِمَا غَفَرَ لِي رَبِّي وَجَعَلَنِي مِنَ الْمُكْرَمِينَ
verses.translation: “The manner in which my Lord has pardoned me and made me of the honoured ones!”

verses.content: وَمَا أَنزَلْنَا عَلَىٰ قَوْمِهِ مِن بَعْدِهِ مِن جُندٍ مِّنَ السَّمَاءِ وَمَا كُنَّا مُنزِلِينَ
verses.translation: And after him, We did not send down any army from heaven against his people, nor did We intend to send down an army.

verses.content: إِن كَانَتْ إِلَّا صَيْحَةً وَاحِدَةً فَإِذَا هُمْ خَامِدُونَ
verses.translation: It was just one scream, and with it they were extinguished.

verses.content: يَا حَسْرَةً عَلَى الْعِبَادِ ۚ مَا يَأْتِيهِم مِّن رَّسُولٍ إِلَّا كَانُوا بِهِ يَسْتَهْزِئُونَ
verses.translation: And it was said, “Woe to those bondmen – whenever a Noble Messenger comes to them, they mock at him!”

verses.content: أَلَمْ يَرَوْا كَمْ أَهْلَكْنَا قَبْلَهُم مِّنَ الْقُرُونِ أَنَّهُمْ إِلَيْهِمْ لَا يَرْجِعُونَ
verses.translation: Have they not seen how many generations We destroyed before them, which will not return to them?

verses.content: وَإِن كُلٌّ لَّمَّا جَمِيعٌ لَّدَيْنَا مُحْضَرُونَ
verses.translation: And without exception, all of them will be brought forth before Us.

verses.content: وَآيَةٌ لَّهُمُ الْأَرْضُ الْمَيْتَةُ أَحْيَيْنَاهَا وَأَخْرَجْنَا مِنْهَا حَبًّا فَمِنْهُ يَأْكُلُونَ
verses.translation: And a sign for them is the dead earth; We gave it life and We produced from it grain, so they eat from it.

verses.content: وَجَعَلْنَا فِيهَا جَنَّاتٍ مِّن نَّخِيلٍ وَأَعْنَابٍ وَفَجَّرْنَا فِيهَا مِنَ الْعُيُونِ
verses.translation: And We have placed in it gardens of dates and grapes, and We have made springs of water in it.

verses.content: لِيَأْكُلُوا مِن ثَمَرِهِ وَمَا عَمِلَتْهُ أَيْدِيهِمْ ۖ أَفَلَا يَشْكُرُونَ
verses.translation: So that they may eat from its fruits, whereas they are not manufactured by their hands! So will they not be grateful?

verses.content: سُبْحَانَ الَّذِي خَلَقَ الْأَزْوَاجَ كُلَّهَا مِمَّا تُنبِتُ الْأَرْضُ وَمِنْ أَنفُسِهِمْ وَمِمَّا لَا يَعْلَمُونَ
verses.translation: Purity is to Him Who created all pairs, from what the earth grows, and of themselves, and from the things they do not know.

verses.content: وَآيَةٌ لَّهُمُ اللَّيْلُ نَسْلَخُ مِنْهُ النَّهَارَ فَإِذَا هُم مُّظْلِمُونَ
verses.translation: And a sign for them is the night; We strip the day out of it, thereupon they are in darkness.

verses.content: وَالشَّمْسُ تَجْرِي لِمُسْتَقَرٍّ لَّهَا ۚ ذَٰلِكَ تَقْدِيرُ الْعَزِيزِ الْعَلِيمِ
verses.translation: And the sun runs its course for its final destination; this is a command of the Almighty, the All Knowing.

verses.content: وَالْقَمَرَ قَدَّرْنَاهُ مَنَازِلَ حَتَّىٰ عَادَ كَالْعُرْجُونِ الْقَدِيمِ
verses.translation: And We have appointed positions for the moon till it returns like an old branch of the date palm.

verses.content: لَا الشَّمْسُ يَنبَغِي لَهَا أَن تُدْرِكَ الْقَمَرَ وَلَا اللَّيْلُ سَابِقُ النَّهَارِ ۚ وَكُلٌّ فِي فَلَكٍ يَسْبَحُونَ
verses.translation: It is not for the sun to catch up with the moon, nor does the night surpass the day; and each one of them floats in its orbit.

verses.content: وَآيَةٌ لَّهُمْ أَنَّا حَمَلْنَا ذُرِّيَّتَهُمْ فِي الْفُلْكِ الْمَشْحُونِ
verses.translation: And a sign for them is that We lodged them in a laden ship, while they were in their forefathers backs.

verses.content: وَخَلَقْنَا لَهُم مِّن مِّثْلِهِ مَا يَرْكَبُونَ
verses.translation: And We have created for them similar ships, in which they now ride.

verses.content: وَإِن نَّشَأْ نُغْرِقْهُمْ فَلَا صَرِيخَ لَهُمْ وَلَا هُمْ يُنقَذُونَ
verses.translation: And if We will, We can drown them, so there would be no help in their distress, nor would they be saved.

verses.content: إِلَّا رَحْمَةً مِّنَّا وَمَتَاعًا إِلَىٰ حِينٍ
verses.translation: Unless by mercy from Us, and as a comfort for a while.

verses.content: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمُ اتَّقُوا مَا بَيْنَ أَيْدِيكُمْ وَمَا خَلْفَكُمْ لَعَلَّكُمْ تُرْحَمُونَ
verses.translation: And when it is said to them, “Beware of what is before you and what is behind you, in the hope of your gaining mercy”, they turn away!

verses.content: وَمَا تَأْتِيهِم مِّنْ آيَةٍ مِّنْ آيَاتِ رَبِّهِمْ إِلَّا كَانُوا عَنْهَا مُعْرِضِينَ
verses.translation: And whenever a sign comes to them from the signs of their Lord, they always turn away from it!

verses.content: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمْ أَنفِقُوا مِمَّا رَزَقَكُمُ اللَّهُ قَالَ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا لِلَّذِينَ آمَنُوا أَنُطْعِمُ مَن لَّوْ يَشَاءُ اللَّهُ أَطْعَمَهُ إِنْ أَنتُمْ إِلَّا فِي ضَلَالٍ مُّبِينٍ
verses.translation: And when it is said to them, “Spend in Allah’s cause, from what Allah has provided you”, the disbelievers say regarding the believers, “Shall we feed these, whom if Allah willed, would have fed? You are not but in open error!”

verses.content: وَيَقُولُونَ مَتَىٰ هَـٰذَا الْوَعْدُ إِن كُنتُمْ صَادِقِينَ
verses.translation: And they say, “When will this promise be fulfilled, if you are truthful?”

verses.content: مَا يَنظُرُونَ إِلَّا صَيْحَةً وَاحِدَةً تَأْخُذُهُمْ وَهُمْ يَخِصِّمُونَ
verses.translation: They await just one scream, which will overcome them while they are involved in worldly disputes.

verses.content: فَلَا يَسْتَطِيعُونَ تَوْصِيَةً وَلَا إِلَىٰ أَهْلِهِمْ يَرْجِعُونَ
verses.translation: Therefore neither able to make a will, nor returning to their homes.

verses.content: وَنُفِخَ فِي الصُّورِ فَإِذَا هُم مِّنَ الْأَجْدَاثِ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِمْ يَنسِلُونَ
verses.translation: And the Trumpet will be blown – so they will come forth from the graves, running towards their Lord.

verses.content: قَالُوا يَا وَيْلَنَا مَن بَعَثَنَا مِن مَّرْقَدِنَا ۜ ۗ هَـٰذَا مَا وَعَدَ الرَّحْمَـٰنُ وَصَدَقَ الْمُرْسَلُونَ
verses.translation: Saying, “O our misfortune! Who has raised us from our sleep? This is what the Most Gracious had promised, and the Noble Messengers had spoken the truth!”

verses.content: إِن كَانَتْ إِلَّا صَيْحَةً وَاحِدَةً فَإِذَا هُمْ جَمِيعٌ لَّدَيْنَا مُحْضَرُونَ
verses.translation: It is just one scream, and every one of them will be brought together before Us!

verses.content: فَالْيَوْمَ لَا تُظْلَمُ نَفْسٌ شَيْئًا وَلَا تُجْزَوْنَ إِلَّا مَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ
verses.translation: So this day no soul will be wronged in the least; and you will not be compensated except for your deeds.

verses.content: إِنَّ أَصْحَابَ الْجَنَّةِ الْيَوْمَ فِي شُغُلٍ فَاكِهُونَ
verses.translation: Indeed this day the dwellers of Paradise are in comfort, with blissful hearts.

verses.content: هُمْ وَأَزْوَاجُهُمْ فِي ظِلَالٍ عَلَى الْأَرَائِكِ مُتَّكِئُونَ
verses.translation: They and their wives are in shades, reclining on thrones.

verses.content: لَهُمْ فِيهَا فَاكِهَةٌ وَلَهُم مَّا يَدَّعُونَ
verses.translation: In it (paradise) are fruits for them and whatever they ask for.

verses.content: سَلَامٌ قَوْلًا مِّن رَّبٍّ رَّحِيمٍ
verses.translation: Upon them will be “Peace” – a Word from their Merciful Lord!

verses.content: وَامْتَازُوا الْيَوْمَ أَيُّهَا الْمُجْرِمُونَ
verses.translation: “And be separated (from others) this day, O you criminals!”

verses.content: أَلَمْ أَعْهَدْ إِلَيْكُمْ يَا بَنِي آدَمَ أَن لَّا تَعْبُدُوا الشَّيْطَانَ ۖ إِنَّهُ لَكُمْ عَدُوٌّ مُّبِينٌ
verses.translation: “O Descendants of Adam! Did I not take a covenant from you that you shall not worship the devil? Undoubtedly, he is your open enemy.”

verses.content: وَأَنِ اعْبُدُونِي ۚ هَـٰذَا صِرَاطٌ مُّسْتَقِيمٌ
verses.translation: “And that you shall worship Me? This is the Straight Path.”

verses.content: وَلَقَدْ أَضَلَّ مِنكُمْ جِبِلًّا كَثِيرًا ۖ أَفَلَمْ تَكُونُوا تَعْقِلُونَ
verses.translation: “And he has indeed led a large number of you astray; so did you not have sense?”

verses.content: هَـٰذِهِ جَهَنَّمُ الَّتِي كُنتُمْ تُوعَدُونَ
verses.translation: “This is hell, which you were promised.”

verses.content: اصْلَوْهَا الْيَوْمَ بِمَا كُنتُمْ تَكْفُرُونَ
verses.translation: “Enter it this day – the recompense of your disbelief.”

verses.content: الْيَوْمَ نَخْتِمُ عَلَىٰ أَفْوَاهِهِمْ وَتُكَلِّمُنَا أَيْدِيهِمْ وَتَشْهَدُ أَرْجُلُهُم بِمَا كَانُوا يَكْسِبُونَ
verses.translation: This day We will set a seal on their mouths, and their hands will speak out to Us and their feet will bear witness to their deeds.

verses.content: وَلَوْ نَشَاءُ لَطَمَسْنَا عَلَىٰ أَعْيُنِهِمْ فَاسْتَبَقُوا الصِّرَاطَ فَأَنَّىٰ يُبْصِرُونَ
verses.translation: And had We willed, We could have quenched their eyes so they would rush towards the path, unable to see a thing.

verses.content: وَلَوْ نَشَاءُ لَمَسَخْنَاهُمْ عَلَىٰ مَكَانَتِهِمْ فَمَا اسْتَطَاعُوا مُضِيًّا وَلَا يَرْجِعُونَ
verses.translation: And had We willed, We could have disfigured their faces while they were in their homes, therefore unable to go forward or turn back.

verses.content: وَمَن نُّعَمِّرْهُ نُنَكِّسْهُ فِي الْخَلْقِ ۖ أَفَلَا يَعْقِلُونَ
verses.translation: And whomever We bring to an old age, We reverse him in creation; so do they not understand?

verses.content: وَمَا عَلَّمْنَاهُ الشِّعْرَ وَمَا يَنبَغِي لَهُ ۚ إِنْ هُوَ إِلَّا ذِكْرٌ وَقُرْآنٌ مُّبِينٌ
verses.translation: And We have not taught him (Prophet Mohammed- peace and blessings be upon him) to recite poetry, nor does it befit him; it is nothing but an advice and the bright Qur’an.

verses.content: لِّيُنذِرَ مَن كَانَ حَيًّا وَيَحِقَّ الْقَوْلُ عَلَى الْكَافِرِينَ
verses.translation: To warn the living*, and to prove the Word against disbelievers. (Only the believers are deemed alive in Allah’s sight.)

verses.content: أَوَلَمْ يَرَوْا أَنَّا خَلَقْنَا لَهُم مِّمَّا عَمِلَتْ أَيْدِينَا أَنْعَامًا فَهُمْ لَهَا مَالِكُونَ
verses.translation: Did they not see that We have created animals for them from Our handiwork, so they are their owners?

verses.content: وَذَلَّلْنَاهَا لَهُمْ فَمِنْهَا رَكُوبُهُمْ وَمِنْهَا يَأْكُلُونَ
verses.translation: And have subjected the animals for them, so they ride some animals and eat some?

verses.content: وَلَهُمْ فِيهَا مَنَافِعُ وَمَشَارِبُ ۖ أَفَلَا يَشْكُرُونَ
verses.translation: And for them in the animals are numerous different benefits and drinks; so will they not be grateful?

verses.content: وَاتَّخَذُوا مِن دُونِ اللَّهِ آلِهَةً لَّعَلَّهُمْ يُنصَرُونَ
verses.translation: And they have appointed Gods other than Allah, that perhaps they may be helped!

verses.content: لَا يَسْتَطِيعُونَ نَصْرَهُمْ وَهُمْ لَهُمْ جُندٌ مُّحْضَرُونَ
verses.translation: They (the appointed Gods) cannot help them; and they and their armies will come (to Us), as captives.

verses.content: فَلَا يَحْزُنكَ قَوْلُهُمْ ۘ إِنَّا نَعْلَمُ مَا يُسِرُّونَ وَمَا يُعْلِنُونَ
verses.translation: Therefore (O dear Prophet Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him) do not grieve because of what they (the disbelievers) say; indeed We know what they conceal and what they disclose.

verses.content: أَوَلَمْ يَرَ الْإِنسَانُ أَنَّا خَلَقْنَاهُ مِن نُّطْفَةٍ فَإِذَا هُوَ خَصِيمٌ مُّبِينٌ
verses.translation: And did not man see that We have created him from a drop of semen? Yet he is an open quarreller!

verses.content: وَضَرَبَ لَنَا مَثَلًا وَنَسِيَ خَلْقَهُ ۖ قَالَ مَن يُحْيِي الْعِظَامَ وَهِيَ رَمِيمٌ
verses.translation: And he invents an example for Us, while forgetting his own creation, saying, “Who is such that can revive the bones when they have completely rotted away?”

verses.content: قُلْ يُحْيِيهَا الَّذِي أَنشَأَهَا أَوَّلَ مَرَّةٍ ۖ وَهُوَ بِكُلِّ خَلْقٍ عَلِيمٌ
verses.translation: Proclaim (O dear Prophet Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him), “They will be revived by the One Who created them the first time; and He is the All Knowing of every creation.”

verses.content: الَّذِي جَعَلَ لَكُم مِّنَ الشَّجَرِ الْأَخْضَرِ نَارًا فَإِذَا أَنتُم مِّنْهُ تُوقِدُونَ
verses.translation: “The One Who has created for you fire from the green tree, so you kindle from it.”

verses.content: أَوَلَيْسَ الَّذِي خَلَقَ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضَ بِقَادِرٍ عَلَىٰ أَن يَخْلُقَ مِثْلَهُم ۚ بَلَىٰ وَهُوَ الْخَلَّاقُ الْعَلِيمُ
verses.translation: And is it not possible for the One Who created the heavens and the earth to create the likes of them? It is surely possible, why not? And He is the Great Creator, the All Knowing of everything.

verses.content: إِنَّمَا أَمْرُهُ إِذَا أَرَادَ شَيْئًا أَن يَقُولَ لَهُ كُن فَيَكُونُ
verses.translation: And His only task when He intends a thing is to command it, “Be” – and it thereupon happens!

verses.content: فَسُبْحَانَ الَّذِي بِيَدِهِ مَلَكُوتُ كُلِّ شَيْءٍ وَإِلَيْهِ تُرْجَعُونَ
verses.translation: Therefore Purity is to Him in Whose Hand* is the control over all things and it is towards Him that you will be returned. (Used as a metaphor to mean Power).

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ وَالصَّافَّاتِ صَفًّا
verses.translation: By oath of those who establish proper ranks.

verses.content: فَالزَّاجِرَاتِ زَجْرًا
verses.translation: And by oath of those who herd with a stern warning.

verses.content: فَالتَّالِيَاتِ ذِكْرًا
verses.translation: And by oath of the groups that read the Qur’an.

verses.content: إِنَّ إِلَـٰهَكُمْ لَوَاحِدٌ
verses.translation: Indeed your God is surely only One.

verses.content: رَّبُّ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا وَرَبُّ الْمَشَارِقِ
verses.translation: Lord of the heavens and the earth and all that is between them – and the Lord of the sun’s rising points.

verses.content: إِنَّا زَيَّنَّا السَّمَاءَ الدُّنْيَا بِزِينَةٍ الْكَوَاكِبِ
verses.translation: We have indeed adorned the lowest heaven with stars as ornaments.

verses.content: وَحِفْظًا مِّن كُلِّ شَيْطَانٍ مَّارِدٍ
verses.translation: And to protect it from every rebellious devil.

verses.content: لَّا يَسَّمَّعُونَ إِلَى الْمَلَإِ الْأَعْلَىٰ وَيُقْذَفُونَ مِن كُلِّ جَانِبٍ
verses.translation: They cannot listen to the speech of those on higher elevations and they are targeted from every side.

verses.content: دُحُورًا ۖ وَلَهُمْ عَذَابٌ وَاصِبٌ
verses.translation: To make them flee, and for them is a never-ending punishment.

verses.content: إِلَّا مَنْ خَطِفَ الْخَطْفَةَ فَأَتْبَعَهُ شِهَابٌ ثَاقِبٌ
verses.translation: Except one who sometimes steals a part, so a blazing flame goes after him.

verses.content: فَاسْتَفْتِهِمْ أَهُمْ أَشَدُّ خَلْقًا أَم مَّنْ خَلَقْنَا ۚ إِنَّا خَلَقْنَاهُم مِّن طِينٍ لَّازِبٍ
verses.translation: Therefore ask them (O dear Prophet Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him), “Are they a stronger creation, or are other things of our creation, (the angels, the heavens etc.)?” We have indeed created them from sticky clay.

verses.content: بَلْ عَجِبْتَ وَيَسْخَرُونَ
verses.translation: Rather you are surprised, whereas they keep mocking.

verses.content: وَإِذَا ذُكِّرُوا لَا يَذْكُرُونَ
verses.translation: And they do not understand, when explained to.

verses.content: وَإِذَا رَأَوْا آيَةً يَسْتَسْخِرُونَ
verses.translation: And whenever they see a sign, they mock at it.

verses.content: وَقَالُوا إِنْ هَـٰذَا إِلَّا سِحْرٌ مُّبِينٌ
verses.translation: And they say, “This is nothing but clear magic.”

verses.content: أَإِذَا مِتْنَا وَكُنَّا تُرَابًا وَعِظَامًا أَإِنَّا لَمَبْعُوثُونَ
verses.translation: “When we are dead and have turned into dust and bones, will we certainly be raised again?”

verses.content: أَوَآبَاؤُنَا الْأَوَّلُونَ
verses.translation: “And also our forefathers?”

verses.content: قُلْ نَعَمْ وَأَنتُمْ دَاخِرُونَ
verses.translation: Proclaim, “Yes, and with disgrace.”

verses.content: فَإِنَّمَا هِيَ زَجْرَةٌ وَاحِدَةٌ فَإِذَا هُمْ يَنظُرُونَ
verses.translation: So that is just a single jolt, thereupon they will begin staring.

verses.content: وَقَالُوا يَا وَيْلَنَا هَـٰذَا يَوْمُ الدِّينِ
verses.translation: And will say, “O our misfortune!” It will be said to them, “This is the Day of Justice.”

verses.content: هَـٰذَا يَوْمُ الْفَصْلِ الَّذِي كُنتُم بِهِ تُكَذِّبُونَ
verses.translation: “This is the Day of Judgement, which you used to deny!”

verses.content: احْشُرُوا الَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوا وَأَزْوَاجَهُمْ وَمَا كَانُوا يَعْبُدُونَ
verses.translation: “Gather all the unjust persons and their spouses, and all that they used to worship!” –

verses.content: مِن دُونِ اللَّهِ فَاهْدُوهُمْ إِلَىٰ صِرَاطِ الْجَحِيمِ
verses.translation: “Instead of Allah – and herd them to the path leading to hell.”

verses.content: وَقِفُوهُمْ ۖ إِنَّهُم مَّسْئُولُونَ
verses.translation: “And stop them – they are to be questioned.”

verses.content: مَا لَكُمْ لَا تَنَاصَرُونَ
verses.translation: “What is the matter with you, that you do not help one another?”

verses.content: بَلْ هُمُ الْيَوْمَ مُسْتَسْلِمُونَ
verses.translation: In fact this day they have all surrendered.

verses.content: وَأَقْبَلَ بَعْضُهُمْ عَلَىٰ بَعْضٍ يَتَسَاءَلُونَ
verses.translation: And some of them inclined towards others, mutually questioning.

verses.content: قَالُوا إِنَّكُمْ كُنتُمْ تَأْتُونَنَا عَنِ الْيَمِينِ
verses.translation: They said, “It is you who used to come to us from our right, in order to sway.”

verses.content: قَالُوا بَل لَّمْ تَكُونُوا مُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.translation: They will answer, “You yourselves did not have faith!”

verses.content: وَمَا كَانَ لَنَا عَلَيْكُم مِّن سُلْطَانٍ ۖ بَلْ كُنتُمْ قَوْمًا طَاغِينَ
verses.translation: “And we did not have any control over you; but in fact you yourselves were rebellious.”

verses.content: فَحَقَّ عَلَيْنَا قَوْلُ رَبِّنَا ۖ إِنَّا لَذَائِقُونَ
verses.translation: “So the Word of our Lord has proved true upon us; we will surely have to taste (the punishment).”

verses.content: فَأَغْوَيْنَاكُمْ إِنَّا كُنَّا غَاوِينَ
verses.translation: “We therefore led you astray, for we ourselves were astray!”

verses.content: فَإِنَّهُمْ يَوْمَئِذٍ فِي الْعَذَابِ مُشْتَرِكُونَ
verses.translation: So this day they all are partners in the punishment.

verses.content: إِنَّا كَذَٰلِكَ نَفْعَلُ بِالْمُجْرِمِينَ
verses.translation: This is how We deal with the guilty.

verses.content: إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا إِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمْ لَا إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّا اللَّهُ يَسْتَكْبِرُونَ
verses.translation: Indeed, when it was said to them, “There is no God except Allah”, they were haughty.

verses.content: وَيَقُولُونَ أَئِنَّا لَتَارِكُو آلِهَتِنَا لِشَاعِرٍ مَّجْنُونٍ
verses.translation: And they used to say, “Shall we forsake our Gods upon the sayings of a mad poet?”

verses.content: بَلْ جَاءَ بِالْحَقِّ وَصَدَّقَ الْمُرْسَلِينَ
verses.translation: In fact he has brought the Truth, and testified for the Noble Messengers!

verses.content: إِنَّكُمْ لَذَائِقُو الْعَذَابِ الْأَلِيمِ
verses.translation: “You surely have to taste the painful punishment.”

verses.content: وَمَا تُجْزَوْنَ إِلَّا مَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ
verses.translation: “And you will not be compensated except for your deeds.”

verses.content: إِلَّا عِبَادَ اللَّهِ الْمُخْلَصِينَ
verses.translation: Except the chosen bondmen of Allah.

verses.content: أُولَـٰئِكَ لَهُمْ رِزْقٌ مَّعْلُومٌ
verses.translation: For them is the sustenance known to Us.

verses.content: فَوَاكِهُ ۖ وَهُم مُّكْرَمُونَ
verses.translation: Fruits; and they will be honoured.

verses.content: فِي جَنَّاتِ النَّعِيمِ
verses.translation: In Gardens of peace.

verses.content: عَلَىٰ سُرُرٍ مُّتَقَابِلِينَ
verses.translation: Facing one another on thrones.

verses.content: يُطَافُ عَلَيْهِم بِكَأْسٍ مِّن مَّعِينٍ
verses.translation: Cups of wine will be presented to them in rounds, from a spring flowing in front of them.

verses.content: بَيْضَاءَ لَذَّةٍ لِّلشَّارِبِينَ
verses.translation: White, delicious for the drinkers.

verses.content: لَا فِيهَا غَوْلٌ وَلَا هُمْ عَنْهَا يُنزَفُونَ
verses.translation: Neither does it intoxicate, nor give a headache.

verses.content: وَعِندَهُمْ قَاصِرَاتُ الطَّرْفِ عِينٌ
verses.translation: And with them are those who do not set gaze upon men except their husbands, the maidens with gorgeous eyes.

verses.content: كَأَنَّهُنَّ بَيْضٌ مَّكْنُونٌ
verses.translation: As if they were eggs, safely hidden.

verses.content: فَأَقْبَلَ بَعْضُهُمْ عَلَىٰ بَعْضٍ يَتَسَاءَلُونَ
verses.translation: So one among them turns to the other, questioning. –

verses.content: قَالَ قَائِلٌ مِّنْهُمْ إِنِّي كَانَ لِي قَرِينٌ
verses.translation: The speaker among them said, “I had a companion.” –

verses.content: يَقُولُ أَإِنَّكَ لَمِنَ الْمُصَدِّقِينَ
verses.translation: “Who used to tell me, ‘Do you believe it is true?’ –

verses.content: أَإِذَا مِتْنَا وَكُنَّا تُرَابًا وَعِظَامًا أَإِنَّا لَمَدِينُونَ
verses.translation: ‘That when we are dead and have turned into dust and bones, that we will either be rewarded or punished?’”

verses.content: قَالَ هَلْ أَنتُم مُّطَّلِعُونَ
verses.translation: He said (to others on the thrones), “Will you take a glimpse (into hell) below?”

verses.content: فَاطَّلَعَ فَرَآهُ فِي سَوَاءِ الْجَحِيمِ
verses.translation: He therefore looked down and saw him amidst the blazing fire.

verses.content: قَالَ تَاللَّهِ إِن كِدتَّ لَتُرْدِينِ
verses.translation: He said, “By Allah, you had nearly ruined me!”

verses.content: وَلَوْلَا نِعْمَةُ رَبِّي لَكُنتُ مِنَ الْمُحْضَرِينَ
verses.translation: “And were it not for the munificence of my Lord, I too would have been seized and brought forth (captive)!”

verses.content: أَفَمَا نَحْنُ بِمَيِّتِينَ
verses.translation: “So are we never to die?” (The people of Paradise will ask the angels, with delight, after the announcement of everlasting life.)

verses.content: إِلَّا مَوْتَتَنَا الْأُولَىٰ وَمَا نَحْنُ بِمُعَذَّبِينَ
verses.translation: “Except our earlier death, and nor will we be punished?”

verses.content: إِنَّ هَـٰذَا لَهُوَ الْفَوْزُ الْعَظِيمُ
verses.translation: “This is, most certainly, the supreme success.”

verses.content: لِمِثْلِ هَـٰذَا فَلْيَعْمَلِ الْعَامِلُونَ
verses.translation: For such a reward should the workers perform.

verses.content: أَذَٰلِكَ خَيْرٌ نُّزُلًا أَمْ شَجَرَةُ الزَّقُّومِ
verses.translation: So is this welcome better, or the tree of Zaqqum?

verses.content: إِنَّا جَعَلْنَاهَا فِتْنَةً لِّلظَّالِمِينَ
verses.translation: We have indeed made that a punishment for the unjust.

verses.content: إِنَّهَا شَجَرَةٌ تَخْرُجُ فِي أَصْلِ الْجَحِيمِ
verses.translation: Indeed it is a tree that sprouts from the base of hell.

verses.content: طَلْعُهَا كَأَنَّهُ رُءُوسُ الشَّيَاطِينِ
verses.translation: Its fruit like the heads of demons.

verses.content: فَإِنَّهُمْ لَآكِلُونَ مِنْهَا فَمَالِئُونَ مِنْهَا الْبُطُونَ
verses.translation: So indeed they will eat from it, and fill their bellies with it.

verses.content: ثُمَّ إِنَّ لَهُمْ عَلَيْهَا لَشَوْبًا مِّنْ حَمِيمٍ
verses.translation: Then after it, indeed for them is the drink of boiling hot water.

verses.content: ثُمَّ إِنَّ مَرْجِعَهُمْ لَإِلَى الْجَحِيمِ
verses.translation: Then surely their return is towards hell.

verses.content: إِنَّهُمْ أَلْفَوْا آبَاءَهُمْ ضَالِّينَ
verses.translation: They had indeed found their forefathers astray.

verses.content: فَهُمْ عَلَىٰ آثَارِهِمْ يُهْرَعُونَ
verses.translation: So they hastily follow their footsteps!

verses.content: وَلَقَدْ ضَلَّ قَبْلَهُمْ أَكْثَرُ الْأَوَّلِينَ
verses.translation: And indeed before them, most of the former people went astray.

verses.content: وَلَقَدْ أَرْسَلْنَا فِيهِم مُّنذِرِينَ
verses.translation: And indeed We had sent Heralds of warnings among them.

verses.content: فَانظُرْ كَيْفَ كَانَ عَاقِبَةُ الْمُنذَرِينَ
verses.translation: Therefore see what sort of fate befell those who were warned!

verses.content: إِلَّا عِبَادَ اللَّهِ الْمُخْلَصِينَ
verses.translation: Except the chosen bondmen of Allah.

verses.content: وَلَقَدْ نَادَانَا نُوحٌ فَلَنِعْمَ الْمُجِيبُونَ
verses.translation: And indeed Nooh prayed to Us – so what an excellent Acceptor of Prayer We are!

verses.content: وَنَجَّيْنَاهُ وَأَهْلَهُ مِنَ الْكَرْبِ الْعَظِيمِ
verses.translation: And We rescued him and his household from the great calamity.

verses.content: وَجَعَلْنَا ذُرِّيَّتَهُ هُمُ الْبَاقِينَ
verses.translation: And We preserved his descendants.

verses.content: وَتَرَكْنَا عَلَيْهِ فِي الْآخِرِينَ
verses.translation: And We kept his praise among the latter generations.

verses.content: سَلَامٌ عَلَىٰ نُوحٍ فِي الْعَالَمِينَ
verses.translation: Peace be upon Nooh, among the entire people.

verses.content: إِنَّا كَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِي الْمُحْسِنِينَ
verses.translation: This is how We reward the virtuous.

verses.content: إِنَّهُ مِنْ عِبَادِنَا الْمُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.translation: He is indeed one of Our high ranking, firmly believing bondmen.

verses.content: ثُمَّ أَغْرَقْنَا الْآخَرِينَ
verses.translation: We then drowned the others.

verses.content: وَإِنَّ مِن شِيعَتِهِ لَإِبْرَاهِيمَ
verses.translation: And indeed Ibrahim is from his (Nooh’s) group.

verses.content: إِذْ جَاءَ رَبَّهُ بِقَلْبٍ سَلِيمٍ
verses.translation: When he came to his Lord, with a sound heart. (Free from falsehood).

verses.content: إِذْ قَالَ لِأَبِيهِ وَقَوْمِهِ مَاذَا تَعْبُدُونَ
verses.translation: When he said to his father (paternal uncle) and his people, “What do you worship?”

verses.content: أَئِفْكًا آلِهَةً دُونَ اللَّهِ تُرِيدُونَ
verses.translation: “What! You desire, through fabrication, Gods other than Allah?”

verses.content: فَمَا ظَنُّكُم بِرَبِّ الْعَالَمِينَ
verses.translation: “So what do you assume regarding the Lord Of The Creation?” (That He will not punish you?)

verses.content: فَنَظَرَ نَظْرَةً فِي النُّجُومِ
verses.translation: He then shot a glance at the stars.

verses.content: فَقَالَ إِنِّي سَقِيمٌ
verses.translation: He then said, “I feel sick (of you)!”

verses.content: فَتَوَلَّوْا عَنْهُ مُدْبِرِينَ
verses.translation: And they turned their backs on him and went away. (The pagans thought he would transmit the disease).

verses.content: فَرَاغَ إِلَىٰ آلِهَتِهِمْ فَقَالَ أَلَا تَأْكُلُونَ
verses.translation: He then sneaked upon their deities and said, “Do you not eat?”

verses.content: مَا لَكُمْ لَا تَنطِقُونَ
verses.translation: “What is the matter with you, that you do not say anything?”

verses.content: فَرَاغَ عَلَيْهِمْ ضَرْبًا بِالْيَمِينِ
verses.translation: He then began striking them with his right hand, unseen by the people.

verses.content: فَأَقْبَلُوا إِلَيْهِ يَزِفُّونَ
verses.translation: So the disbelievers came running towards him.

verses.content: قَالَ أَتَعْبُدُونَ مَا تَنْحِتُونَ
verses.translation: He said, “What! You worship what you yourselves have sculpted?”

verses.content: وَاللَّهُ خَلَقَكُمْ وَمَا تَعْمَلُونَ
verses.translation: “Whereas Allah has created you and your actions?”

verses.content: قَالُوا ابْنُوا لَهُ بُنْيَانًا فَأَلْقُوهُ فِي الْجَحِيمِ
verses.translation: They said, “Construct a building (furnace) for him, and then cast him in the blazing fire!”

verses.content: فَأَرَادُوا بِهِ كَيْدًا فَجَعَلْنَاهُمُ الْأَسْفَلِينَ
verses.translation: So they tried to execute their evil scheme upon him – We therefore degraded them. (Allah saved him, by commanding the fire to turn cool).

verses.content: وَقَالَ إِنِّي ذَاهِبٌ إِلَىٰ رَبِّي سَيَهْدِينِ
verses.translation: And he said, “Indeed I shall go to my Lord Who will guide me.”

verses.content: رَبِّ هَبْ لِي مِنَ الصَّالِحِينَ
verses.translation: “My Lord! Give me a meritorious child.”

verses.content: فَبَشَّرْنَاهُ بِغُلَامٍ حَلِيمٍ
verses.translation: We therefore gave him the glad tidings of an intelligent son.

verses.content: فَلَمَّا بَلَغَ مَعَهُ السَّعْيَ قَالَ يَا بُنَيَّ إِنِّي أَرَىٰ فِي الْمَنَامِ أَنِّي أَذْبَحُكَ فَانظُرْ مَاذَا تَرَىٰ ۚ قَالَ يَا أَبَتِ افْعَلْ مَا تُؤْمَرُ ۖ سَتَجِدُنِي إِن شَاءَ اللَّهُ مِنَ الصَّابِرِينَ
verses.translation: And when he became capable of working with him, Ibrahim said, “O my son, I dreamt that I am sacrificing you – therefore now consider what is your opinion”; he said, “O my father! Do what you are commanded! Allah willing, you will soon find me patiently enduring!”

verses.content: فَلَمَّا أَسْلَمَا وَتَلَّهُ لِلْجَبِينِ
verses.translation: Then (remember) when they both submitted to Allah’s command, and Ibrahim lay his son facing downwards. (The knife did not hurt Ismail)

verses.content: وَنَادَيْنَاهُ أَن يَا إِبْرَاهِيمُ
verses.translation: And We called out to him, “O Ibrahim!”

verses.content: قَدْ صَدَّقْتَ الرُّؤْيَا ۚ إِنَّا كَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِي الْمُحْسِنِينَ
verses.translation: “You have indeed made the dream come true”; and this is how We reward the virtuous.

verses.content: إِنَّ هَـٰذَا لَهُوَ الْبَلَاءُ الْمُبِينُ
verses.translation: Indeed this was a clear test.

verses.content: وَفَدَيْنَاهُ بِذِبْحٍ عَظِيمٍ
verses.translation: And We rescued him in exchange of a great sacrifice. (The sacrifice of Ibrahim and Ismail – peace be upon them – is commemorated every year on 10, 11 and 12 Zil Haj).

verses.content: وَتَرَكْنَا عَلَيْهِ فِي الْآخِرِينَ
verses.translation: And We kept his praise among the latter generations.

verses.content: سَلَامٌ عَلَىٰ إِبْرَاهِيمَ
verses.translation: Peace be upon Ibrahim!

verses.content: كَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِي الْمُحْسِنِينَ
verses.translation: This is how We reward the virtuous.

verses.content: إِنَّهُ مِنْ عِبَادِنَا الْمُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.translation: He is indeed one of Our high ranking, firmly believing bondmen.

verses.content: وَبَشَّرْنَاهُ بِإِسْحَاقَ نَبِيًّا مِّنَ الصَّالِحِينَ
verses.translation: And We gave him the glad tidings of Ishaq, a Herald of the Hidden, from among those who deserve Our proximity.

verses.content: وَبَارَكْنَا عَلَيْهِ وَعَلَىٰ إِسْحَاقَ ۚ وَمِن ذُرِّيَّتِهِمَا مُحْسِنٌ وَظَالِمٌ لِّنَفْسِهِ مُبِينٌ
verses.translation: And We sent blessings upon him and Ishaq; and among their descendants – some who do good deeds, and some who clearly wrong themselves.

verses.content: وَلَقَدْ مَنَنَّا عَلَىٰ مُوسَىٰ وَهَارُونَ
verses.translation: And We indeed did a great favour to Moosa and Haroon.

verses.content: وَنَجَّيْنَاهُمَا وَقَوْمَهُمَا مِنَ الْكَرْبِ الْعَظِيمِ
verses.translation: And rescued them and their people from the great calamity.

verses.content: وَنَصَرْنَاهُمْ فَكَانُوا هُمُ الْغَالِبِينَ
verses.translation: And We helped them, so they were victorious.

verses.content: وَآتَيْنَاهُمَا الْكِتَابَ الْمُسْتَبِينَ
verses.translation: And We bestowed the clear Book to both of them.

verses.content: وَهَدَيْنَاهُمَا الصِّرَاطَ الْمُسْتَقِيمَ
verses.translation: And guided them to the Straight Path.

verses.content: وَتَرَكْنَا عَلَيْهِمَا فِي الْآخِرِينَ
verses.translation: And We kept their praise among the latter generations.

verses.content: سَلَامٌ عَلَىٰ مُوسَىٰ وَهَارُونَ
verses.translation: Peace be upon Moosa and Haroon!

verses.content: إِنَّا كَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِي الْمُحْسِنِينَ
verses.translation: This is how We reward the virtuous.

verses.content: إِنَّهُمَا مِنْ عِبَادِنَا الْمُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.translation: Indeed they are two of Our high ranking, firmly believing bondmen.

verses.content: وَإِنَّ إِلْيَاسَ لَمِنَ الْمُرْسَلِينَ
verses.translation: And indeed Ilyas is one of the Noble Messengers.

verses.content: إِذْ قَالَ لِقَوْمِهِ أَلَا تَتَّقُونَ
verses.translation: When he said to his people, “Do you not fear?”

verses.content: أَتَدْعُونَ بَعْلًا وَتَذَرُونَ أَحْسَنَ الْخَالِقِينَ
verses.translation: “What! You worship Baal (an idol) and leave the Best Creator?” –

verses.content: اللَّهَ رَبَّكُمْ وَرَبَّ آبَائِكُمُ الْأَوَّلِينَ
verses.translation: “Allah – Who is your Lord and the Lord of your forefathers?”

verses.content: فَكَذَّبُوهُ فَإِنَّهُمْ لَمُحْضَرُونَ
verses.translation: In response they denied him, so they will surely be brought forth as captives.

verses.content: إِلَّا عِبَادَ اللَّهِ الْمُخْلَصِينَ
verses.translation: Except the chosen bondmen of Allah.

verses.content: وَتَرَكْنَا عَلَيْهِ فِي الْآخِرِينَ
verses.translation: And We kept his praise among the latter generations.

verses.content: سَلَامٌ عَلَىٰ إِلْ يَاسِينَ
verses.translation: Peace be upon Ilyas!

verses.content: إِنَّا كَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِي الْمُحْسِنِينَ
verses.translation: This is how We reward the virtuous.

verses.content: إِنَّهُ مِنْ عِبَادِنَا الْمُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.translation: He is indeed one of Our high ranking, firmly believing bondmen.

verses.content: وَإِنَّ لُوطًا لَّمِنَ الْمُرْسَلِينَ
verses.translation: And indeed Lut is one of the Noble Messengers.

verses.content: إِذْ نَجَّيْنَاهُ وَأَهْلَهُ أَجْمَعِينَ
verses.translation: When We rescued him and his entire household.

verses.content: إِلَّا عَجُوزًا فِي الْغَابِرِينَ
verses.translation: Except an old woman, who became of those who stayed behind.

verses.content: ثُمَّ دَمَّرْنَا الْآخَرِينَ
verses.translation: We then destroyed the others.

verses.content: وَإِنَّكُمْ لَتَمُرُّونَ عَلَيْهِم مُّصْبِحِينَ
verses.translation: And indeed you pass over them in the morning. –

verses.content: وَبِاللَّيْلِ ۗ أَفَلَا تَعْقِلُونَ
verses.translation: And during the night; so do you not have sense?

verses.content: وَإِنَّ يُونُسَ لَمِنَ الْمُرْسَلِينَ
verses.translation: And indeed Yunus is one of the Noble Messengers.

verses.content: إِذْ أَبَقَ إِلَى الْفُلْكِ الْمَشْحُونِ
verses.translation: When he left towards the laden ship.

verses.content: فَسَاهَمَ فَكَانَ مِنَ الْمُدْحَضِينَ
verses.translation: Then lots were drawn and he became of those who were pushed into the sea.

verses.content: فَالْتَقَمَهُ الْحُوتُ وَهُوَ مُلِيمٌ
verses.translation: The fish then swallowed him and he blamed himself. (For not waiting for Allah’s command.)

verses.content: فَلَوْلَا أَنَّهُ كَانَ مِنَ الْمُسَبِّحِينَ
verses.translation: And were he not one of those who praise. –

verses.content: لَلَبِثَ فِي بَطْنِهِ إِلَىٰ يَوْمِ يُبْعَثُونَ
verses.translation: He would have remained in its belly till the day when all will be raised.

verses.content: فَنَبَذْنَاهُ بِالْعَرَاءِ وَهُوَ سَقِيمٌ
verses.translation: We then put him ashore on a plain, and he was sick.

verses.content: وَأَنبَتْنَا عَلَيْهِ شَجَرَةً مِّن يَقْطِينٍ
verses.translation: And We grew a tree of gourd (as a shelter) above him.

verses.content: وَأَرْسَلْنَاهُ إِلَىٰ مِائَةِ أَلْفٍ أَوْ يَزِيدُونَ
verses.translation: And We sent him towards a hundred thousand people, in fact more.

verses.content: فَآمَنُوا فَمَتَّعْنَاهُمْ إِلَىٰ حِينٍ
verses.translation: So they accepted faith – We therefore gave them usage for a while.

verses.content: فَاسْتَفْتِهِمْ أَلِرَبِّكَ الْبَنَاتُ وَلَهُمُ الْبَنُونَ
verses.translation: Therefore ask them (O dear Prophet Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him), whether the daughters are for your Lord and the sons for them!

verses.content: أَمْ خَلَقْنَا الْمَلَائِكَةَ إِنَاثًا وَهُمْ شَاهِدُونَ
verses.translation: Or that have We created the angels as females, while they were present?

verses.content: أَلَا إِنَّهُم مِّنْ إِفْكِهِمْ لَيَقُولُونَ
verses.translation: Pay heed! It is their slander that they say. –

verses.content: وَلَدَ اللَّهُ وَإِنَّهُمْ لَكَاذِبُونَ
verses.translation: That “Allah has offspring”; and indeed, surely, they are liars.

verses.content: أَصْطَفَى الْبَنَاتِ عَلَى الْبَنِينَ
verses.translation: “Has he chosen daughters instead of sons?”

verses.content: مَا لَكُمْ كَيْفَ تَحْكُمُونَ
verses.translation: “What is the matter with you? What sort of a judgement you impose!”

verses.content: أَفَلَا تَذَكَّرُونَ
verses.translation: “So do you not ponder?”

verses.content: أَمْ لَكُمْ سُلْطَانٌ مُّبِينٌ
verses.translation: “Or do you have some clear proof?”

verses.content: فَأْتُوا بِكِتَابِكُمْ إِن كُنتُمْ صَادِقِينَ
verses.translation: “Then bring forth your Book, if you are truthful!”

verses.content: وَجَعَلُوا بَيْنَهُ وَبَيْنَ الْجِنَّةِ نَسَبًا ۚ وَلَقَدْ عَلِمَتِ الْجِنَّةُ إِنَّهُمْ لَمُحْضَرُونَ
verses.translation: And they have appointed a relationship between Him and the jinns; and indeed the jinns surely know that they will be brought forth.

verses.content: سُبْحَانَ اللَّهِ عَمَّا يَصِفُونَ
verses.translation: Purity is to Allah from the matters they fabricate.

verses.content: إِلَّا عِبَادَ اللَّهِ الْمُخْلَصِينَ
verses.translation: Except the chosen bondmen of Allah.

verses.content: فَإِنَّكُمْ وَمَا تَعْبُدُونَ
verses.translation: Therefore you and all what you worship. (The disbelievers and their deities.)

verses.content: مَا أَنتُمْ عَلَيْهِ بِفَاتِنِينَ
verses.translation: You cannot make anyone rebel against Him.

verses.content: إِلَّا مَنْ هُوَ صَالِ الْجَحِيمِ
verses.translation: Except the one who will go into the blazing fire.

verses.content: وَمَا مِنَّا إِلَّا لَهُ مَقَامٌ مَّعْلُومٌ
verses.translation: And the angels say, “Each one of us has an appointed known position.”

verses.content: وَإِنَّا لَنَحْنُ الصَّافُّونَ
verses.translation: “And indeed we, with our wings spread, await the command.”

verses.content: وَإِنَّا لَنَحْنُ الْمُسَبِّحُونَ
verses.translation: “And indeed we are those who say His purity.”

verses.content: وَإِن كَانُوا لَيَقُولُونَ
verses.translation: And indeed the disbelievers used to say, –

verses.content: لَوْ أَنَّ عِندَنَا ذِكْرًا مِّنَ الْأَوَّلِينَ
verses.translation: “If we had some advice from the earlier generations,” –

verses.content: لَكُنَّا عِبَادَ اللَّهِ الْمُخْلَصِينَ
verses.translation: “We would certainly be the chosen bondmen of Allah.”

verses.content: فَكَفَرُوا بِهِ ۖ فَسَوْفَ يَعْلَمُونَ
verses.translation: They therefore denied it, so they will soon come to know.

verses.content: وَلَقَدْ سَبَقَتْ كَلِمَتُنَا لِعِبَادِنَا الْمُرْسَلِينَ
verses.translation: And indeed Our Word has already gone forth for Our bondmen who were sent.

verses.content: إِنَّهُمْ لَهُمُ الْمَنصُورُونَ
verses.translation: That undoubtedly, only they will be helped.

verses.content: وَإِنَّ جُندَنَا لَهُمُ الْغَالِبُونَ
verses.translation: And surely, only Our army will be victorious.

verses.content: فَتَوَلَّ عَنْهُمْ حَتَّىٰ حِينٍ
verses.translation: Therefore turn away from them for some time.

verses.content: وَأَبْصِرْهُمْ فَسَوْفَ يُبْصِرُونَ
verses.translation: And watch them, for they will soon see.

verses.content: أَفَبِعَذَابِنَا يَسْتَعْجِلُونَ
verses.translation: So are they being impatient for Our punishment?

verses.content: فَإِذَا نَزَلَ بِسَاحَتِهِمْ فَسَاءَ صَبَاحُ الْمُنذَرِينَ
verses.translation: So when it does descend in their courtyards – so what an evil morning it will be for those who were warned!

verses.content: وَتَوَلَّ عَنْهُمْ حَتَّىٰ حِينٍ
verses.translation: And turn away from them for some time.

verses.content: وَأَبْصِرْ فَسَوْفَ يُبْصِرُونَ
verses.translation: And wait, for they will soon see.

verses.content: سُبْحَانَ رَبِّكَ رَبِّ الْعِزَّةِ عَمَّا يَصِفُونَ
verses.translation: Purity is to your Lord, the Lord of Honour, from all what they say.

verses.content: وَسَلَامٌ عَلَى الْمُرْسَلِينَ
verses.translation: And peace is upon the Noble Messengers.

verses.content: وَالْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ رَبِّ الْعَالَمِينَ
verses.translation: And all praise is to Allah, the Lord Of The Creation.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ ص ۚ وَالْقُرْآنِ ذِي الذِّكْرِ
verses.translation: Saad* – By oath of the renowned Qur’an, (Alphabet of the Arabic language; Allah and to whomever He reveals, know their precise meanings.)

verses.content: بَلِ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا فِي عِزَّةٍ وَشِقَاقٍ
verses.translation: In fact, the disbelievers are in false pride and opposition.

verses.content: كَمْ أَهْلَكْنَا مِن قَبْلِهِم مِّن قَرْنٍ فَنَادَوا وَّلَاتَ حِينَ مَنَاصٍ
verses.translation: Many a generation We did destroy before them – thereupon they cried out whereas it is not the time to escape!

verses.content: وَعَجِبُوا أَن جَاءَهُم مُّنذِرٌ مِّنْهُمْ ۖ وَقَالَ الْكَافِرُونَ هَـٰذَا سَاحِرٌ كَذَّابٌ
verses.translation: And they were surprised that a Herald of Warning came to them from among themselves; and the disbelievers said, “He is a magician, a great liar!”

verses.content: أَجَعَلَ الْآلِهَةَ إِلَـٰهًا وَاحِدًا ۖ إِنَّ هَـٰذَا لَشَيْءٌ عُجَابٌ
verses.translation: “Has he made all the Gods into One God? This is really something very strange!”

verses.content: وَانطَلَقَ الْمَلَأُ مِنْهُمْ أَنِ امْشُوا وَاصْبِرُوا عَلَىٰ آلِهَتِكُمْ ۖ إِنَّ هَـٰذَا لَشَيْءٌ يُرَادُ
verses.translation: And their leaders went about, “Leave him and cling steadfastly to your Gods! Indeed he has a hidden objective in this!”

verses.content: مَا سَمِعْنَا بِهَـٰذَا فِي الْمِلَّةِ الْآخِرَةِ إِنْ هَـٰذَا إِلَّا اخْتِلَاقٌ
verses.translation: “We never heard of this even in Christianity, the latest religion; this is clearly a newly fabricated matter.”

verses.content: أَأُنزِلَ عَلَيْهِ الذِّكْرُ مِن بَيْنِنَا ۚ بَلْ هُمْ فِي شَكٍّ مِّن ذِكْرِي ۖ بَل لَّمَّا يَذُوقُوا عَذَابِ
verses.translation: “Is the Qur’an which is sent to him, among us?” In fact they are in a doubt concerning My Book; in fact, they have not yet tasted My punishment.

verses.content: أَمْ عِندَهُمْ خَزَائِنُ رَحْمَةِ رَبِّكَ الْعَزِيزِ الْوَهَّابِ
verses.translation: Or do they hold the treasures of the mercy of your Lord, the Almighty, the Great Bestower?

verses.content: أَمْ لَهُم مُّلْكُ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا ۖ فَلْيَرْتَقُوا فِي الْأَسْبَابِ
verses.translation: Is the kingdom of the heavens and the earth and all that is between them, for them? So would they not just ascend using ropes?

verses.content: جُندٌ مَّا هُنَالِكَ مَهْزُومٌ مِّنَ الْأَحْزَابِ
verses.translation: This is just one of the disgraced armies, that will be routed there and then.

verses.content: كَذَّبَتْ قَبْلَهُمْ قَوْمُ نُوحٍ وَعَادٌ وَفِرْعَوْنُ ذُو الْأَوْتَادِ
verses.translation: Before them, the people of Nooh had denied, and the tribe of A’ad, and Firaun who used to crucify.

verses.content: وَثَمُودُ وَقَوْمُ لُوطٍ وَأَصْحَابُ الْأَيْكَةِ ۚ أُولَـٰئِكَ الْأَحْزَابُ
verses.translation: And the tribe of Thamud, and the people of Lut, and the People of the Woods; these are the groups.

verses.content: إِن كُلٌّ إِلَّا كَذَّبَ الرُّسُلَ فَحَقَّ عِقَابِ
verses.translation: None of them was such that it did not deny the Noble Messengers, therefore My punishment became inevitable.

verses.content: وَمَا يَنظُرُ هَـٰؤُلَاءِ إِلَّا صَيْحَةً وَاحِدَةً مَّا لَهَا مِن فَوَاقٍ
verses.translation: They await just one Scream, which no one can avert.

verses.content: وَقَالُوا رَبَّنَا عَجِّل لَّنَا قِطَّنَا قَبْلَ يَوْمِ الْحِسَابِ
verses.translation: And they said, “Our Lord! Give us our share quickly, before the Day of Reckoning.”

verses.content: اصْبِرْ عَلَىٰ مَا يَقُولُونَ وَاذْكُرْ عَبْدَنَا دَاوُودَ ذَا الْأَيْدِ ۖ إِنَّهُ أَوَّابٌ
verses.translation: Have patience upon what they say, and remember Our bondman Dawud, the one blessed with favours; he is indeed most inclined (towards His Lord).

verses.content: إِنَّا سَخَّرْنَا الْجِبَالَ مَعَهُ يُسَبِّحْنَ بِالْعَشِيِّ وَالْإِشْرَاقِ
verses.translation: Indeed We subjected the hills to say the praise with him, at night and at morn.

verses.content: وَالطَّيْرَ مَحْشُورَةً ۖ كُلٌّ لَّهُ أَوَّابٌ
verses.translation: And birds gathered together; they were all obedient to him.

verses.content: وَشَدَدْنَا مُلْكَهُ وَآتَيْنَاهُ الْحِكْمَةَ وَفَصْلَ الْخِطَابِ
verses.translation: And We strengthened his kingdom and gave him wisdom and just speech.

verses.content: وَهَلْ أَتَاكَ نَبَأُ الْخَصْمِ إِذْ تَسَوَّرُوا الْمِحْرَابَ
verses.translation: And did the news of the two disputants reach you? When they scaled over the wall into Dawud’s mosque.

verses.content: إِذْ دَخَلُوا عَلَىٰ دَاوُودَ فَفَزِعَ مِنْهُمْ ۖ قَالُوا لَا تَخَفْ ۖ خَصْمَانِ بَغَىٰ بَعْضُنَا عَلَىٰ بَعْضٍ فَاحْكُم بَيْنَنَا بِالْحَقِّ وَلَا تُشْطِطْ وَاهْدِنَا إِلَىٰ سَوَاءِ الصِّرَاطِ
verses.translation: When they entered upon David, so he feared them – they said, “Do not fear! We are two disputants, one of whom has wronged the other, therefore judge fairly between us and do not judge unjustly – and show us the right way.”

verses.content: إِنَّ هَـٰذَا أَخِي لَهُ تِسْعٌ وَتِسْعُونَ نَعْجَةً وَلِيَ نَعْجَةٌ وَاحِدَةٌ فَقَالَ أَكْفِلْنِيهَا وَعَزَّنِي فِي الْخِطَابِ
verses.translation: “This is my brother; he has ninety nine ewes and I have one ewe; and he now says ‘Give that one also to me’ – and he is very demanding in speech.”

verses.content: قَالَ لَقَدْ ظَلَمَكَ بِسُؤَالِ نَعْجَتِكَ إِلَىٰ نِعَاجِهِ ۖ وَإِنَّ كَثِيرًا مِّنَ الْخُلَطَاءِ لَيَبْغِي بَعْضُهُمْ عَلَىٰ بَعْضٍ إِلَّا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَعَمِلُوا الصَّالِحَاتِ وَقَلِيلٌ مَّا هُمْ ۗ وَظَنَّ دَاوُودُ أَنَّمَا فَتَنَّاهُ فَاسْتَغْفَرَ رَبَّهُ وَخَرَّ رَاكِعًا وَأَنَابَ ۩
verses.translation: Said Dawud, “He is indeed being unjust to you in that he demands to add your ewe to his ewes; and indeed most partners wrong one another, except those who believe and do good deeds – and they are very few!” Thereupon Dawud realised that We had tested him, so he sought forgiveness from his Lord, and fell prostrate and inclined (towards his Lord). (Command of Prostration # 10)

verses.content: فَغَفَرْنَا لَهُ ذَٰلِكَ ۖ وَإِنَّ لَهُ عِندَنَا لَزُلْفَىٰ وَحُسْنَ مَآبٍ
verses.translation: We therefore forgave him this; and indeed for him in Our presence are, surely, proximity and an excellent abode.

verses.content: يَا دَاوُودُ إِنَّا جَعَلْنَاكَ خَلِيفَةً فِي الْأَرْضِ فَاحْكُم بَيْنَ النَّاسِ بِالْحَقِّ وَلَا تَتَّبِعِ الْهَوَىٰ فَيُضِلَّكَ عَن سَبِيلِ اللَّهِ ۚ إِنَّ الَّذِينَ يَضِلُّونَ عَن سَبِيلِ اللَّهِ لَهُمْ عَذَابٌ شَدِيدٌ بِمَا نَسُوا يَوْمَ الْحِسَابِ
verses.translation: “O Dawud! We have indeed appointed you as a Viceroy in the earth, therefore judge between mankind with the truth, and do not follow desire for it will lead you astray from Allah’s path; indeed for those who stray away from Allah’s path is a severe punishment, because they forgot the Day of Reckoning.”

verses.content: وَمَا خَلَقْنَا السَّمَاءَ وَالْأَرْضَ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا بَاطِلًا ۚ ذَٰلِكَ ظَنُّ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا ۚ فَوَيْلٌ لِّلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا مِنَ النَّارِ
verses.translation: And We have not created the heaven and the earth and all that is between them without purpose; this is what the disbelievers assume; therefore ruin is for the disbelievers, by the fire.

verses.content: أَمْ نَجْعَلُ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَعَمِلُوا الصَّالِحَاتِ كَالْمُفْسِدِينَ فِي الْأَرْضِ أَمْ نَجْعَلُ الْمُتَّقِينَ كَالْفُجَّارِ
verses.translation: Shall We make those who believe and do good deeds equal to those who spread turmoil in the earth? Or shall We equate the pious with the disobedient?

verses.content: كِتَابٌ أَنزَلْنَاهُ إِلَيْكَ مُبَارَكٌ لِّيَدَّبَّرُوا آيَاتِهِ وَلِيَتَذَكَّرَ أُولُو الْأَلْبَابِ
verses.translation: This is a Book which We have sent down upon you, a blessed Book, for them to ponder upon its verses, and for men of intellect to accept advice.

verses.content: وَوَهَبْنَا لِدَاوُودَ سُلَيْمَانَ ۚ نِعْمَ الْعَبْدُ ۖ إِنَّهُ أَوَّابٌ
verses.translation: And We bestowed Sulaiman to Dawud; what an excellent bondman! He is indeed most inclined.

verses.content: إِذْ عُرِضَ عَلَيْهِ بِالْعَشِيِّ الصَّافِنَاتُ الْجِيَادُ
verses.translation: When fast footed steeds were presented to him at evening.

verses.content: فَقَالَ إِنِّي أَحْبَبْتُ حُبَّ الْخَيْرِ عَن ذِكْرِ رَبِّي حَتَّىٰ تَوَارَتْ بِالْحِجَابِ
verses.translation: Therefore Sulaiman said, “I cherish the love of these horses*, out of remembrance of my Lord”; he then ordered them to be raced until they vanished in a curtain out of sight. (To be used in holy war.)

verses.content: رُدُّوهَا عَلَيَّ ۖ فَطَفِقَ مَسْحًا بِالسُّوقِ وَالْأَعْنَاقِ
verses.translation: He then ordered, “Bring them back to me”; and he began caressing their shins and necks.

verses.content: وَلَقَدْ فَتَنَّا سُلَيْمَانَ وَأَلْقَيْنَا عَلَىٰ كُرْسِيِّهِ جَسَدًا ثُمَّ أَنَابَ
verses.translation: And We indeed tested Sulaiman, and placed a dead body on his throne – he therefore inclined towards His Lord.

verses.content: قَالَ رَبِّ اغْفِرْ لِي وَهَبْ لِي مُلْكًا لَّا يَنبَغِي لِأَحَدٍ مِّن بَعْدِي ۖ إِنَّكَ أَنتَ الْوَهَّابُ
verses.translation: He said, “My Lord! Forgive me and bestow upon me a kingdom, which shall not befit anyone after me; indeed only You are the Great Bestower.”

verses.content: فَسَخَّرْنَا لَهُ الرِّيحَ تَجْرِي بِأَمْرِهِ رُخَاءً حَيْثُ أَصَابَ
verses.translation: We therefore gave the wind under his control, moving steadily by his command wherever he wished.

verses.content: وَالشَّيَاطِينَ كُلَّ بَنَّاءٍ وَغَوَّاصٍ
verses.translation: And made the demons subservient to him, all builders and divers.

verses.content: وَآخَرِينَ مُقَرَّنِينَ فِي الْأَصْفَادِ
verses.translation: And other demons bound in chains.

verses.content: هَـٰذَا عَطَاؤُنَا فَامْنُنْ أَوْ أَمْسِكْ بِغَيْرِ حِسَابٍ
verses.translation: “This is Our bestowal – you may therefore bestow favours or withhold them – you will not be questioned.”

verses.content: وَإِنَّ لَهُ عِندَنَا لَزُلْفَىٰ وَحُسْنَ مَآبٍ
verses.translation: And indeed for him in Our presence are, surely, proximity and an excellent abode.

verses.content: وَاذْكُرْ عَبْدَنَا أَيُّوبَ إِذْ نَادَىٰ رَبَّهُ أَنِّي مَسَّنِيَ الشَّيْطَانُ بِنُصْبٍ وَعَذَابٍ
verses.translation: And remember Our bondman Ayyub (Job); when he cried out* to his Lord, “The devil has struck me with hardship and pain.” (After seven years of patience.)

verses.content: ارْكُضْ بِرِجْلِكَ ۖ هَـٰذَا مُغْتَسَلٌ بَارِدٌ وَشَرَابٌ
verses.translation: We said to him, “Strike the earth with your foot; this cool spring is for bathing and drinking.” (A spring of gushed forth when he struck the earth – this was a miracle.)

verses.content: وَوَهَبْنَا لَهُ أَهْلَهُ وَمِثْلَهُم مَّعَهُمْ رَحْمَةً مِّنَّا وَذِكْرَىٰ لِأُولِي الْأَلْبَابِ
verses.translation: And We bestowed his household to him and one more similar to it – as a mercy from Us, and as a remembrance for the people of intellect.

verses.content: وَخُذْ بِيَدِكَ ضِغْثًا فَاضْرِب بِّهِ وَلَا تَحْنَثْ ۗ إِنَّا وَجَدْنَاهُ صَابِرًا ۚ نِّعْمَ الْعَبْدُ ۖ إِنَّهُ أَوَّابٌ
verses.translation: And We said, “Take a broom in your hand and strike her with it, and do not break your vow”; We indeed found him patiently enduring; what an excellent bondman! He is indeed most inclined.

verses.content: وَاذْكُرْ عِبَادَنَا إِبْرَاهِيمَ وَإِسْحَاقَ وَيَعْقُوبَ أُولِي الْأَيْدِي وَالْأَبْصَارِ
verses.translation: And remember Our bondmen Ibrahim, and Ishaq, and Yaqub – the men of power and knowledge.

verses.content: إِنَّا أَخْلَصْنَاهُم بِخَالِصَةٍ ذِكْرَى الدَّارِ
verses.translation: We indeed gave them distinction with a genuine affair – the remembrance of the (everlasting) abode.

verses.content: وَإِنَّهُمْ عِندَنَا لَمِنَ الْمُصْطَفَيْنَ الْأَخْيَارِ
verses.translation: And in Our sight, they are indeed the chosen ones, the beloved.

verses.content: وَاذْكُرْ إِسْمَاعِيلَ وَالْيَسَعَ وَذَا الْكِفْلِ ۖ وَكُلٌّ مِّنَ الْأَخْيَارِ
verses.translation: And remember Ismail and Yasa’a (Elisha) and Zul-Kifl; and they are all excellent.

verses.content: هَـٰذَا ذِكْرٌ ۚ وَإِنَّ لِلْمُتَّقِينَ لَحُسْنَ مَآبٍ
verses.translation: This is an advice; and indeed for the pious is an excellent abode.

verses.content: جَنَّاتِ عَدْنٍ مُّفَتَّحَةً لَّهُمُ الْأَبْوَابُ
verses.translation: Everlasting Gardens – all its gates are open for them.

verses.content: مُتَّكِئِينَ فِيهَا يَدْعُونَ فِيهَا بِفَاكِهَةٍ كَثِيرَةٍ وَشَرَابٍ
verses.translation: Reclining on pillows, in it they ask for fruits and drinks in plenty.

verses.content: وَعِندَهُمْ قَاصِرَاتُ الطَّرْفِ أَتْرَابٌ
verses.translation: And with them are the pure spouses, who do not set gaze upon men except their husbands, of single age.

verses.content: هَـٰذَا مَا تُوعَدُونَ لِيَوْمِ الْحِسَابِ
verses.translation: This is the promise being given to you, for the Day of Reckoning.

verses.content: إِنَّ هَـٰذَا لَرِزْقُنَا مَا لَهُ مِن نَّفَادٍ
verses.translation: Indeed this is Our sustenance, which will never end.

verses.content: هَـٰذَا ۚ وَإِنَّ لِلطَّاغِينَ لَشَرَّ مَآبٍ
