verses.content: أَفَمَن كَانَ عَلَىٰ بَيِّنَةٍ مِّن رَّبِّهِ كَمَن زُيِّنَ لَهُ سُوءُ عَمَلِهِ وَاتَّبَعُوا أَهْوَاءَهُم
verses.translation: So will one who is upon on a clear proof from his Lord, ever be like any of those whose evil deeds are made to appear good to them and they follow their own desires?

verses.content: مَّثَلُ الْجَنَّةِ الَّتِي وُعِدَ الْمُتَّقُونَ ۖ فِيهَا أَنْهَارٌ مِّن مَّاءٍ غَيْرِ آسِنٍ وَأَنْهَارٌ مِّن لَّبَنٍ لَّمْ يَتَغَيَّرْ طَعْمُهُ وَأَنْهَارٌ مِّنْ خَمْرٍ لَّذَّةٍ لِّلشَّارِبِينَ وَأَنْهَارٌ مِّنْ عَسَلٍ مُّصَفًّى ۖ وَلَهُمْ فِيهَا مِن كُلِّ الثَّمَرَاتِ وَمَغْفِرَةٌ مِّن رَّبِّهِمْ ۖ كَمَنْ هُوَ خَالِدٌ فِي النَّارِ وَسُقُوا مَاءً حَمِيمًا فَقَطَّعَ أَمْعَاءَهُمْ
verses.translation: A description of the Garden which is promised to the pious; in it are rivers of water which shall never pollute; and rivers of milk the taste of which shall never change; and rivers of wine delicious to drink; and rivers of purified honey; and in it for them are fruits of all kinds, and the forgiveness of their Lord; so will such ever be equal to those who are to stay in the fire for ever and who will be given boiling water to drink so that it tears their guts apart?

verses.content: وَمِنْهُم مَّن يَسْتَمِعُ إِلَيْكَ حَتَّىٰ إِذَا خَرَجُوا مِنْ عِندِكَ قَالُوا لِلَّذِينَ أُوتُوا الْعِلْمَ مَاذَا قَالَ آنِفًا ۚ أُولَـٰئِكَ الَّذِينَ طَبَعَ اللَّهُ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِهِمْ وَاتَّبَعُوا أَهْوَاءَهُمْ
verses.translation: And among them are some who listen to what you say; until when they go away from you, they say to those who have been given knowledge, “What did he say now?”; they are those whose hearts Allah has sealed, and they follow their own desires.

verses.content: وَالَّذِينَ اهْتَدَوْا زَادَهُمْ هُدًى وَآتَاهُمْ تَقْوَاهُمْ
verses.translation: And those who attained the right path – Allah increases the guidance for them and bestows their piety to them.

verses.content: فَهَلْ يَنظُرُونَ إِلَّا السَّاعَةَ أَن تَأْتِيَهُم بَغْتَةً ۖ فَقَدْ جَاءَ أَشْرَاطُهَا ۚ فَأَنَّىٰ لَهُمْ إِذَا جَاءَتْهُمْ ذِكْرَاهُمْ
verses.translation: So what are they waiting for, except that the Last Day suddenly come upon them? For its signs have already appeared; so when it does come, of what use is their realising it?

verses.content: فَاعْلَمْ أَنَّهُ لَا إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّا اللَّهُ وَاسْتَغْفِرْ لِذَنبِكَ وَلِلْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَالْمُؤْمِنَاتِ ۗ وَاللَّهُ يَعْلَمُ مُتَقَلَّبَكُمْ وَمَثْوَاكُمْ
verses.translation: Therefore know (O dear Prophet Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him) that there is none worthy of worship except Allah, and seek the forgiveness of sins of your close ones and for the common believing men and women; and Allah knows your movements during the day and your resting during the night.

verses.content: وَيَقُولُ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا لَوْلَا نُزِّلَتْ سُورَةٌ ۖ فَإِذَا أُنزِلَتْ سُورَةٌ مُّحْكَمَةٌ وَذُكِرَ فِيهَا الْقِتَالُ ۙ رَأَيْتَ الَّذِينَ فِي قُلُوبِهِم مَّرَضٌ يَنظُرُونَ إِلَيْكَ نَظَرَ الْمَغْشِيِّ عَلَيْهِ مِنَ الْمَوْتِ ۖ فَأَوْلَىٰ لَهُمْ
verses.translation: And the Muslims say, “Why was not a chapter sent down?” So when a positive chapter was sent down, and war was commanded in it, you will see those in whose hearts is a disease looking at you with the dazed looks of a dying man; so it would be better for them. –

verses.content: طَاعَةٌ وَقَوْلٌ مَّعْرُوفٌ ۚ فَإِذَا عَزَمَ الْأَمْرُ فَلَوْ صَدَقُوا اللَّهَ لَكَانَ خَيْرًا لَّهُمْ
verses.translation: To obey and speak good; so when the manifest command came – it would have been better for them if they had remained faithful to Allah.

verses.content: فَهَلْ عَسَيْتُمْ إِن تَوَلَّيْتُمْ أَن تُفْسِدُوا فِي الْأَرْضِ وَتُقَطِّعُوا أَرْحَامَكُمْ
verses.translation: So do you* portray that if you get governance, you would spread chaos in the land and sever your relations? (* The hypocrites)

verses.content: أُولَـٰئِكَ الَّذِينَ لَعَنَهُمُ اللَّهُ فَأَصَمَّهُمْ وَأَعْمَىٰ أَبْصَارَهُمْ
verses.translation: It is these whom Allah has cursed, so He made them deaf to the Truth and blinded their eyes.

verses.content: أَفَلَا يَتَدَبَّرُونَ الْقُرْآنَ أَمْ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبٍ أَقْفَالُهَا
verses.translation: So do they not ponder the Qur’an deeply, or are there locks on some of their hearts?

verses.content: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ ارْتَدُّوا عَلَىٰ أَدْبَارِهِم مِّن بَعْدِ مَا تَبَيَّنَ لَهُمُ الْهُدَى ۙ الشَّيْطَانُ سَوَّلَ لَهُمْ وَأَمْلَىٰ لَهُمْ
verses.translation: Indeed those who turn back after the guidance had become clear to them – Satan has deceived them; and made them optimistic of living for ages.

verses.content: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُمْ قَالُوا لِلَّذِينَ كَرِهُوا مَا نَزَّلَ اللَّهُ سَنُطِيعُكُمْ فِي بَعْضِ الْأَمْرِ ۖ وَاللَّهُ يَعْلَمُ إِسْرَارَهُمْ
verses.translation: This is because they said to those who dislike what Allah has sent down, “We will obey you regarding one matter*”; and Allah knows their secrets. (* To fight against the Holy Prophet).

verses.content: فَكَيْفَ إِذَا تَوَفَّتْهُمُ الْمَلَائِكَةُ يَضْرِبُونَ وُجُوهَهُمْ وَأَدْبَارَهُمْ
verses.translation: So how (dreadful) will it be when the angels remove their souls, striking at their faces and their backs!

verses.content: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُمُ اتَّبَعُوا مَا أَسْخَطَ اللَّهَ وَكَرِهُوا رِضْوَانَهُ فَأَحْبَطَ أَعْمَالَهُمْ
verses.translation: This is because they followed the matter which displeases Allah, and they disliked what pleases Him – He therefore squandered away all their deeds.

verses.content: أَمْ حَسِبَ الَّذِينَ فِي قُلُوبِهِم مَّرَضٌ أَن لَّن يُخْرِجَ اللَّهُ أَضْغَانَهُمْ
verses.translation: What! Do they, in whose hearts is a disease, fancy that Allah will not expose concealed enmities?

verses.content: وَلَوْ نَشَاءُ لَأَرَيْنَاكَهُمْ فَلَعَرَفْتَهُم بِسِيمَاهُمْ ۚ وَلَتَعْرِفَنَّهُمْ فِي لَحْنِ الْقَوْلِ ۚ وَاللَّهُ يَعْلَمُ أَعْمَالَكُمْ
verses.translation: And if We will, We can show them to you so that you may recognise them by their faces; and you will surely recognise them by the way they talk; and Allah knows your deeds.

verses.content: وَلَنَبْلُوَنَّكُمْ حَتَّىٰ نَعْلَمَ الْمُجَاهِدِينَ مِنكُمْ وَالصَّابِرِينَ وَنَبْلُوَ أَخْبَارَكُمْ
verses.translation: And We shall indeed test you until We make known the warriors and the steadfast among you – and to test your proclamations.

verses.content: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا وَصَدُّوا عَن سَبِيلِ اللَّهِ وَشَاقُّوا الرَّسُولَ مِن بَعْدِ مَا تَبَيَّنَ لَهُمُ الْهُدَىٰ لَن يَضُرُّوا اللَّهَ شَيْئًا وَسَيُحْبِطُ أَعْمَالَهُمْ
verses.translation: Indeed those who disbelieved and prevented others from Allah’s way, and opposed the Noble Messenger after the guidance had become clear to them – they cannot harm Allah in the least; and soon He will squander away their deeds.

verses.content: يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا أَطِيعُوا اللَّهَ وَأَطِيعُوا الرَّسُولَ وَلَا تُبْطِلُوا أَعْمَالَكُمْ
verses.translation: O People who Believe! Obey Allah and obey the Noble Messenger, and do not render your deeds void.

verses.content: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا وَصَدُّوا عَن سَبِيلِ اللَّهِ ثُمَّ مَاتُوا وَهُمْ كُفَّارٌ فَلَن يَغْفِرَ اللَّهُ لَهُمْ
verses.translation: Indeed those who disbelieved and prevented others from Allah’s way, and then died as disbelievers – so Allah will never forgive them.

verses.content: فَلَا تَهِنُوا وَتَدْعُوا إِلَى السَّلْمِ وَأَنتُمُ الْأَعْلَوْنَ وَاللَّهُ مَعَكُمْ وَلَن يَتِرَكُمْ أَعْمَالَكُمْ
verses.translation: Therefore do not relax, nor call towards truce by yourself; and it is you who will dominate; and Allah is with you, and He will never cause a loss in your deeds.

verses.content: إِنَّمَا الْحَيَاةُ الدُّنْيَا لَعِبٌ وَلَهْوٌ ۚ وَإِن تُؤْمِنُوا وَتَتَّقُوا يُؤْتِكُمْ أُجُورَكُمْ وَلَا يَسْأَلْكُمْ أَمْوَالَكُمْ
verses.translation: The worldly life is just a sport and pastime; and if you accept faith and be pious, He will bestow your rewards to you, and not at all ask you for your wealth.

verses.content: إِن يَسْأَلْكُمُوهَا فَيُحْفِكُمْ تَبْخَلُوا وَيُخْرِجْ أَضْغَانَكُمْ
verses.translation: Were He to ask it from you, and ask in plenty, you would be miserly, and the miserliness would expose the filth within your hearts.

verses.content: هَا أَنتُمْ هَـٰؤُلَاءِ تُدْعَوْنَ لِتُنفِقُوا فِي سَبِيلِ اللَّهِ فَمِنكُم مَّن يَبْخَلُ ۖ وَمَن يَبْخَلْ فَإِنَّمَا يَبْخَلُ عَن نَّفْسِهِ ۚ وَاللَّهُ الْغَنِيُّ وَأَنتُمُ الْفُقَرَاءُ ۚ وَإِن تَتَوَلَّوْا يَسْتَبْدِلْ قَوْمًا غَيْرَكُمْ ثُمَّ لَا يَكُونُوا أَمْثَالَكُم
verses.translation: Yes, undoubtedly it is you who are being called, that you may spend in Allah’s way; so some among you act miserly; and whoever is miserly, is being a miser upon himself; and Allah is the Independent (Wealthy – Not requiring anything), whereas you all are needy; and if you renege, He will replace you with other people – and they will not be like you.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ إِنَّا فَتَحْنَا لَكَ فَتْحًا مُّبِينًا
verses.translation: We have indeed, for your sake (O dear Prophet Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him), bestowed a clear victory.

verses.content: لِّيَغْفِرَ لَكَ اللَّهُ مَا تَقَدَّمَ مِن ذَنبِكَ وَمَا تَأَخَّرَ وَيُتِمَّ نِعْمَتَهُ عَلَيْكَ وَيَهْدِيَكَ صِرَاطًا مُّسْتَقِيمًا
verses.translation: So that Allah may forgive, for your sake, the sins of those before you and those after you, and complete His favours upon you, and to show you the Straight Path.

verses.content: وَيَنصُرَكَ اللَّهُ نَصْرًا عَزِيزًا
verses.translation: And so that Allah may provide you a great help.

verses.content: هُوَ الَّذِي أَنزَلَ السَّكِينَةَ فِي قُلُوبِ الْمُؤْمِنِينَ لِيَزْدَادُوا إِيمَانًا مَّعَ إِيمَانِهِمْ ۗ وَلِلَّهِ جُنُودُ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ ۚ وَكَانَ اللَّهُ عَلِيمًا حَكِيمًا
verses.translation: It is He Who instilled peace in the hearts of the believers, so that it may increase their strength of conviction; and to Allah only belong the armies of the heavens and the earth; and Allah is All Knowing, Wise.

verses.content: لِّيُدْخِلَ الْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَالْمُؤْمِنَاتِ جَنَّاتٍ تَجْرِي مِن تَحْتِهَا الْأَنْهَارُ خَالِدِينَ فِيهَا وَيُكَفِّرَ عَنْهُمْ سَيِّئَاتِهِمْ ۚ وَكَانَ ذَٰلِكَ عِندَ اللَّهِ فَوْزًا عَظِيمًا
verses.translation: In order to admit the believing men and believing women into Gardens beneath which rivers flow, in which they will abide, and to relieve them of their misdeeds; and this, in Allah’s sight, is the greatest success.

verses.content: وَيُعَذِّبَ الْمُنَافِقِينَ وَالْمُنَافِقَاتِ وَالْمُشْرِكِينَ وَالْمُشْرِكَاتِ الظَّانِّينَ بِاللَّهِ ظَنَّ السَّوْءِ ۚ عَلَيْهِمْ دَائِرَةُ السَّوْءِ ۖ وَغَضِبَ اللَّهُ عَلَيْهِمْ وَلَعَنَهُمْ وَأَعَدَّ لَهُمْ جَهَنَّمَ ۖ وَسَاءَتْ مَصِيرًا
verses.translation: And to punish the hypocrite men and hypocrite women, and the polytheist men and polytheist women, who think evilly about Allah; upon them only is the evil cycle of misfortune; and Allah has wreaked anger upon them, and has cursed them, and has prepared hell for them; and what an evil destination.

verses.content: وَلِلَّهِ جُنُودُ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ ۚ وَكَانَ اللَّهُ عَزِيزًا حَكِيمًا
verses.translation: And to Allah only belong the armies of the heavens and the earth; and Allah is Most Honourable, Wise.

verses.content: إِنَّا أَرْسَلْنَاكَ شَاهِدًا وَمُبَشِّرًا وَنَذِيرًا
verses.translation: We have indeed sent you (O dear Prophet Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him) as a present witness and a Herald of glad tidings and warnings. (The Holy Prophet is a witness from Allah.)

verses.content: لِّتُؤْمِنُوا بِاللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِ وَتُعَزِّرُوهُ وَتُوَقِّرُوهُ وَتُسَبِّحُوهُ بُكْرَةً وَأَصِيلًا
verses.translation: In order that you, O people, may accept faith in Allah and His Noble Messenger, and honour and revere the Noble Messenger; and may say the Purity of Allah, morning and evening. (To honour the Holy Prophet – peace and blessings be upon him – is part of faith. To disrespect him is blasphemy.)

verses.content: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ يُبَايِعُونَكَ إِنَّمَا يُبَايِعُونَ اللَّهَ يَدُ اللَّهِ فَوْقَ أَيْدِيهِمْ ۚ فَمَن نَّكَثَ فَإِنَّمَا يَنكُثُ عَلَىٰ نَفْسِهِ ۖ وَمَنْ أَوْفَىٰ بِمَا عَاهَدَ عَلَيْهُ اللَّهَ فَسَيُؤْتِيهِ أَجْرًا عَظِيمًا
verses.translation: Those who swear allegiance to you (O dear Prophet Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him), do indeed in fact swear allegiance to Allah; Allah's Hand* of Power is above their hands; so whoever breaches his oath, has breached his own greater promise; and whoever fulfils the covenant he has with Allah – so very soon Allah will bestow upon him a great reward. (Used as a metaphor.)

verses.content: سَيَقُولُ لَكَ الْمُخَلَّفُونَ مِنَ الْأَعْرَابِ شَغَلَتْنَا أَمْوَالُنَا وَأَهْلُونَا فَاسْتَغْفِرْ لَنَا ۚ يَقُولُونَ بِأَلْسِنَتِهِم مَّا لَيْسَ فِي قُلُوبِهِمْ ۚ قُلْ فَمَن يَمْلِكُ لَكُم مِّنَ اللَّهِ شَيْئًا إِنْ أَرَادَ بِكُمْ ضَرًّا أَوْ أَرَادَ بِكُمْ نَفْعًا ۚ بَلْ كَانَ اللَّهُ بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ خَبِيرًا
verses.translation: The ignorant ones who had stayed behind will now say to you, “Our wealth and our families prevented us from going by keeping us pre-occupied, therefore seek forgiveness for us”; they utter with their tongues what is not in their hearts; say, “So does anyone have any control over you against Allah, if He wills to harm you or provide you benefit? In fact Allah is Aware of what you do.”

verses.content: بَلْ ظَنَنتُمْ أَن لَّن يَنقَلِبَ الرَّسُولُ وَالْمُؤْمِنُونَ إِلَىٰ أَهْلِيهِمْ أَبَدًا وَزُيِّنَ ذَٰلِكَ فِي قُلُوبِكُمْ وَظَنَنتُمْ ظَنَّ السَّوْءِ وَكُنتُمْ قَوْمًا بُورًا
verses.translation: “Rather you had assumed that the Noble Messenger and the Muslims will never return to their homes, and you thought this as good within your hearts, whereas you had thought evilly; and you were a people about to be ruined.”

verses.content: وَمَن لَّمْ يُؤْمِن بِاللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِ فَإِنَّا أَعْتَدْنَا لِلْكَافِرِينَ سَعِيرًا
verses.translation: And whoever does not accept faith in Allah and His Noble Messenger – We have indeed kept prepared a blazing fire for disbelievers.

verses.content: وَلِلَّهِ مُلْكُ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ ۚ يَغْفِرُ لِمَن يَشَاءُ وَيُعَذِّبُ مَن يَشَاءُ ۚ وَكَانَ اللَّهُ غَفُورًا رَّحِيمًا
verses.translation: And for Allah only is the kingship of the heavens and the earth; He may forgive whomever He wills, and punish whomever He wills; and Allah is Oft Forgiving, Most Merciful.

verses.content: سَيَقُولُ الْمُخَلَّفُونَ إِذَا انطَلَقْتُمْ إِلَىٰ مَغَانِمَ لِتَأْخُذُوهَا ذَرُونَا نَتَّبِعْكُمْ ۖ يُرِيدُونَ أَن يُبَدِّلُوا كَلَامَ اللَّهِ ۚ قُل لَّن تَتَّبِعُونَا كَذَٰلِكُمْ قَالَ اللَّهُ مِن قَبْلُ ۖ فَسَيَقُولُونَ بَلْ تَحْسُدُونَنَا ۚ بَلْ كَانُوا لَا يَفْقَهُونَ إِلَّا قَلِيلًا
verses.translation: Those who had stayed behind will now say, “When you go to receive the war booty, let us also go with you”; they wish to change the Words of Allah; say “You shall never come with us – this is already decreed by Allah”; so they will now say, “But rather you envy us”; in fact they never understood except a little.

verses.content: قُل لِّلْمُخَلَّفِينَ مِنَ الْأَعْرَابِ سَتُدْعَوْنَ إِلَىٰ قَوْمٍ أُولِي بَأْسٍ شَدِيدٍ تُقَاتِلُونَهُمْ أَوْ يُسْلِمُونَ ۖ فَإِن تُطِيعُوا يُؤْتِكُمُ اللَّهُ أَجْرًا حَسَنًا ۖ وَإِن تَتَوَلَّوْا كَمَا تَوَلَّيْتُم مِّن قَبْلُ يُعَذِّبْكُمْ عَذَابًا أَلِيمًا
verses.translation: Say to the ignorant who stayed behind, “You will soon be called against a nation of great military strength – to fight against them or that they become Muslims; so if you obey, Allah will give you an excellent reward; and if you turn away, the way you had turned away before, He will mete out a painful punishment to you.”

verses.content: لَّيْسَ عَلَى الْأَعْمَىٰ حَرَجٌ وَلَا عَلَى الْأَعْرَجِ حَرَجٌ وَلَا عَلَى الْمَرِيضِ حَرَجٌ ۗ وَمَن يُطِعِ اللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُ يُدْخِلْهُ جَنَّاتٍ تَجْرِي مِن تَحْتِهَا الْأَنْهَارُ ۖ وَمَن يَتَوَلَّ يُعَذِّبْهُ عَذَابًا أَلِيمًا
verses.translation: There is no reproach upon the blind, nor reproach against the lame, nor reproach upon the sick; and whoever obeys Allah and His Noble Messenger – Allah will admit him into Gardens beneath which rivers flow; and whoever turns away – He will mete out a painful punishment to him.

verses.content: لَّقَدْ رَضِيَ اللَّهُ عَنِ الْمُؤْمِنِينَ إِذْ يُبَايِعُونَكَ تَحْتَ الشَّجَرَةِ فَعَلِمَ مَا فِي قُلُوبِهِمْ فَأَنزَلَ السَّكِينَةَ عَلَيْهِمْ وَأَثَابَهُمْ فَتْحًا قَرِيبًا
verses.translation: Indeed Allah was truly pleased with the believers when they swore allegiance to you beneath the tree – so He knew what was in their hearts – He therefore sent down peace upon them, and rewarded them with an imminent victory.

verses.content: وَمَغَانِمَ كَثِيرَةً يَأْخُذُونَهَا ۗ وَكَانَ اللَّهُ عَزِيزًا حَكِيمًا
verses.translation: And plenty of war booty, to take; and Allah is Most Honourable, Wise.

verses.content: وَعَدَكُمُ اللَّهُ مَغَانِمَ كَثِيرَةً تَأْخُذُونَهَا فَعَجَّلَ لَكُمْ هَـٰذِهِ وَكَفَّ أَيْدِيَ النَّاسِ عَنكُمْ وَلِتَكُونَ آيَةً لِّلْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَيَهْدِيَكُمْ صِرَاطًا مُّسْتَقِيمًا
verses.translation: Allah has promised you plenty of booty which you will take, and has bestowed this to you quickly, and restrained peoples’ hands from you; and in order that it may be a sign for the believers, and to guide you on the Straight Path.

verses.content: وَأُخْرَىٰ لَمْ تَقْدِرُوا عَلَيْهَا قَدْ أَحَاطَ اللَّهُ بِهَا ۚ وَكَانَ اللَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدِيرًا
verses.translation: And one more, not within your capacity, is within Allah’s hold; and Allah is Able to do all things.

verses.content: وَلَوْ قَاتَلَكُمُ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا لَوَلَّوُا الْأَدْبَارَ ثُمَّ لَا يَجِدُونَ وَلِيًّا وَلَا نَصِيرًا
verses.translation: And if the disbelievers were to fight you, they will turn away and flee, and then they will not find any supporter nor any aide.

verses.content: سُنَّةَ اللَّهِ الَّتِي قَدْ خَلَتْ مِن قَبْلُ ۖ وَلَن تَجِدَ لِسُنَّةِ اللَّهِ تَبْدِيلًا
verses.translation: The tradition of Allah, ongoing since before; and you will not find the tradition of Allah changing.

verses.content: وَهُوَ الَّذِي كَفَّ أَيْدِيَهُمْ عَنكُمْ وَأَيْدِيَكُمْ عَنْهُم بِبَطْنِ مَكَّةَ مِن بَعْدِ أَنْ أَظْفَرَكُمْ عَلَيْهِمْ ۚ وَكَانَ اللَّهُ بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ بَصِيرًا
verses.translation: And it is He Who restrained their hands from you, and your hands from them in the valley of Mecca, after having given you control over them; and Allah sees all what you do.

verses.content: هُمُ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا وَصَدُّوكُمْ عَنِ الْمَسْجِدِ الْحَرَامِ وَالْهَدْيَ مَعْكُوفًا أَن يَبْلُغَ مَحِلَّهُ ۚ وَلَوْلَا رِجَالٌ مُّؤْمِنُونَ وَنِسَاءٌ مُّؤْمِنَاتٌ لَّمْ تَعْلَمُوهُمْ أَن تَطَئُوهُمْ فَتُصِيبَكُم مِّنْهُم مَّعَرَّةٌ بِغَيْرِ عِلْمٍ ۖ لِّيُدْخِلَ اللَّهُ فِي رَحْمَتِهِ مَن يَشَاءُ ۚ لَوْ تَزَيَّلُوا لَعَذَّبْنَا الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا مِنْهُمْ عَذَابًا أَلِيمًا
verses.translation: It was these who disbelieved and prevented you from the Sacred Mosque, and stopped the sacrificial animals from reaching their place; and were it not for some Muslim men and Muslim women, whom you do not know – lest you may crush them and unintentionally incur some violation due to them – Allah would have permitted you to slay them; this relief for them, is so that Allah may admit into His mercy whomever He wills; and had they been separated, We would have indeed punished the disbelievers among them with a painful punishment.

verses.content: إِذْ جَعَلَ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا فِي قُلُوبِهِمُ الْحَمِيَّةَ حَمِيَّةَ الْجَاهِلِيَّةِ فَأَنزَلَ اللَّهُ سَكِينَتَهُ عَلَىٰ رَسُولِهِ وَعَلَى الْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَأَلْزَمَهُمْ كَلِمَةَ التَّقْوَىٰ وَكَانُوا أَحَقَّ بِهَا وَأَهْلَهَا ۚ وَكَانَ اللَّهُ بِكُلِّ شَيْءٍ عَلِيمًا
verses.translation: Whereas the disbelievers had set up in their hearts an obstinacy – the same obstinacy of the days of ignorance – so Allah sent down His solace upon His Noble Messenger and upon the believers, and decreed upon them the words of piety, and they were more deserving and suitable for it; and Allah is the All Knowing.

verses.content: لَّقَدْ صَدَقَ اللَّهُ رَسُولَهُ الرُّؤْيَا بِالْحَقِّ ۖ لَتَدْخُلُنَّ الْمَسْجِدَ الْحَرَامَ إِن شَاءَ اللَّهُ آمِنِينَ مُحَلِّقِينَ رُءُوسَكُمْ وَمُقَصِّرِينَ لَا تَخَافُونَ ۖ فَعَلِمَ مَا لَمْ تَعْلَمُوا فَجَعَلَ مِن دُونِ ذَٰلِكَ فَتْحًا قَرِيبًا
verses.translation: Allah has indeed made the truthful dream of His Noble Messenger, come true; indeed you will all enter the Sacred Mosque, if Allah wills, in safety – with your heads shaven or hair cut short – without fear; so He knows what you do not know, and has therefore ordained another imminent victory before this.

verses.content: هُوَ الَّذِي أَرْسَلَ رَسُولَهُ بِالْهُدَىٰ وَدِينِ الْحَقِّ لِيُظْهِرَهُ عَلَى الدِّينِ كُلِّهِ ۚ وَكَفَىٰ بِاللَّهِ شَهِيدًا
verses.translation: It is He Who has sent His Noble Messenger with the guidance and the true religion, in order to make it prevail over all other religions; and Allah is sufficient as a Witness. (The Holy Prophet is a light from Allah.)

verses.content: مُّحَمَّدٌ رَّسُولُ اللَّهِ ۚ وَالَّذِينَ مَعَهُ أَشِدَّاءُ عَلَى الْكُفَّارِ رُحَمَاءُ بَيْنَهُمْ ۖ تَرَاهُمْ رُكَّعًا سُجَّدًا يَبْتَغُونَ فَضْلًا مِّنَ اللَّهِ وَرِضْوَانًا ۖ سِيمَاهُمْ فِي وُجُوهِهِم مِّنْ أَثَرِ السُّجُودِ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ مَثَلُهُمْ فِي التَّوْرَاةِ ۚ وَمَثَلُهُمْ فِي الْإِنجِيلِ كَزَرْعٍ أَخْرَجَ شَطْأَهُ فَآزَرَهُ فَاسْتَغْلَظَ فَاسْتَوَىٰ عَلَىٰ سُوقِهِ يُعْجِبُ الزُّرَّاعَ لِيَغِيظَ بِهِمُ الْكُفَّارَ ۗ وَعَدَ اللَّهُ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَعَمِلُوا الصَّالِحَاتِ مِنْهُم مَّغْفِرَةً وَأَجْرًا عَظِيمًا
verses.translation: Mohammed (peace and blessings be upon him) is the Noble Messenger of Allah; and his companions are stern with the disbelievers and merciful among themselves – you will see them bowing and falling in prostration, seeking Allah’s munificence and His pleasure; their signs are on their faces, from the effects of their prostration; this trait of theirs is mentioned in the Taurat; and their trait is mentioned in the Injeel; like a cultivation that sprouted its shoot, then strengthened it, then thickened and then stood firm upon its stem, pleasing the farmer – in order to enrage the disbelievers with them; Allah has promised forgiveness and a great reward to those among them who have faith and do good deeds.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا لَا تُقَدِّمُوا بَيْنَ يَدَيِ اللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِ ۖ وَاتَّقُوا اللَّهَ ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ سَمِيعٌ عَلِيمٌ
verses.translation: O People who Believe! Do not advance ahead of Allah and His Noble Messenger, and fear Allah; indeed Allah is All Hearing, All Knowing.

verses.content: يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا لَا تَرْفَعُوا أَصْوَاتَكُمْ فَوْقَ صَوْتِ النَّبِيِّ وَلَا تَجْهَرُوا لَهُ بِالْقَوْلِ كَجَهْرِ بَعْضِكُمْ لِبَعْضٍ أَن تَحْبَطَ أَعْمَالُكُمْ وَأَنتُمْ لَا تَشْعُرُونَ
verses.translation: O People who Believe! Do not raise your voices higher than the voice of the Prophet, nor speak to him loudly the way you shout to one another, lest your deeds go to waste whilst you are unaware. (Faith will go waste due to the slightest disrespect towards the Holy Prophet – peace and blessings be upon him. To honour him is part of faith. To disrespect him is blasphemy.)

verses.content: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ يَغُضُّونَ أَصْوَاتَهُمْ عِندَ رَسُولِ اللَّهِ أُولَـٰئِكَ الَّذِينَ امْتَحَنَ اللَّهُ قُلُوبَهُمْ لِلتَّقْوَىٰ ۚ لَهُم مَّغْفِرَةٌ وَأَجْرٌ عَظِيمٌ
verses.translation: Indeed those who suppress their voices in the presence of Allah’s Noble Messenger, are the ones whose hearts Allah has tested for piety; for them is forgiveness, and a great reward.

verses.content: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ يُنَادُونَكَ مِن وَرَاءِ الْحُجُرَاتِ أَكْثَرُهُمْ لَا يَعْقِلُونَ
verses.translation: Indeed most of those who call you from outside the chambers do not have sense.

verses.content: وَلَوْ أَنَّهُمْ صَبَرُوا حَتَّىٰ تَخْرُجَ إِلَيْهِمْ لَكَانَ خَيْرًا لَّهُمْ ۚ وَاللَّهُ غَفُورٌ رَّحِيمٌ
verses.translation: And had they been patient until you yourself came out to them, it would be better for them; and Allah is Oft Forgiving, Most Merciful.

verses.content: يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا إِن جَاءَكُمْ فَاسِقٌ بِنَبَإٍ فَتَبَيَّنُوا أَن تُصِيبُوا قَوْمًا بِجَهَالَةٍ فَتُصْبِحُوا عَلَىٰ مَا فَعَلْتُمْ نَادِمِينَ
verses.translation: O People who Believe! If any miscreant brings you some tidings, verify it, lest you unknowingly cause suffering to some people, and then remain repenting for what you did.

verses.content: وَاعْلَمُوا أَنَّ فِيكُمْ رَسُولَ اللَّهِ ۚ لَوْ يُطِيعُكُمْ فِي كَثِيرٍ مِّنَ الْأَمْرِ لَعَنِتُّمْ وَلَـٰكِنَّ اللَّهَ حَبَّبَ إِلَيْكُمُ الْإِيمَانَ وَزَيَّنَهُ فِي قُلُوبِكُمْ وَكَرَّهَ إِلَيْكُمُ الْكُفْرَ وَالْفُسُوقَ وَالْعِصْيَانَ ۚ أُولَـٰئِكَ هُمُ الرَّاشِدُونَ
verses.translation: And know that Allah’s Noble Messenger is among you; in most of the affairs, were he to listen to you, you would surely fall into hardship, but Allah has made faith dear to you and has instilled it in your hearts, and has made disbelief and rebellion and disobedience abhorred by you; it is people like these who are on guidance.

verses.content: فَضْلًا مِّنَ اللَّهِ وَنِعْمَةً ۚ وَاللَّهُ عَلِيمٌ حَكِيمٌ
verses.translation: The munificence and favour of Allah; and Allah is All Knowing, Wise.

verses.content: وَإِن طَائِفَتَانِ مِنَ الْمُؤْمِنِينَ اقْتَتَلُوا فَأَصْلِحُوا بَيْنَهُمَا ۖ فَإِن بَغَتْ إِحْدَاهُمَا عَلَى الْأُخْرَىٰ فَقَاتِلُوا الَّتِي تَبْغِي حَتَّىٰ تَفِيءَ إِلَىٰ أَمْرِ اللَّهِ ۚ فَإِن فَاءَتْ فَأَصْلِحُوا بَيْنَهُمَا بِالْعَدْلِ وَأَقْسِطُوا ۖ إِنَّ اللَّهَ يُحِبُّ الْمُقْسِطِينَ
verses.translation: And if two groups of Muslims fight against each other, reconcile them; and if one of them oppresses the other, fight against the oppressor till it returns to the command of Allah; then if it returns, reconcile between them with justice, and be fair; indeed Allah loves the equitable.

verses.content: إِنَّمَا الْمُؤْمِنُونَ إِخْوَةٌ فَأَصْلِحُوا بَيْنَ أَخَوَيْكُمْ ۚ وَاتَّقُوا اللَّهَ لَعَلَّكُمْ تُرْحَمُونَ
verses.translation: The Muslims are brothers to each other, therefore make peace between your two brothers and fear Allah, so that you may gain mercy. (The entire Muslim nation is a single brotherhood, without any distinction for caste, creed or colour.)

verses.content: يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا لَا يَسْخَرْ قَوْمٌ مِّن قَوْمٍ عَسَىٰ أَن يَكُونُوا خَيْرًا مِّنْهُمْ وَلَا نِسَاءٌ مِّن نِّسَاءٍ عَسَىٰ أَن يَكُنَّ خَيْرًا مِّنْهُنَّ ۖ وَلَا تَلْمِزُوا أَنفُسَكُمْ وَلَا تَنَابَزُوا بِالْأَلْقَابِ ۖ بِئْسَ الِاسْمُ الْفُسُوقُ بَعْدَ الْإِيمَانِ ۚ وَمَن لَّمْ يَتُبْ فَأُولَـٰئِكَ هُمُ الظَّالِمُونَ
verses.translation: O People who Believe! Men must not ridicule other men for it could be that the ridiculed are better than the mockers, nor must the women ridicule other women for the ridiculed women may be better than the mockers; and do not insult one another, nor assign evil nicknames; how base it is to be called a sinner after being a Muslim! And whoever does not repent – then it is they who are unjust.

verses.content: يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا اجْتَنِبُوا كَثِيرًا مِّنَ الظَّنِّ إِنَّ بَعْضَ الظَّنِّ إِثْمٌ ۖ وَلَا تَجَسَّسُوا وَلَا يَغْتَب بَّعْضُكُم بَعْضًا ۚ أَيُحِبُّ أَحَدُكُمْ أَن يَأْكُلَ لَحْمَ أَخِيهِ مَيْتًا فَكَرِهْتُمُوهُ ۚ وَاتَّقُوا اللَّهَ ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ تَوَّابٌ رَّحِيمٌ
verses.translation: O People who Believe! Avoid excessive assumptions; indeed assumption sometimes becomes a sin, and do not seek faults, and do not slander one another; would any one among you like to eat the flesh of his dead brother? So you will hate that! And fear Allah; indeed Allah is Most Acceptor of Repentance, Most Merciful.

verses.content: يَا أَيُّهَا النَّاسُ إِنَّا خَلَقْنَاكُم مِّن ذَكَرٍ وَأُنثَىٰ وَجَعَلْنَاكُمْ شُعُوبًا وَقَبَائِلَ لِتَعَارَفُوا ۚ إِنَّ أَكْرَمَكُمْ عِندَ اللَّهِ أَتْقَاكُمْ ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ عَلِيمٌ خَبِيرٌ
verses.translation: O mankind! We have indeed created you from one man and one woman, and have made you into various nations and tribes so that you may know one another; indeed the more honourable among you, in the sight of Allah, is one who is more pious among you; indeed Allah is All Knowing, All Aware. (Piety is the basis of honour in Allah’s sight.)

verses.content: قَالَتِ الْأَعْرَابُ آمَنَّا ۖ قُل لَّمْ تُؤْمِنُوا وَلَـٰكِن قُولُوا أَسْلَمْنَا وَلَمَّا يَدْخُلِ الْإِيمَانُ فِي قُلُوبِكُمْ ۖ وَإِن تُطِيعُوا اللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُ لَا يَلِتْكُم مِّنْ أَعْمَالِكُمْ شَيْئًا ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ غَفُورٌ رَّحِيمٌ
verses.translation: The ignorant said, “We have accepted faith”; say, (O dear Prophet Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him), “You have surely not accepted faith, but you should say ‘We have submitted’, for faith has not yet entered your hearts; and if you obey* Allah and His Noble Messenger, He will not reduce the reward of any of your deeds; indeed Allah is Oft Forgiving, Most Merciful.” (* By accepting faith and then obeying the commands).

verses.content: إِنَّمَا الْمُؤْمِنُونَ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا بِاللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِ ثُمَّ لَمْ يَرْتَابُوا وَجَاهَدُوا بِأَمْوَالِهِمْ وَأَنفُسِهِمْ فِي سَبِيلِ اللَّهِ ۚ أُولَـٰئِكَ هُمُ الصَّادِقُونَ
verses.translation: The true believers are only those who accepted faith in Allah and His Noble Messenger and then did not have any doubt, and fought with their wealth and their lives in Allah’s way; it is they who are the truthful.

verses.content: قُلْ أَتُعَلِّمُونَ اللَّهَ بِدِينِكُمْ وَاللَّهُ يَعْلَمُ مَا فِي السَّمَاوَاتِ وَمَا فِي الْأَرْضِ ۚ وَاللَّهُ بِكُلِّ شَيْءٍ عَلِيمٌ
verses.translation: Proclaim (O dear Prophet Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him), “Are you teaching Allah your own religion? Whereas Allah knows all whatever is in the heavens and all whatever is in the earth; and Allah knows all things.”

verses.content: يَمُنُّونَ عَلَيْكَ أَنْ أَسْلَمُوا ۖ قُل لَّا تَمُنُّوا عَلَيَّ إِسْلَامَكُم ۖ بَلِ اللَّهُ يَمُنُّ عَلَيْكُمْ أَنْ هَدَاكُمْ لِلْإِيمَانِ إِن كُنتُمْ صَادِقِينَ
verses.translation: They portray that they are doing a great favour to you (O dear Prophet Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him) by having become Muslims; say, “Do not think that you have done me a favour by accepting Islam; in fact Allah has bestowed a favour upon you, for He guided you to Islam, if you are truthful.”

verses.content: إِنَّ اللَّهَ يَعْلَمُ غَيْبَ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ ۚ وَاللَّهُ بَصِيرٌ بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ
verses.translation: Indeed Allah knows all the hidden of the heavens and the earth; and Allah is seeing your deeds.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ ق ۚ وَالْقُرْآنِ الْمَجِيدِ
verses.translation: Qaf; by oath of the Glorious Qur’an.

verses.content: بَلْ عَجِبُوا أَن جَاءَهُم مُّنذِرٌ مِّنْهُمْ فَقَالَ الْكَافِرُونَ هَـٰذَا شَيْءٌ عَجِيبٌ
verses.translation: Rather they were shocked that a Herald of Warning came to them from among themselves, so the disbelievers said, “This is something really strange.”

verses.content: أَإِذَا مِتْنَا وَكُنَّا تُرَابًا ۖ ذَٰلِكَ رَجْعٌ بَعِيدٌ
verses.translation: “When we are dead and have turned to dust, will we be raised again? That return is impossible!”

verses.content: قَدْ عَلِمْنَا مَا تَنقُصُ الْأَرْضُ مِنْهُمْ ۖ وَعِندَنَا كِتَابٌ حَفِيظٌ
verses.translation: We know all what the earth decreases from them; and with Us is a Book that retains.

verses.content: بَلْ كَذَّبُوا بِالْحَقِّ لَمَّا جَاءَهُمْ فَهُمْ فِي أَمْرٍ مَّرِيجٍ
verses.translation: In fact they denied the Truth when it came to them, so they are now in a dilemma.

verses.content: أَفَلَمْ يَنظُرُوا إِلَى السَّمَاءِ فَوْقَهُمْ كَيْفَ بَنَيْنَاهَا وَزَيَّنَّاهَا وَمَا لَهَا مِن فُرُوجٍ
verses.translation: So did they not see the sky above them – how We have made it and beautified it, and there are no cracks in it?

verses.content: وَالْأَرْضَ مَدَدْنَاهَا وَأَلْقَيْنَا فِيهَا رَوَاسِيَ وَأَنبَتْنَا فِيهَا مِن كُلِّ زَوْجٍ بَهِيجٍ
verses.translation: And (how) We have spread the earth, and placed mountains as anchors in it, and have grown all kinds of beautiful pairs in it?

verses.content: تَبْصِرَةً وَذِكْرَىٰ لِكُلِّ عَبْدٍ مُّنِيبٍ
verses.translation: A perception and an understanding, for every bondman who inclines.

verses.content: وَنَزَّلْنَا مِنَ السَّمَاءِ مَاءً مُّبَارَكًا فَأَنبَتْنَا بِهِ جَنَّاتٍ وَحَبَّ الْحَصِيدِ
verses.translation: And We sent down the auspicious water from the sky, therefore producing gardens with it, and the grain that is harvested.

verses.content: وَالنَّخْلَ بَاسِقَاتٍ لَّهَا طَلْعٌ نَّضِيدٌ
verses.translation: And high date-palms with lush fruit.

verses.content: رِّزْقًا لِّلْعِبَادِ ۖ وَأَحْيَيْنَا بِهِ بَلْدَةً مَّيْتًا ۚ كَذَٰلِكَ الْخُرُوجُ
verses.translation: As sustenance for the bondmen; and with it We revived a dead city; this is how you will be raised.

verses.content: كَذَّبَتْ قَبْلَهُمْ قَوْمُ نُوحٍ وَأَصْحَابُ الرَّسِّ وَثَمُودُ
verses.translation: Before these, the people of Nooh had denied, and so did the dwellers of Rass and the Thamud.

verses.content: وَعَادٌ وَفِرْعَوْنُ وَإِخْوَانُ لُوطٍ
verses.translation: And the tribe of A’ad, and Firaun, and the fellowmen of Lut.

verses.content: وَأَصْحَابُ الْأَيْكَةِ وَقَوْمُ تُبَّعٍ ۚ كُلٌّ كَذَّبَ الرُّسُلَ فَحَقَّ وَعِيدِ
verses.translation: And the Dwellers of the Woods, and the people of Tubb’a; each one of them one denied the Noble Messengers, so My promised punishment proved true.

verses.content: أَفَعَيِينَا بِالْخَلْقِ الْأَوَّلِ ۚ بَلْ هُمْ فِي لَبْسٍ مِّنْ خَلْقٍ جَدِيدٍ
verses.translation: So did We tire by creating the first time? Rather they doubt being created again.

verses.content: وَلَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا الْإِنسَانَ وَنَعْلَمُ مَا تُوَسْوِسُ بِهِ نَفْسُهُ ۖ وَنَحْنُ أَقْرَبُ إِلَيْهِ مِنْ حَبْلِ الْوَرِيدِ
verses.translation: And indeed We have created man and We know what his soul instils in him; and We are nearer to him than the hearts artery.

verses.content: إِذْ يَتَلَقَّى الْمُتَلَقِّيَانِ عَنِ الْيَمِينِ وَعَنِ الشِّمَالِ قَعِيدٌ
verses.translation: When the two receiving angels receive from him, one seated on the right and one on the left.

verses.content: مَّا يَلْفِظُ مِن قَوْلٍ إِلَّا لَدَيْهِ رَقِيبٌ عَتِيدٌ
verses.translation: He does not utter a single word, without a ready recorder seated next to him.

verses.content: وَجَاءَتْ سَكْرَةُ الْمَوْتِ بِالْحَقِّ ۖ ذَٰلِكَ مَا كُنتَ مِنْهُ تَحِيدُ
verses.translation: And the hardship of death came with the truth; “This is what you were escaping from!”

verses.content: وَنُفِخَ فِي الصُّورِ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ يَوْمُ الْوَعِيدِ
verses.translation: And the Trumpet was blown; “This is the Day of the promised punishment.”

verses.content: وَجَاءَتْ كُلُّ نَفْسٍ مَّعَهَا سَائِقٌ وَشَهِيدٌ
verses.translation: And every soul came, along with a herder and a witness.

verses.content: لَّقَدْ كُنتَ فِي غَفْلَةٍ مِّنْ هَـٰذَا فَكَشَفْنَا عَنكَ غِطَاءَكَ فَبَصَرُكَ الْيَوْمَ حَدِيدٌ
verses.translation: “You were indeed neglectful of this, so We have removed the veil for you, and your eyesight is sharp this day.”

verses.content: وَقَالَ قَرِينُهُ هَـٰذَا مَا لَدَيَّ عَتِيدٌ
verses.translation: And his accompanying angel said, “This is the record of your deeds, available with me.”

verses.content: أَلْقِيَا فِي جَهَنَّمَ كُلَّ كَفَّارٍ عَنِيدٍ
verses.translation: It will be said to the angels, “Both of you fling every excessive ungrateful, stubborn person into hell.”

verses.content: مَّنَّاعٍ لِّلْخَيْرِ مُعْتَدٍ مُّرِيبٍ
verses.translation: “The one who excessively prevented from virtue, the transgressor, the doubtful.”

verses.content: الَّذِي جَعَلَ مَعَ اللَّهِ إِلَـٰهًا آخَرَ فَأَلْقِيَاهُ فِي الْعَذَابِ الشَّدِيدِ
verses.translation: “The one who appointed another God along with Allah – so both of you fling him into the severe punishment.”

verses.content: قَالَ قَرِينُهُ رَبَّنَا مَا أَطْغَيْتُهُ وَلَـٰكِن كَانَ فِي ضَلَالٍ بَعِيدٍ
verses.translation: His accompanying devil said, “Our Lord! I did not cause him to rebel, but he himself was in extreme error.”

verses.content: قَالَ لَا تَخْتَصِمُوا لَدَيَّ وَقَدْ قَدَّمْتُ إِلَيْكُم بِالْوَعِيدِ
verses.translation: He will say, “Do not dispute before Me – I had already warned you of the punishment.”

verses.content: مَا يُبَدَّلُ الْقَوْلُ لَدَيَّ وَمَا أَنَا بِظَلَّامٍ لِّلْعَبِيدِ
verses.translation: “With Me, the decree does not change, and nor do I oppress the bondmen.”

verses.content: يَوْمَ نَقُولُ لِجَهَنَّمَ هَلِ امْتَلَأْتِ وَتَقُولُ هَلْ مِن مَّزِيدٍ
verses.translation: The day when We will ask hell, “Are you filled up?” and it will answer, “Are there some more?”

verses.content: وَأُزْلِفَتِ الْجَنَّةُ لِلْمُتَّقِينَ غَيْرَ بَعِيدٍ
verses.translation: And Paradise will be brought close to the pious, not far away from them.

verses.content: هَـٰذَا مَا تُوعَدُونَ لِكُلِّ أَوَّابٍ حَفِيظٍ
verses.translation: This is what you are promised – for every repenting, careful person.

verses.content: مَّنْ خَشِيَ الرَّحْمَـٰنَ بِالْغَيْبِ وَجَاءَ بِقَلْبٍ مُّنِيبٍ
verses.translation: Who fears the Most Gracious without seeing, and came with a heart that inclines.

verses.content: ادْخُلُوهَا بِسَلَامٍ ۖ ذَٰلِكَ يَوْمُ الْخُلُودِ
verses.translation: It will be said to him, “Enter it in peace; this is the day of eternity.”

verses.content: لَهُم مَّا يَشَاءُونَ فِيهَا وَلَدَيْنَا مَزِيدٌ
verses.translation: In it for them is all that they may desire, and with Us is more than it.

verses.content: وَكَمْ أَهْلَكْنَا قَبْلَهُم مِّن قَرْنٍ هُمْ أَشَدُّ مِنْهُم بَطْشًا فَنَقَّبُوا فِي الْبِلَادِ هَلْ مِن مَّحِيصٍ
verses.translation: And many a generation We did destroy before them, who exceeded them in strength, therefore venturing in the cities! Is there a place to escape?

verses.content: إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَذِكْرَىٰ لِمَن كَانَ لَهُ قَلْبٌ أَوْ أَلْقَى السَّمْعَ وَهُوَ شَهِيدٌ
verses.translation: Indeed in this is an advice for anyone who keeps a heart, or listens attentively.

verses.content: وَلَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضَ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا فِي سِتَّةِ أَيَّامٍ وَمَا مَسَّنَا مِن لُّغُوبٍ
verses.translation: And We have indeed created the heavens and the earth, and all what is between them, in six days; and fatigue did not even approach Us.

verses.content: فَاصْبِرْ عَلَىٰ مَا يَقُولُونَ وَسَبِّحْ بِحَمْدِ رَبِّكَ قَبْلَ طُلُوعِ الشَّمْسِ وَقَبْلَ الْغُرُوبِ
verses.translation: Therefore (O dear prophet Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him) patiently bear upon what they say, and praising your Lord say His Purity before the sun rises and before the sun sets.

verses.content: وَمِنَ اللَّيْلِ فَسَبِّحْهُ وَأَدْبَارَ السُّجُودِ
verses.translation: And say His Purity during the night, and after the customary prayers.

verses.content: وَاسْتَمِعْ يَوْمَ يُنَادِ الْمُنَادِ مِن مَّكَانٍ قَرِيبٍ
verses.translation: And listen attentively on the day when an announcer will proclaim from a place nearby.

verses.content: يَوْمَ يَسْمَعُونَ الصَّيْحَةَ بِالْحَقِّ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ يَوْمُ الْخُرُوجِ
verses.translation: The day when all will hear the Scream with the truth; this is the day of coming out of the graves.

verses.content: إِنَّا نَحْنُ نُحْيِي وَنُمِيتُ وَإِلَيْنَا الْمَصِيرُ
verses.translation: Indeed it is We Who give life, and give death, and towards Us only is the return.

verses.content: يَوْمَ تَشَقَّقُ الْأَرْضُ عَنْهُمْ سِرَاعًا ۚ ذَٰلِكَ حَشْرٌ عَلَيْنَا يَسِيرٌ
verses.translation: On the day when the earth will split for them, so they will come out in haste; this is the gathering – easy for Us.

verses.content: نَّحْنُ أَعْلَمُ بِمَا يَقُولُونَ ۖ وَمَا أَنتَ عَلَيْهِم بِجَبَّارٍ ۖ فَذَكِّرْ بِالْقُرْآنِ مَن يَخَافُ وَعِيدِ
verses.translation: We well know what they say (O dear Prophet Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him), and you are not one to use force over them; therefore advise him with the Qur’an, whoever fears My threat.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ وَالذَّارِيَاتِ ذَرْوًا
verses.translation: By oath of those which carry away while dispersing.

verses.content: فَالْحَامِلَاتِ وِقْرًا
verses.translation: Then by oath of those which carry the burdens.

verses.content: فَالْجَارِيَاتِ يُسْرًا
verses.translation: Then by oath of those which move with ease.

verses.content: فَالْمُقَسِّمَاتِ أَمْرًا
verses.translation: Then by oath of those which distribute by the command.

verses.content: إِنَّمَا تُوعَدُونَ لَصَادِقٌ
verses.translation: Undoubtedly, the promise you are given is surely true.

verses.content: وَإِنَّ الدِّينَ لَوَاقِعٌ
verses.translation: And undoubtedly justice will surely be done.

verses.content: وَالسَّمَاءِ ذَاتِ الْحُبُكِ
verses.translation: And by oath of the decorated heaven.

verses.content: إِنَّكُمْ لَفِي قَوْلٍ مُّخْتَلِفٍ
verses.translation: You are indeed in different opinions regarding this Qur’an.

verses.content: يُؤْفَكُ عَنْهُ مَنْ أُفِكَ
verses.translation: Only those who are destined to revert, are reverted from it.

verses.content: قُتِلَ الْخَرَّاصُونَ
verses.translation: Slain be those who mould from their imaginations.

verses.content: الَّذِينَ هُمْ فِي غَمْرَةٍ سَاهُونَ
verses.translation: Those who have forgotten in a state of intoxication.

verses.content: يَسْأَلُونَ أَيَّانَ يَوْمُ الدِّينِ
verses.translation: They ask, “When will be the Day of Judgement?”

verses.content: يَوْمَ هُمْ عَلَى النَّارِ يُفْتَنُونَ
verses.translation: It will be on the day when they will be roasted in the fire.

verses.content: ذُوقُوا فِتْنَتَكُمْ هَـٰذَا الَّذِي كُنتُم بِهِ تَسْتَعْجِلُونَ
verses.translation: And it will be said to them, “Taste your own roasting; this is what you were impatient for.”

verses.content: إِنَّ الْمُتَّقِينَ فِي جَنَّاتٍ وَعُيُونٍ
verses.translation: Indeed the pious are among Gardens and water springs.

verses.content: آخِذِينَ مَا آتَاهُمْ رَبُّهُمْ ۚ إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا قَبْلَ ذَٰلِكَ مُحْسِنِينَ
verses.translation: Accepting the rewards given by their Lord; they were indeed virtuous before this.

verses.content: كَانُوا قَلِيلًا مِّنَ اللَّيْلِ مَا يَهْجَعُونَ
verses.translation: They used to sleep only a little during the night.

verses.content: وَبِالْأَسْحَارِ هُمْ يَسْتَغْفِرُونَ
verses.translation: And used to seek forgiveness before dawn.

verses.content: وَفِي أَمْوَالِهِمْ حَقٌّ لِّلسَّائِلِ وَالْمَحْرُومِ
verses.translation: And the beggar and the destitute had a share in their wealth.

verses.content: وَفِي الْأَرْضِ آيَاتٌ لِّلْمُوقِنِينَ
verses.translation: And in the earth are signs for those who are certain.

verses.content: وَفِي أَنفُسِكُمْ ۚ أَفَلَا تُبْصِرُونَ
verses.translation: And in your own selves; so can you not perceive?

verses.content: وَفِي السَّمَاءِ رِزْقُكُمْ وَمَا تُوعَدُونَ
verses.translation: And in the heaven lies your sustenance, and the promise you are given.

verses.content: فَوَرَبِّ السَّمَاءِ وَالْأَرْضِ إِنَّهُ لَحَقٌّ مِّثْلَ مَا أَنَّكُمْ تَنطِقُونَ
verses.translation: So by oath of the Lord of the heavens and the earth, this Qur’an is the Truth, in the same language that you speak.

verses.content: هَلْ أَتَاكَ حَدِيثُ ضَيْفِ إِبْرَاهِيمَ الْمُكْرَمِينَ
verses.translation: Did the news of Ibrahim’s honourable guests reach you (O dear Prophet Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him)?

verses.content: إِذْ دَخَلُوا عَلَيْهِ فَقَالُوا سَلَامًا ۖ قَالَ سَلَامٌ قَوْمٌ مُّنكَرُونَ
verses.translation: When they came to him and said, “Peace”; he answered, “Peace”; and thought, “These people are not familiar.”

verses.content: فَرَاغَ إِلَىٰ أَهْلِهِ فَجَاءَ بِعِجْلٍ سَمِينٍ
verses.translation: Then he went to his home – so he brought a healthy calf.

verses.content: فَقَرَّبَهُ إِلَيْهِمْ قَالَ أَلَا تَأْكُلُونَ
verses.translation: He then presented it before them and said, “Do you not eat?”

verses.content: فَأَوْجَسَ مِنْهُمْ خِيفَةً ۖ قَالُوا لَا تَخَفْ ۖ وَبَشَّرُوهُ بِغُلَامٍ عَلِيمٍ
verses.translation: He therefore inwardly sensed fear of them; they said, “Do not fear!”; and they gave him the glad tidings of a knowledgeable son.

verses.content: فَأَقْبَلَتِ امْرَأَتُهُ فِي صَرَّةٍ فَصَكَّتْ وَجْهَهَا وَقَالَتْ عَجُوزٌ عَقِيمٌ
verses.translation: So his wife came screaming, and striking her forehead cried, “What! For a barren old woman?”

verses.content: قَالُوا كَذَٰلِكِ قَالَ رَبُّكِ ۖ إِنَّهُ هُوَ الْحَكِيمُ الْعَلِيمُ
verses.translation: They said, “This is how your Lord has decreed; indeed He only is the Wise, the All Knowing.”

verses.content: قَالَ فَمَا خَطْبُكُمْ أَيُّهَا الْمُرْسَلُونَ
verses.translation: Said Ibrahim, “What is your task, O the sent angels?”

verses.content: قَالُوا إِنَّا أُرْسِلْنَا إِلَىٰ قَوْمٍ مُّجْرِمِينَ
verses.translation: They said, “We have been sent towards a guilty nation.”

verses.content: لِنُرْسِلَ عَلَيْهِمْ حِجَارَةً مِّن طِينٍ
verses.translation: “To throw upon them stones of baked clay.”

verses.content: مُّسَوَّمَةً عِندَ رَبِّكَ لِلْمُسْرِفِينَ
verses.translation: “That are kept marked, with your Lord, for the transgressors.”

verses.content: فَأَخْرَجْنَا مَن كَانَ فِيهَا مِنَ الْمُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.translation: So We removed the people who had faith, from that town.

verses.content: فَمَا وَجَدْنَا فِيهَا غَيْرَ بَيْتٍ مِّنَ الْمُسْلِمِينَ
verses.translation: We therefore found just one house over there that was Muslim.

verses.content: وَتَرَكْنَا فِيهَا آيَةً لِّلَّذِينَ يَخَافُونَ الْعَذَابَ الْأَلِيمَ
verses.translation: And We kept a sign remaining in it, for those who fear the painful punishment.

verses.content: وَفِي مُوسَىٰ إِذْ أَرْسَلْنَاهُ إِلَىٰ فِرْعَوْنَ بِسُلْطَانٍ مُّبِينٍ
verses.translation: And in Moosa, when We sent him with a clear proof towards Firaun.

verses.content: فَتَوَلَّىٰ بِرُكْنِهِ وَقَالَ سَاحِرٌ أَوْ مَجْنُونٌ
verses.translation: In response, he turned away along with his army and said, “He is a magician or a madman.”

verses.content: فَأَخَذْنَاهُ وَجُنُودَهُ فَنَبَذْنَاهُمْ فِي الْيَمِّ وَهُوَ مُلِيمٌ
verses.translation: We therefore seized him and his army and threw them into the sea, while he was blaming himself.

verses.content: وَفِي عَادٍ إِذْ أَرْسَلْنَا عَلَيْهِمُ الرِّيحَ الْعَقِيمَ
verses.translation: And in the tribe of A’ad, when we sent a dry windstorm upon them.

verses.content: مَا تَذَرُ مِن شَيْءٍ أَتَتْ عَلَيْهِ إِلَّا جَعَلَتْهُ كَالرَّمِيمِ
verses.translation: It left out nothing in its path, but which it split up into fragments.

verses.content: وَفِي ثَمُودَ إِذْ قِيلَ لَهُمْ تَمَتَّعُوا حَتَّىٰ حِينٍ
verses.translation: And in the tribe of Thamud when it was told to them, “Enjoy for a while.”

verses.content: فَعَتَوْا عَنْ أَمْرِ رَبِّهِمْ فَأَخَذَتْهُمُ الصَّاعِقَةُ وَهُمْ يَنظُرُونَ
verses.translation: In response they rebelled against their Lord’s command, so the thunderbolt seized them whilst they were watching.

verses.content: فَمَا اسْتَطَاعُوا مِن قِيَامٍ وَمَا كَانُوا مُنتَصِرِينَ
verses.translation: So they were neither able to stand up, nor were they able to take revenge.

verses.content: وَقَوْمَ نُوحٍ مِّن قَبْلُ ۖ إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا قَوْمًا فَاسِقِينَ
verses.translation: And before them, We destroyed the people of Nooh; they were indeed a sinning nation.

verses.content: وَالسَّمَاءَ بَنَيْنَاهَا بِأَيْدٍ وَإِنَّا لَمُوسِعُونَ
verses.translation: And We have built the heaven with hands (the Divine Power), and it is We Who give the expanse.

verses.content: وَالْأَرْضَ فَرَشْنَاهَا فَنِعْمَ الْمَاهِدُونَ
verses.translation: And We made the earth a base, so how well do We lay out!

verses.content: وَمِن كُلِّ شَيْءٍ خَلَقْنَا زَوْجَيْنِ لَعَلَّكُمْ تَذَكَّرُونَ
verses.translation: And We created all things in pairs, so that you may ponder.

verses.content: فَفِرُّوا إِلَى اللَّهِ ۖ إِنِّي لَكُم مِّنْهُ نَذِيرٌ مُّبِينٌ
verses.translation: “Therefore rush towards Allah; indeed I am from Him, a clear Herald of Warning towards you.”

verses.content: وَلَا تَجْعَلُوا مَعَ اللَّهِ إِلَـٰهًا آخَرَ ۖ إِنِّي لَكُم مِّنْهُ نَذِيرٌ مُّبِينٌ
verses.translation: “And do not appoint other deities along with Allah; indeed I am from Him, a clear Herald of Warning towards you.”

verses.content: كَذَٰلِكَ مَا أَتَى الَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِهِم مِّن رَّسُولٍ إِلَّا قَالُوا سَاحِرٌ أَوْ مَجْنُونٌ
verses.translation: Similarly, whenever a Noble Messenger came to those before them they always said, “He is a magician or a madman.”

verses.content: أَتَوَاصَوْا بِهِ ۚ بَلْ هُمْ قَوْمٌ طَاغُونَ
verses.translation: What! Have they willed this utterance to one another? In fact they are a rebellious people.

verses.content: فَتَوَلَّ عَنْهُمْ فَمَا أَنتَ بِمَلُومٍ
verses.translation: Therefore turn away from them (O dear Prophet Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him), – so there is no blame upon you.

verses.content: وَذَكِّرْ فَإِنَّ الذِّكْرَىٰ تَنفَعُ الْمُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.translation: And advise, for advice benefits the Muslims.

verses.content: وَمَا خَلَقْتُ الْجِنَّ وَالْإِنسَ إِلَّا لِيَعْبُدُونِ
verses.translation: And I created the jinns and men, only for them to worship Me.

verses.content: مَا أُرِيدُ مِنْهُم مِّن رِّزْقٍ وَمَا أُرِيدُ أَن يُطْعِمُونِ
verses.translation: I do not ask any sustenance from them, nor wish that they give Me food.

verses.content: إِنَّ اللَّهَ هُوَ الرَّزَّاقُ ذُو الْقُوَّةِ الْمَتِينُ
verses.translation: Indeed it is Allah, Who is the Greatest Sustainer, the Strong, the Able.

verses.content: فَإِنَّ لِلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوا ذَنُوبًا مِّثْلَ ذَنُوبِ أَصْحَابِهِمْ فَلَا يَسْتَعْجِلُونِ
verses.translation: And indeed for these unjust is also a turn of punishment, like that of their companions – so they must not ask Me to hasten.

verses.content: فَوَيْلٌ لِّلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا مِن يَوْمِهِمُ الَّذِي يُوعَدُونَ
verses.translation: So ruin is for disbelievers, from their day – which they are promised.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ وَالطُّورِ
verses.translation: By oath of (mount) Tur.

verses.content: وَكِتَابٍ مَّسْطُورٍ
verses.translation: And by oath of a passage, written –

verses.content: فِي رَقٍّ مَّنشُورٍ
verses.translation: On an open record.

verses.content: وَالْبَيْتِ الْمَعْمُورِ
verses.translation: And by oath of the Inhabited House.

verses.content: وَالسَّقْفِ الْمَرْفُوعِ
verses.translation: And the lofty roof.

verses.content: وَالْبَحْرِ الْمَسْجُورِ
verses.translation: And the sea set aflame.

verses.content: إِنَّ عَذَابَ رَبِّكَ لَوَاقِعٌ
verses.translation: Indeed your Lord’s punishment will surely take place.

verses.content: مَّا لَهُ مِن دَافِعٍ
verses.translation: No one can avert it.

verses.content: يَوْمَ تَمُورُ السَّمَاءُ مَوْرًا
verses.translation: A day on which the heavens will shake with a visible shaking.

verses.content: وَتَسِيرُ الْجِبَالُ سَيْرًا
verses.translation: And the mountains will move with a visible movement.

verses.content: فَوَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.translation: So on that day, ruin is for those who deny.

verses.content: الَّذِينَ هُمْ فِي خَوْضٍ يَلْعَبُونَ
verses.translation: Those who are playing in pursuits.

verses.content: يَوْمَ يُدَعُّونَ إِلَىٰ نَارِ جَهَنَّمَ دَعًّا
verses.translation: A day when they will be pushed, forcibly shoved towards the fire of hell.

verses.content: هَـٰذِهِ النَّارُ الَّتِي كُنتُم بِهَا تُكَذِّبُونَ
verses.translation: “This is the fire, which you used to deny!”

verses.content: أَفَسِحْرٌ هَـٰذَا أَمْ أَنتُمْ لَا تُبْصِرُونَ
verses.translation: “So is this magic, or are you unable to see?”

verses.content: اصْلَوْهَا فَاصْبِرُوا أَوْ لَا تَصْبِرُوا سَوَاءٌ عَلَيْكُمْ ۖ إِنَّمَا تُجْزَوْنَ مَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ
verses.translation: “Enter it – now whether you patiently bear it or are impatient – it is the same for you; for you is a recompense only for what you used to do.”

verses.content: إِنَّ الْمُتَّقِينَ فِي جَنَّاتٍ وَنَعِيمٍ
verses.translation: Indeed the pious are in Gardens and peace.

verses.content: فَاكِهِينَ بِمَا آتَاهُمْ رَبُّهُمْ وَوَقَاهُمْ رَبُّهُمْ عَذَابَ الْجَحِيمِ
verses.translation: Delighted at the bestowal of their Lord; and their Lord has saved them from the fire.

verses.content: كُلُوا وَاشْرَبُوا هَنِيئًا بِمَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ
verses.translation: “Eat and drink with pleasure, a reward for what you used to do.”

verses.content: مُتَّكِئِينَ عَلَىٰ سُرُرٍ مَّصْفُوفَةٍ ۖ وَزَوَّجْنَاهُم بِحُورٍ عِينٍ
verses.translation: Reclining on thrones, in rows; and We have wedded them to maidens with gorgeous eyes.

verses.content: وَالَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَاتَّبَعَتْهُمْ ذُرِّيَّتُهُم بِإِيمَانٍ أَلْحَقْنَا بِهِمْ ذُرِّيَّتَهُمْ وَمَا أَلَتْنَاهُم مِّنْ عَمَلِهِم مِّن شَيْءٍ ۚ كُلُّ امْرِئٍ بِمَا كَسَبَ رَهِينٌ
verses.translation: And those who accepted faith, and whose descendants followed them with faith – We have joined their descendants with them, and have not reduced anything for them from their deeds; every soul is trapped in its own deeds.

verses.content: وَأَمْدَدْنَاهُم بِفَاكِهَةٍ وَلَحْمٍ مِّمَّا يَشْتَهُونَ
verses.translation: And We aided them with fruit and meat, whatever they desire.

verses.content: يَتَنَازَعُونَ فِيهَا كَأْسًا لَّا لَغْوٌ فِيهَا وَلَا تَأْثِيمٌ
verses.translation: In it, they accept cups from each other, in which is neither any lewdness nor any sin.

verses.content: وَيَطُوفُ عَلَيْهِمْ غِلْمَانٌ لَّهُمْ كَأَنَّهُمْ لُؤْلُؤٌ مَّكْنُونٌ
verses.translation: And their boy servants shall go around them, as if they were pearls, safely hidden.

verses.content: وَأَقْبَلَ بَعْضُهُمْ عَلَىٰ بَعْضٍ يَتَسَاءَلُونَ
verses.translation: And one of them turned towards the other, questioning.

verses.content: قَالُوا إِنَّا كُنَّا قَبْلُ فِي أَهْلِنَا مُشْفِقِينَ
verses.translation: Saying, “Indeed before this, we were in our houses, worried.”

verses.content: فَمَنَّ اللَّهُ عَلَيْنَا وَوَقَانَا عَذَابَ السَّمُومِ
verses.translation: “So Allah did us a great favour, and saved us from the punishment of the flame.”

verses.content: إِنَّا كُنَّا مِن قَبْلُ نَدْعُوهُ ۖ إِنَّهُ هُوَ الْبَرُّ الرَّحِيمُ
verses.translation: “Indeed we used to worship Him in our previous life; indeed He only is the Benign, the Most Merciful.”

verses.content: فَذَكِّرْ فَمَا أَنتَ بِنِعْمَتِ رَبِّكَ بِكَاهِنٍ وَلَا مَجْنُونٍ
verses.translation: Therefore (O dear Prophet Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him), enlighten, for by the munificence of your Lord, you are neither a soothsayer nor a madman.

verses.content: أَمْ يَقُولُونَ شَاعِرٌ نَّتَرَبَّصُ بِهِ رَيْبَ الْمَنُونِ
verses.translation: Or they allege, “He is a poet – we await a calamity of the times to befall him.”

verses.content: قُلْ تَرَبَّصُوا فَإِنِّي مَعَكُم مِّنَ الْمُتَرَبِّصِينَ
verses.translation: Proclaim, “Go on waiting – I too am waiting along with you.”

verses.content: أَمْ تَأْمُرُهُمْ أَحْلَامُهُم بِهَـٰذَا ۚ أَمْ هُمْ قَوْمٌ طَاغُونَ
verses.translation: Is this what their senses tell them, or are they a rebellious people?

verses.content: أَمْ يَقُولُونَ تَقَوَّلَهُ ۚ بَل لَّا يُؤْمِنُونَ
verses.translation: What! They say, “He has invented the Qur'an”? Rather they do not have faith.

verses.content: فَلْيَأْتُوا بِحَدِيثٍ مِّثْلِهِ إِن كَانُوا صَادِقِينَ
verses.translation: So let them bring a single discourse like it, if they are truthful.

verses.content: أَمْ خُلِقُوا مِنْ غَيْرِ شَيْءٍ أَمْ هُمُ الْخَالِقُونَ
verses.translation: Have they not been created from some source, or are they themselves the creators?

verses.content: أَمْ خَلَقُوا السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضَ ۚ بَل لَّا يُوقِنُونَ
verses.translation: Or did they create the heavens and the earth? Rather they are not certain.

verses.content: أَمْ عِندَهُمْ خَزَائِنُ رَبِّكَ أَمْ هُمُ الْمُصَيْطِرُونَ
verses.translation: Or do they have the treasures of your Lord, or are they the authority?

verses.content: أَمْ لَهُمْ سُلَّمٌ يَسْتَمِعُونَ فِيهِ ۖ فَلْيَأْتِ مُسْتَمِعُهُم بِسُلْطَانٍ مُّبِينٍ
verses.translation: Or do they have any stairs, climbing upon which they eavesdrop? So their eavesdropper should bring some clear proof!

verses.content: أَمْ لَهُ الْبَنَاتُ وَلَكُمُ الْبَنُونَ
verses.translation: What! The daughters for Him, and the sons for you?

verses.content: أَمْ تَسْأَلُهُمْ أَجْرًا فَهُم مِّن مَّغْرَمٍ مُّثْقَلُونَ
verses.translation: Or do you (O dear Prophet Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him) ask any fee from them, so they are burdened with the penalty?

verses.content: أَمْ عِندَهُمُ الْغَيْبُ فَهُمْ يَكْتُبُونَ
verses.translation: Or is the hidden with them, by which they pass judgements?

verses.content: أَمْ يُرِيدُونَ كَيْدًا ۖ فَالَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا هُمُ الْمَكِيدُونَ
verses.translation: Or are they planning a conspiracy? So the conspiracy will befall only upon the disbelievers.

verses.content: أَمْ لَهُمْ إِلَـٰهٌ غَيْرُ اللَّهِ ۚ سُبْحَانَ اللَّهِ عَمَّا يُشْرِكُونَ
verses.translation: Or do they have a God besides Allah? Purity is to Allah from their ascribing of partners to Him.

verses.content: وَإِن يَرَوْا كِسْفًا مِّنَ السَّمَاءِ سَاقِطًا يَقُولُوا سَحَابٌ مَّرْكُومٌ
verses.translation: And were they to see a portion of the sky falling, they will say, “It is a heap of clouds.”

verses.content: فَذَرْهُمْ حَتَّىٰ يُلَاقُوا يَوْمَهُمُ الَّذِي فِيهِ يُصْعَقُونَ
verses.translation: Therefore leave them, until they confront their day, in which they will be stunned.

verses.content: يَوْمَ لَا يُغْنِي عَنْهُمْ كَيْدُهُمْ شَيْئًا وَلَا هُمْ يُنصَرُونَ
verses.translation: A day on which their scheming will not benefit them at all, nor will they be helped.

verses.content: وَإِنَّ لِلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوا عَذَابًا دُونَ ذَٰلِكَ وَلَـٰكِنَّ أَكْثَرَهُمْ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ
verses.translation: And indeed for the unjust is another punishment before this, but most of them do not know. (Punishment in the grave is proven by this verse.)

verses.content: وَاصْبِرْ لِحُكْمِ رَبِّكَ فَإِنَّكَ بِأَعْيُنِنَا ۖ وَسَبِّحْ بِحَمْدِ رَبِّكَ حِينَ تَقُومُ
verses.translation: And be patient upon your Lord’s command, (O dear Prophet Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him), for you are indeed in Our sight; and proclaim the Purity of your Lord while praising Him, whenever you stand.

verses.content: وَمِنَ اللَّيْلِ فَسَبِّحْهُ وَإِدْبَارَ النُّجُومِ
verses.translation: And proclaim His Purity during the night, and when the stars turn back.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ وَالنَّجْمِ إِذَا هَوَىٰ
verses.translation: By oath of the beloved shining star Mohammed (peace and blessings be upon him), when he returned from the Ascent.

verses.content: مَا ضَلَّ صَاحِبُكُمْ وَمَا غَوَىٰ
verses.translation: Your companion did not err, nor did he go astray.

verses.content: وَمَا يَنطِقُ عَنِ الْهَوَىٰ
verses.translation: And he does not say anything by his own desire.

verses.content: إِنْ هُوَ إِلَّا وَحْيٌ يُوحَىٰ
verses.translation: It is but a divine revelation, which is revealed to him.

verses.content: عَلَّمَهُ شَدِيدُ الْقُوَىٰ
verses.translation: He has been taught by the Extremely Powerful.

verses.content: ذُو مِرَّةٍ فَاسْتَوَىٰ
verses.translation: The Strong; then the Spectacle inclined towards him.

verses.content: وَهُوَ بِالْأُفُقِ الْأَعْلَىٰ
verses.translation: And he was on the horizon of the highest heaven.

verses.content: ثُمَّ دَنَا فَتَدَلَّىٰ
verses.translation: Then the Spectacle became closer, and came down in full view.

verses.content: فَكَانَ قَابَ قَوْسَيْنِ أَوْ أَدْنَىٰ
verses.translation: So the distance between the Spectacle and the beloved was only two arms’ length, or even less. (The Heavenly Journey of Prophet Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him – was with body and soul.)

verses.content: فَأَوْحَىٰ إِلَىٰ عَبْدِهِ مَا أَوْحَىٰ
verses.translation: So Allah divinely revealed to His bondman, whatever He divinely revealed.

verses.content: مَا كَذَبَ الْفُؤَادُ مَا رَأَىٰ
verses.translation: The heart did not deny, what it saw. (The Holy Prophet was bestowed with seeing Allah – see also preceding verses 8, 9, 10.)

verses.content: أَفَتُمَارُونَهُ عَلَىٰ مَا يَرَىٰ
verses.translation: What! So do you dispute with him regarding what he saw?

verses.content: وَلَقَدْ رَآهُ نَزْلَةً أُخْرَىٰ
verses.translation: And indeed he did see the Spectacle again.

verses.content: عِندَ سِدْرَةِ الْمُنتَهَىٰ
verses.translation: Near the lote-tree of the last boundary.

verses.content: عِندَهَا جَنَّةُ الْمَأْوَىٰ
verses.translation: Close to which is the Everlasting Paradise.

verses.content: إِذْ يَغْشَى السِّدْرَةَ مَا يَغْشَىٰ
verses.translation: When the lote-tree was being enveloped, by whatever around it.

verses.content: مَا زَاغَ الْبَصَرُ وَمَا طَغَىٰ
verses.translation: The sight did not shift, nor did it cross the limits.

verses.content: لَقَدْ رَأَىٰ مِنْ آيَاتِ رَبِّهِ الْكُبْرَىٰ
verses.translation: Indeed he saw the supreme signs of his Lord.

verses.content: أَفَرَأَيْتُمُ اللَّاتَ وَالْعُزَّىٰ
verses.translation: So did you observe the idols Lat and Uzza?

verses.content: وَمَنَاةَ الثَّالِثَةَ الْأُخْرَىٰ
verses.translation: And subsequently the third, the Manat?

verses.content: أَلَكُمُ الذَّكَرُ وَلَهُ الْأُنثَىٰ
verses.translation: What! For you the son, and for Him the daughter?

verses.content: تِلْكَ إِذًا قِسْمَةٌ ضِيزَىٰ
verses.translation: Then that is surely a very unjust distribution!

verses.content: إِنْ هِيَ إِلَّا أَسْمَاءٌ سَمَّيْتُمُوهَا أَنتُمْ وَآبَاؤُكُم مَّا أَنزَلَ اللَّهُ بِهَا مِن سُلْطَانٍ ۚ إِن يَتَّبِعُونَ إِلَّا الظَّنَّ وَمَا تَهْوَى الْأَنفُسُ ۖ وَلَقَدْ جَاءَهُم مِّن رَّبِّهِمُ الْهُدَىٰ
verses.translation: They are nothing but some names that you have coined, you and your forefathers – Allah has not sent any proof for them; they follow only guesses and their own desires; whereas the guidance from their Lord has come to them.

verses.content: أَمْ لِلْإِنسَانِ مَا تَمَنَّىٰ
verses.translation: What! Will man get whatever he dreams of?

verses.content: فَلِلَّهِ الْآخِرَةُ وَالْأُولَىٰ
verses.translation: So (know that) Allah only is the Owner of all – the Hereafter and this world.

verses.content: وَكَم مِّن مَّلَكٍ فِي السَّمَاوَاتِ لَا تُغْنِي شَفَاعَتُهُمْ شَيْئًا إِلَّا مِن بَعْدِ أَن يَأْذَنَ اللَّهُ لِمَن يَشَاءُ وَيَرْضَىٰ
verses.translation: And many an angel is in the heavens, whose intercession does not benefit the least unless Allah gives permission for whomever He wills, and whom He likes.

verses.content: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ بِالْآخِرَةِ لَيُسَمُّونَ الْمَلَائِكَةَ تَسْمِيَةَ الْأُنثَىٰ
verses.translation: Indeed those who do not believe in the Hereafter, coin the names of angels like those of females.

verses.content: وَمَا لَهُم بِهِ مِنْ عِلْمٍ ۖ إِن يَتَّبِعُونَ إِلَّا الظَّنَّ ۖ وَإِنَّ الظَّنَّ لَا يُغْنِي مِنَ الْحَقِّ شَيْئًا
verses.translation: And they do not have any knowledge of it; they just follow assumption; and indeed assumption does not serve any purpose in place of the Truth.

verses.content: فَأَعْرِضْ عَن مَّن تَوَلَّىٰ عَن ذِكْرِنَا وَلَمْ يُرِدْ إِلَّا الْحَيَاةَ الدُّنْيَا
verses.translation: Therefore turn away from whoever has turned away from Our remembrance and has desired only the life of this world.

verses.content: ذَٰلِكَ مَبْلَغُهُم مِّنَ الْعِلْمِ ۚ إِنَّ رَبَّكَ هُوَ أَعْلَمُ بِمَن ضَلَّ عَن سَبِيلِهِ وَهُوَ أَعْلَمُ بِمَنِ اهْتَدَىٰ
verses.translation: This is the extent of their knowledge; indeed your Lord well knows one who has strayed from His path, and He well knows one who has attained guidance.

verses.content: وَلِلَّهِ مَا فِي السَّمَاوَاتِ وَمَا فِي الْأَرْضِ لِيَجْزِيَ الَّذِينَ أَسَاءُوا بِمَا عَمِلُوا وَيَجْزِيَ الَّذِينَ أَحْسَنُوا بِالْحُسْنَى
verses.translation: And to Allah only belongs all whatever is in the heavens and all whatever is in the earth, in order to repay those who do evil for what they have done, and give an excellent reward to those who do good.

verses.content: الَّذِينَ يَجْتَنِبُونَ كَبَائِرَ الْإِثْمِ وَالْفَوَاحِشَ إِلَّا اللَّمَمَ ۚ إِنَّ رَبَّكَ وَاسِعُ الْمَغْفِرَةِ ۚ هُوَ أَعْلَمُ بِكُمْ إِذْ أَنشَأَكُم مِّنَ الْأَرْضِ وَإِذْ أَنتُمْ أَجِنَّةٌ فِي بُطُونِ أُمَّهَاتِكُمْ ۖ فَلَا تُزَكُّوا أَنفُسَكُمْ ۖ هُوَ أَعْلَمُ بِمَنِ اتَّقَىٰ
verses.translation: Those who avoid the cardinal sins and lewdness, except that they approached it and refrained; indeed your Lord’s mercy is limitless; He knows you very well – since He has created you from clay, and when you were foetuses in your mothers’ wombs; therefore do not, on your own, claim yourselves to be clean; He well knows who are the pious.

verses.content: أَفَرَأَيْتَ الَّذِي تَوَلَّىٰ
verses.translation: So did you observe him who turned away?

verses.content: وَأَعْطَىٰ قَلِيلًا وَأَكْدَىٰ
verses.translation: And he gave a little, then refrained?

verses.content: أَعِندَهُ عِلْمُ الْغَيْبِ فَهُوَ يَرَىٰ
verses.translation: Does he have knowledge of the hidden, so he can foresee?

verses.content: أَمْ لَمْ يُنَبَّأْ بِمَا فِي صُحُفِ مُوسَىٰ
verses.translation: Did not the news reach him, of that which is mentioned in the Books of Moosa?

verses.content: وَإِبْرَاهِيمَ الَّذِي وَفَّىٰ
verses.translation: And of Ibrahim, who was most obedient?

verses.content: أَلَّا تَزِرُ وَازِرَةٌ وِزْرَ أُخْرَىٰ
verses.translation: That no burdened soul bears another soul’s burden?

verses.content: وَأَن لَّيْسَ لِلْإِنسَانِ إِلَّا مَا سَعَىٰ
verses.translation: And that man will not obtain anything except what he strove for?

verses.content: وَأَنَّ سَعْيَهُ سَوْفَ يُرَىٰ
verses.translation: And that his effort will soon be scrutinised?

verses.content: ثُمَّ يُجْزَاهُ الْجَزَاءَ الْأَوْفَىٰ
verses.translation: Then he will be fully repaid for it?

verses.content: وَأَنَّ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ الْمُنتَهَىٰ
verses.translation: And that the end is only towards your Lord?

verses.content: وَأَنَّهُ هُوَ أَضْحَكَ وَأَبْكَىٰ
verses.translation: And that it is He Who made (you) laugh and made (you) cry?

verses.content: وَأَنَّهُ هُوَ أَمَاتَ وَأَحْيَا
verses.translation: And that it is He Who gave death and gave life?

verses.content: وَأَنَّهُ خَلَقَ الزَّوْجَيْنِ الذَّكَرَ وَالْأُنثَىٰ
verses.translation: And that it is He Who has created the two pairs, male and female?

verses.content: مِن نُّطْفَةٍ إِذَا تُمْنَىٰ
verses.translation: From a drop of liquid, when it is added?

verses.content: وَأَنَّ عَلَيْهِ النَّشْأَةَ الْأُخْرَىٰ
verses.translation: And that only upon Him is the next revival?

verses.content: وَأَنَّهُ هُوَ أَغْنَىٰ وَأَقْنَىٰ
verses.translation: And that it is He Who has given wealth and contentment?

verses.content: وَأَنَّهُ هُوَ رَبُّ الشِّعْرَىٰ
verses.translation: And that He only is the Lord of the star Sirius?

verses.content: وَأَنَّهُ أَهْلَكَ عَادًا الْأُولَىٰ
verses.translation: And that it is He Who earlier destroyed the tribe of Aad?

verses.content: وَثَمُودَ فَمَا أَبْقَىٰ
verses.translation: And destroyed the tribe of Thamud, not sparing anyone?

verses.content: وَقَوْمَ نُوحٍ مِّن قَبْلُ ۖ إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا هُمْ أَظْلَمَ وَأَطْغَىٰ
verses.translation: And before them, the people of Nooh? Indeed they were more unjust and more rebellious than these!

verses.content: وَالْمُؤْتَفِكَةَ أَهْوَىٰ
verses.translation: And that it is He Who threw down the upturned townships?

verses.content: فَغَشَّاهَا مَا غَشَّىٰ
verses.translation: So they were covered with whatever covered them?

verses.content: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكَ تَتَمَارَىٰ
verses.translation: So O listener! Which favour of your Lord will you doubt?

verses.content: هَـٰذَا نَذِيرٌ مِّنَ النُّذُرِ الْأُولَىٰ
verses.translation: He (Prophet Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him) is a Herald of Warning, like the former Heralds of Warning.

verses.content: أَزِفَتِ الْآزِفَةُ
verses.translation: The approaching event has come near.

verses.content: لَيْسَ لَهَا مِن دُونِ اللَّهِ كَاشِفَةٌ
verses.translation: None except Allah can avert it.

verses.content: أَفَمِنْ هَـٰذَا الْحَدِيثِ تَعْجَبُونَ
verses.translation: So are you surprised at this fact?

verses.content: وَتَضْحَكُونَ وَلَا تَبْكُونَ
verses.translation: And you laugh, and do not weep!

verses.content: وَأَنتُمْ سَامِدُونَ
verses.translation: And you are lost in play!

verses.content: فَاسْجُدُوا لِلَّهِ وَاعْبُدُوا ۩
verses.translation: Therefore prostrate for Allah, and worship Him. (Command of Prostration # 12)

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ اقْتَرَبَتِ السَّاعَةُ وَانشَقَّ الْقَمَرُ
verses.translation: The Last Day came near, and the moon split apart.

verses.content: وَإِن يَرَوْا آيَةً يُعْرِضُوا وَيَقُولُوا سِحْرٌ مُّسْتَمِرٌّ
verses.translation: And when they see a sign, they turn away and say, “Just a customary magic!”

verses.content: وَكَذَّبُوا وَاتَّبَعُوا أَهْوَاءَهُمْ ۚ وَكُلُّ أَمْرٍ مُّسْتَقِرٌّ
verses.translation: And they denied and followed their own desires, whereas each matter has been decided!

verses.content: وَلَقَدْ جَاءَهُم مِّنَ الْأَنبَاءِ مَا فِيهِ مُزْدَجَرٌ
verses.translation: And indeed the news which had a lot of deterrence, came to them.

verses.content: حِكْمَةٌ بَالِغَةٌ ۖ فَمَا تُغْنِ النُّذُرُ
verses.translation: The pinnacle of wisdom – so how will the Heralds of warning provide any benefit?

verses.content: فَتَوَلَّ عَنْهُمْ ۘ يَوْمَ يَدْعُ الدَّاعِ إِلَىٰ شَيْءٍ نُّكُرٍ
verses.translation: Therefore turn away from them; on the day when the announcer will call towards a severe unknown matter –

verses.content: خُشَّعًا أَبْصَارُهُمْ يَخْرُجُونَ مِنَ الْأَجْدَاثِ كَأَنَّهُمْ جَرَادٌ مُّنتَشِرٌ
verses.translation: They will come out from the graves with eyes lowered, as if they were spread locusts.

verses.content: مُّهْطِعِينَ إِلَى الدَّاعِ ۖ يَقُولُ الْكَافِرُونَ هَـٰذَا يَوْمٌ عَسِرٌ
verses.translation: Rushing towards the caller; the disbelievers will say, “This is a tough day.”

verses.content: كَذَّبَتْ قَبْلَهُمْ قَوْمُ نُوحٍ فَكَذَّبُوا عَبْدَنَا وَقَالُوا مَجْنُونٌ وَازْدُجِرَ
verses.translation: Before these, the people of Nooh denied and they belied Our bondman and said, “He is a madman” and rebuffed him.

verses.content: فَدَعَا رَبَّهُ أَنِّي مَغْلُوبٌ فَانتَصِرْ
verses.translation: He therefore prayed to his Lord, “I am overpowered, therefore avenge me.”

verses.content: فَفَتَحْنَا أَبْوَابَ السَّمَاءِ بِمَاءٍ مُّنْهَمِرٍ
verses.translation: We therefore opened the gates of heaven, with water flowing furiously.

verses.content: وَفَجَّرْنَا الْأَرْضَ عُيُونًا فَالْتَقَى الْمَاءُ عَلَىٰ أَمْرٍ قَدْ قُدِرَ
verses.translation: And caused springs to gush out from the earth, so that the two waters met totalling a quantity that had been destined.

verses.content: وَحَمَلْنَاهُ عَلَىٰ ذَاتِ أَلْوَاحٍ وَدُسُرٍ
verses.translation: And We carried Nooh upon a ship of wooden planks and nails.

verses.content: تَجْرِي بِأَعْيُنِنَا جَزَاءً لِّمَن كَانَ كُفِرَ
verses.translation: Sailing in front of Our sight; as a reward for the sake of one who was rejected.

verses.content: وَلَقَد تَّرَكْنَاهَا آيَةً فَهَلْ مِن مُّدَّكِرٍ
verses.translation: And We left it as a sign – so is there one who would ponder?

verses.content: فَكَيْفَ كَانَ عَذَابِي وَنُذُرِ
verses.translation: So how did My punishment turn out, and My threats?

verses.content: وَلَقَدْ يَسَّرْنَا الْقُرْآنَ لِلذِّكْرِ فَهَلْ مِن مُّدَّكِرٍ
verses.translation: And We have indeed made the Qur’an easy to memorise, so is there one who would remember?

verses.content: كَذَّبَتْ عَادٌ فَكَيْفَ كَانَ عَذَابِي وَنُذُرِ
verses.translation: The tribe of A’ad denied – so how did My punishment turn out, and My warnings?

verses.content: إِنَّا أَرْسَلْنَا عَلَيْهِمْ رِيحًا صَرْصَرًا فِي يَوْمِ نَحْسٍ مُّسْتَمِرٍّ
verses.translation: We indeed sent towards them a severe windstorm, on a day the ill luck of which lasted upon them forever.

verses.content: تَنزِعُ النَّاسَ كَأَنَّهُمْ أَعْجَازُ نَخْلٍ مُّنقَعِرٍ
verses.translation: Smashing down men as if they were uprooted trunks of date palms.

verses.content: فَكَيْفَ كَانَ عَذَابِي وَنُذُرِ
verses.translation: So how did My punishment turn out, and My warnings?

verses.content: وَلَقَدْ يَسَّرْنَا الْقُرْآنَ لِلذِّكْرِ فَهَلْ مِن مُّدَّكِرٍ
verses.translation: And We have indeed made the Qur’an easy to memorise, so is there one who would remember?

verses.content: كَذَّبَتْ ثَمُودُ بِالنُّذُرِ
verses.translation: The tribe of Thamud denied the Noble Messengers.

verses.content: فَقَالُوا أَبَشَرًا مِّنَّا وَاحِدًا نَّتَّبِعُهُ إِنَّا إِذًا لَّفِي ضَلَالٍ وَسُعُرٍ
verses.translation: So they said, “What! Shall we follow a man from among us? If we do, we are indeed astray, and insane!”

verses.content: أَأُلْقِيَ الذِّكْرُ عَلَيْهِ مِن بَيْنِنَا بَلْ هُوَ كَذَّابٌ أَشِرٌ
verses.translation: “What! Of all the men among us, the remembrance has come down upon him? In fact, he is a mischievous, great liar.”

verses.content: سَيَعْلَمُونَ غَدًا مَّنِ الْكَذَّابُ الْأَشِرُ
verses.translation: It was said to Saleh, “They will soon realise tomorrow who is the mischievous great liar.”

verses.content: إِنَّا مُرْسِلُو النَّاقَةِ فِتْنَةً لَّهُمْ فَارْتَقِبْهُمْ وَاصْطَبِرْ
verses.translation: “We shall send a she-camel to test them, therefore O Saleh, wait and have patience.”

verses.content: وَنَبِّئْهُمْ أَنَّ الْمَاءَ قِسْمَةٌ بَيْنَهُمْ ۖ كُلُّ شِرْبٍ مُّحْتَضَرٌ
verses.translation: “And inform them that the water is to be shared between them; only those may come whose turn it is.”

verses.content: فَنَادَوْا صَاحِبَهُمْ فَتَعَاطَىٰ فَعَقَرَ
verses.translation: In response they called their companion – he therefore caught and hamstrung the she-camel.

verses.content: فَكَيْفَ كَانَ عَذَابِي وَنُذُرِ
verses.translation: So how did My punishment turn out, and My warnings?

verses.content: إِنَّا أَرْسَلْنَا عَلَيْهِمْ صَيْحَةً وَاحِدَةً فَكَانُوا كَهَشِيمِ الْمُحْتَظِرِ
verses.translation: Indeed We sent upon them a single Scream – thereupon they became like the barrier builder’s residual dry trampled hay.

verses.content: وَلَقَدْ يَسَّرْنَا الْقُرْآنَ لِلذِّكْرِ فَهَلْ مِن مُّدَّكِرٍ
verses.translation: And We have indeed made the Qur’an easy to memorise, so is there one who would remember?

verses.content: كَذَّبَتْ قَوْمُ لُوطٍ بِالنُّذُرِ
verses.translation: The people of Lut denied the Noble Messengers.

verses.content: إِنَّا أَرْسَلْنَا عَلَيْهِمْ حَاصِبًا إِلَّا آلَ لُوطٍ ۖ نَّجَّيْنَاهُم بِسَحَرٍ
verses.translation: Indeed We sent a shower of stones upon them, except the family of Lut; We rescued them before dawn.

verses.content: نِّعْمَةً مِّنْ عِندِنَا ۚ كَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِي مَن شَكَرَ
verses.translation: As a reward from Us; this is how We reward one who gives thanks.

verses.content: وَلَقَدْ أَنذَرَهُم بَطْشَتَنَا فَتَمَارَوْا بِالنُّذُرِ
verses.translation: And indeed he had warned them of Our seizure – in response they doubted the warnings.

verses.content: وَلَقَدْ رَاوَدُوهُ عَن ضَيْفِهِ فَطَمَسْنَا أَعْيُنَهُمْ فَذُوقُوا عَذَابِي وَنُذُرِ
verses.translation: And they tried to persuade him regarding his guests – We therefore blinded their eyes, “So taste My punishment, and My warnings.”

verses.content: وَلَقَدْ صَبَّحَهُم بُكْرَةً عَذَابٌ مُّسْتَقِرٌّ
verses.translation: And indeed, the everlasting punishment overcame them early in the morning.

verses.content: فَذُوقُوا عَذَابِي وَنُذُرِ
verses.translation: “So taste My punishment, and My warnings!”

verses.content: وَلَقَدْ يَسَّرْنَا الْقُرْآنَ لِلذِّكْرِ فَهَلْ مِن مُّدَّكِرٍ
verses.translation: And We have indeed made the Qur’an easy to memorise, so is there one who would remember?

verses.content: وَلَقَدْ جَاءَ آلَ فِرْعَوْنَ النُّذُرُ
verses.translation: And indeed the Noble Messengers came to the people of Firaun.

verses.content: كَذَّبُوا بِآيَاتِنَا كُلِّهَا فَأَخَذْنَاهُمْ أَخْذَ عَزِيزٍ مُّقْتَدِرٍ
verses.translation: They denied all Our signs, We therefore seized them – the seizure of the Most Honourable, the All Powerful.

verses.content: أَكُفَّارُكُمْ خَيْرٌ مِّنْ أُولَـٰئِكُمْ أَمْ لَكُم بَرَاءَةٌ فِي الزُّبُرِ
verses.translation: Are your disbelievers better than they were, or have you been given exemption in the Books?

verses.content: أَمْ يَقُولُونَ نَحْنُ جَمِيعٌ مُّنتَصِرٌ
verses.translation: Or they say, “We shall all take revenge as a group.”

verses.content: سَيُهْزَمُ الْجَمْعُ وَيُوَلُّونَ الدُّبُرَ
verses.translation: The group will soon be routed, and will turn their backs to flee.

verses.content: بَلِ السَّاعَةُ مَوْعِدُهُمْ وَالسَّاعَةُ أَدْهَىٰ وَأَمَرُّ
verses.translation: In fact their promise is upon the Last Day – and the Last Day is very severe and very bitter!

verses.content: إِنَّ الْمُجْرِمِينَ فِي ضَلَالٍ وَسُعُرٍ
verses.translation: Indeed the criminals are astray and insane.

verses.content: يَوْمَ يُسْحَبُونَ فِي النَّارِ عَلَىٰ وُجُوهِهِمْ ذُوقُوا مَسَّ سَقَرَ
verses.translation: On the day when they are dragged upon their faces in the fire – “Taste the heat of hell.”

verses.content: إِنَّا كُلَّ شَيْءٍ خَلَقْنَاهُ بِقَدَرٍ
verses.translation: We have indeed created all things by a proper measure.

verses.content: وَمَا أَمْرُنَا إِلَّا وَاحِدَةٌ كَلَمْحٍ بِالْبَصَرِ
verses.translation: And Our command is only a fleeting one – like the batting of an eyelid.

verses.content: وَلَقَدْ أَهْلَكْنَا أَشْيَاعَكُمْ فَهَلْ مِن مُّدَّكِرٍ
verses.translation: And We have indeed destroyed your kind, so is there one who would ponder?

verses.content: وَكُلُّ شَيْءٍ فَعَلُوهُ فِي الزُّبُرِ
verses.translation: And all what they did is in the Books.

verses.content: وَكُلُّ صَغِيرٍ وَكَبِيرٍ مُّسْتَطَرٌ
verses.translation: And every small and great thing is recorded.

verses.content: إِنَّ الْمُتَّقِينَ فِي جَنَّاتٍ وَنَهَرٍ
verses.translation: Indeed the pious are amidst Gardens and springs.

verses.content: فِي مَقْعَدِ صِدْقٍ عِندَ مَلِيكٍ مُّقْتَدِرٍ
verses.translation: Seated in an assembly of the Truth, in the presence of Allah, the Omnipotent King.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ الرَّحْمَـٰنُ
verses.translation: Allah, the Most Gracious

verses.content: عَلَّمَ الْقُرْآنَ
verses.translation: Has taught the Qur’an to His beloved Prophet (Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him).

verses.content: خَلَقَ الْإِنسَانَ
verses.translation: Has created Prophet Mohammed (peace and blessings be upon him) as the soul of mankind.

verses.content: عَلَّمَهُ الْبَيَانَ
verses.translation: Has taught him the knowledge of the past and the future.

verses.content: الشَّمْسُ وَالْقَمَرُ بِحُسْبَانٍ
verses.translation: The sun and the moon are scheduled.

verses.content: وَالنَّجْمُ وَالشَّجَرُ يَسْجُدَانِ
verses.translation: And the plants and the trees prostrate (for Him).

verses.content: وَالسَّمَاءَ رَفَعَهَا وَوَضَعَ الْمِيزَانَ
verses.translation: And Allah has raised the sky; and He has set the balance.

verses.content: أَلَّا تَطْغَوْا فِي الْمِيزَانِ
verses.translation: In order that you may not corrupt the balance.

verses.content: وَأَقِيمُوا الْوَزْنَ بِالْقِسْطِ وَلَا تُخْسِرُوا الْمِيزَانَ
verses.translation: And establish the measures justly, nor decrease the due weight.

verses.content: وَالْأَرْضَ وَضَعَهَا لِلْأَنَامِ
verses.translation: And He appointed the earth for the creatures.

verses.content: فِيهَا فَاكِهَةٌ وَالنَّخْلُ ذَاتُ الْأَكْمَامِ
verses.translation: In which are fruits, and covered dates.

verses.content: وَالْحَبُّ ذُو الْعَصْفِ وَالرَّيْحَانُ
verses.translation: And grain covered with husk, and fragrant flowers.

verses.content: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: So O men and jinns! Which favour of your Lord will you deny?

verses.content: خَلَقَ الْإِنسَانَ مِن صَلْصَالٍ كَالْفَخَّارِ
verses.translation: He created man from clay like that of earthenware.

verses.content: وَخَلَقَ الْجَانَّ مِن مَّارِجٍ مِّن نَّارٍ
verses.translation: And created jinn from the flame of fire.

verses.content: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: So O men and jinns! Which favour of your Lord will you deny?

verses.content: رَبُّ الْمَشْرِقَيْنِ وَرَبُّ الْمَغْرِبَيْنِ
verses.translation: Lord of both the Easts, and Lord of both the Wests!

verses.content: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: So O men and jinns! Which favour of your Lord will you deny?

verses.content: مَرَجَ الْبَحْرَيْنِ يَلْتَقِيَانِ
verses.translation: He has set flowing two seas that appear to meet.

verses.content: بَيْنَهُمَا بَرْزَخٌ لَّا يَبْغِيَانِ
verses.translation: Whereas there is a barrier between them so they cannot encroach upon one another.

verses.content: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: So O men and jinns! Which favour of your Lord will you deny?
