verses.translation: Allah – there is none worthy of worship except Him; and only upon Allah must the Muslims rely.

verses.content: يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا إِنَّ مِنْ أَزْوَاجِكُمْ وَأَوْلَادِكُمْ عَدُوًّا لَّكُمْ فَاحْذَرُوهُمْ ۚ وَإِن تَعْفُوا وَتَصْفَحُوا وَتَغْفِرُوا فَإِنَّ اللَّهَ غَفُورٌ رَّحِيمٌ
verses.translation: O People who Believe! Some of your wives and children are your enemies, therefore be wary of them; and if you pardon and overlook and forgive, then indeed Allah is Oft Forgiving, Most Merciful.

verses.content: إِنَّمَا أَمْوَالُكُمْ وَأَوْلَادُكُمْ فِتْنَةٌ ۚ وَاللَّهُ عِندَهُ أَجْرٌ عَظِيمٌ
verses.translation: Your wealth and your children are just a test; and with Allah is a tremendous reward.

verses.content: فَاتَّقُوا اللَّهَ مَا اسْتَطَعْتُمْ وَاسْمَعُوا وَأَطِيعُوا وَأَنفِقُوا خَيْرًا لِّأَنفُسِكُمْ ۗ وَمَن يُوقَ شُحَّ نَفْسِهِ فَأُولَـٰئِكَ هُمُ الْمُفْلِحُونَ
verses.translation: Therefore fear Allah as much as possible, and heed the commands, and obey, and spend in Allah’s cause, for your own good; and whoever is rescued from the greed of his own soul – is they who will be successful.

verses.content: إِن تُقْرِضُوا اللَّهَ قَرْضًا حَسَنًا يُضَاعِفْهُ لَكُمْ وَيَغْفِرْ لَكُمْ ۚ وَاللَّهُ شَكُورٌ حَلِيمٌ
verses.translation: If you lend an excellent loan to Allah, He will double it for you and forgive you; and Allah is Most Appreciative, Most Forbearing.

verses.content: عَالِمُ الْغَيْبِ وَالشَّهَادَةِ الْعَزِيزُ الْحَكِيمُ
verses.translation: The All Knowing of all things hidden and visible, the Most Honourable, the Wise.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ يَا أَيُّهَا النَّبِيُّ إِذَا طَلَّقْتُمُ النِّسَاءَ فَطَلِّقُوهُنَّ لِعِدَّتِهِنَّ وَأَحْصُوا الْعِدَّةَ ۖ وَاتَّقُوا اللَّهَ رَبَّكُمْ ۖ لَا تُخْرِجُوهُنَّ مِن بُيُوتِهِنَّ وَلَا يَخْرُجْنَ إِلَّا أَن يَأْتِينَ بِفَاحِشَةٍ مُّبَيِّنَةٍ ۚ وَتِلْكَ حُدُودُ اللَّهِ ۚ وَمَن يَتَعَدَّ حُدُودَ اللَّهِ فَقَدْ ظَلَمَ نَفْسَهُ ۚ لَا تَدْرِي لَعَلَّ اللَّهَ يُحْدِثُ بَعْدَ ذَٰلِكَ أَمْرًا
verses.translation: O dear Prophet (Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him)! When you people divorce women, divorce them at the time of their completing the appointed period, and keep count of the appointed period; and fear Allah, your Lord; do not expel them from their houses during the appointed period nor should they leave on their own, unless they bring about some matter of blatant lewdness; and these are the limits of Allah; and whoever crosses Allah’s limits has indeed wronged himself; do you not know, it is likely that Allah may send some new decree after this?

verses.content: فَإِذَا بَلَغْنَ أَجَلَهُنَّ فَأَمْسِكُوهُنَّ بِمَعْرُوفٍ أَوْ فَارِقُوهُنَّ بِمَعْرُوفٍ وَأَشْهِدُوا ذَوَيْ عَدْلٍ مِّنكُمْ وَأَقِيمُوا الشَّهَادَةَ لِلَّهِ ۚ ذَٰلِكُمْ يُوعَظُ بِهِ مَن كَانَ يُؤْمِنُ بِاللَّهِ وَالْيَوْمِ الْآخِرِ ۚ وَمَن يَتَّقِ اللَّهَ يَجْعَل لَّهُ مَخْرَجًا
verses.translation: So when they are about to reach their appointed term, hold them back with kindness or separate them with kindness, and make two just men among you as witnesses, and establish the testimony for Allah; with this is advised whoever believes in Allah and the Last Day; and whoever fears Allah – Allah will create for him a way of deliverance.

verses.content: وَيَرْزُقْهُ مِنْ حَيْثُ لَا يَحْتَسِبُ ۚ وَمَن يَتَوَكَّلْ عَلَى اللَّهِ فَهُوَ حَسْبُهُ ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ بَالِغُ أَمْرِهِ ۚ قَدْ جَعَلَ اللَّهُ لِكُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدْرًا
verses.translation: And will provide him sustenance from a place he had never expected; and whoever relies on Allah – then Allah is Sufficient for him; indeed Allah will accomplish His command; indeed Allah has set a proper measure for all things.

verses.content: وَاللَّائِي يَئِسْنَ مِنَ الْمَحِيضِ مِن نِّسَائِكُمْ إِنِ ارْتَبْتُمْ فَعِدَّتُهُنَّ ثَلَاثَةُ أَشْهُرٍ وَاللَّائِي لَمْ يَحِضْنَ ۚ وَأُولَاتُ الْأَحْمَالِ أَجَلُهُنَّ أَن يَضَعْنَ حَمْلَهُنَّ ۚ وَمَن يَتَّقِ اللَّهَ يَجْعَل لَّهُ مِنْ أَمْرِهِ يُسْرًا
verses.translation: And for those of your women who have no hope of menstruation, if you doubt, the appointed period is three months – and also for those who have not yet had menstruation; and the appointed period for the pregnant women is up to the time they deliver their burden; and whoever fears Allah – Allah will create ease for him in his affairs.

verses.content: ذَٰلِكَ أَمْرُ اللَّهِ أَنزَلَهُ إِلَيْكُمْ ۚ وَمَن يَتَّقِ اللَّهَ يُكَفِّرْ عَنْهُ سَيِّئَاتِهِ وَيُعْظِمْ لَهُ أَجْرًا
verses.translation: This is Allah’s command that He has sent down towards you; and whoever fears Allah – Allah will relieve his sins and bestow upon him a great reward.

verses.content: أَسْكِنُوهُنَّ مِنْ حَيْثُ سَكَنتُم مِّن وُجْدِكُمْ وَلَا تُضَارُّوهُنَّ لِتُضَيِّقُوا عَلَيْهِنَّ ۚ وَإِن كُنَّ أُولَاتِ حَمْلٍ فَأَنفِقُوا عَلَيْهِنَّ حَتَّىٰ يَضَعْنَ حَمْلَهُنَّ ۚ فَإِنْ أَرْضَعْنَ لَكُمْ فَآتُوهُنَّ أُجُورَهُنَّ ۖ وَأْتَمِرُوا بَيْنَكُم بِمَعْرُوفٍ ۖ وَإِن تَعَاسَرْتُمْ فَسَتُرْضِعُ لَهُ أُخْرَىٰ
verses.translation: Accommodate them where you also reside, according to your means, and do not harass them to make it difficult upon them; and if they are pregnant, give them the provision till they deliver their burden; then if they suckle the child for you, pay them its due; and consult with each other in a reasonable manner; and if you create hardship for one another, the child will get another breast feeding nurse.

verses.content: لِيُنفِقْ ذُو سَعَةٍ مِّن سَعَتِهِ ۖ وَمَن قُدِرَ عَلَيْهِ رِزْقُهُ فَلْيُنفِقْ مِمَّا آتَاهُ اللَّهُ ۚ لَا يُكَلِّفُ اللَّهُ نَفْسًا إِلَّا مَا آتَاهَا ۚ سَيَجْعَلُ اللَّهُ بَعْدَ عُسْرٍ يُسْرًا
verses.translation: Whoever has the capacity must give provisions according to his means; and the one whose sustenance is restricted upon him, must give provisions from what Allah has given him; Allah does not burden any soul except according to what He has given it; Allah will soon, after the hardship, create ease.

verses.content: وَكَأَيِّن مِّن قَرْيَةٍ عَتَتْ عَنْ أَمْرِ رَبِّهَا وَرُسُلِهِ فَحَاسَبْنَاهَا حِسَابًا شَدِيدًا وَعَذَّبْنَاهَا عَذَابًا نُّكْرًا
verses.translation: And many a town existed that rebelled against the command of its Lord and His Noble Messengers, so We took a severe account from it – and struck them with a dreadful punishment.

verses.content: فَذَاقَتْ وَبَالَ أَمْرِهَا وَكَانَ عَاقِبَةُ أَمْرِهَا خُسْرًا
verses.translation: They therefore tasted the evil outcome of their deeds, and the outcome of their deeds was a loss.

verses.content: أَعَدَّ اللَّهُ لَهُمْ عَذَابًا شَدِيدًا ۖ فَاتَّقُوا اللَّهَ يَا أُولِي الْأَلْبَابِ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا ۚ قَدْ أَنزَلَ اللَّهُ إِلَيْكُمْ ذِكْرًا
verses.translation: Allah has kept prepared a severe punishment for them – therefore fear Allah, O men of intellect! O People who Believe! Allah has sent down a Remembrance (or an honour) for you. (The Holy Prophet is a Remembrance from Allah.)

verses.content: رَّسُولًا يَتْلُو عَلَيْكُمْ آيَاتِ اللَّهِ مُبَيِّنَاتٍ لِّيُخْرِجَ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَعَمِلُوا الصَّالِحَاتِ مِنَ الظُّلُمَاتِ إِلَى النُّورِ ۚ وَمَن يُؤْمِن بِاللَّهِ وَيَعْمَلْ صَالِحًا يُدْخِلْهُ جَنَّاتٍ تَجْرِي مِن تَحْتِهَا الْأَنْهَارُ خَالِدِينَ فِيهَا أَبَدًا ۖ قَدْ أَحْسَنَ اللَّهُ لَهُ رِزْقًا
verses.translation: The Noble Messenger who recites the clear verses of Allah to you, so that he may take those who accept faith and do good deeds, away from the realms of darkness towards light; and whoever accepts faith in Allah and does good deeds, Allah will admit him into Gardens beneath which rivers flow, to abide in them for ever and ever; indeed Allah has kept an excellent sustenance for him.

verses.content: اللَّهُ الَّذِي خَلَقَ سَبْعَ سَمَاوَاتٍ وَمِنَ الْأَرْضِ مِثْلَهُنَّ يَتَنَزَّلُ الْأَمْرُ بَيْنَهُنَّ لِتَعْلَمُوا أَنَّ اللَّهَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدِيرٌ وَأَنَّ اللَّهَ قَدْ أَحَاطَ بِكُلِّ شَيْءٍ عِلْمًا
verses.translation: It is Allah Who has created the seven heavens, and seven earthly worlds like them; the command descends within them, so that you may know that Allah is Able to do all things, and that Allah’s knowledge encompasses everything.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ يَا أَيُّهَا النَّبِيُّ لِمَ تُحَرِّمُ مَا أَحَلَّ اللَّهُ لَكَ ۖ تَبْتَغِي مَرْضَاتَ أَزْوَاجِكَ ۚ وَاللَّهُ غَفُورٌ رَّحِيمٌ
verses.translation: O dear Prophet (Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him)! Why do you forbid for yourself the things that Allah has made lawful for you? You wish to please some of your wives; and Allah is Oft Forgiving, Most Merciful.

verses.content: قَدْ فَرَضَ اللَّهُ لَكُمْ تَحِلَّةَ أَيْمَانِكُمْ ۚ وَاللَّهُ مَوْلَاكُمْ ۖ وَهُوَ الْعَلِيمُ الْحَكِيمُ
verses.translation: Allah has ordained expiation for your oaths; and Allah is your Master; and Allah is the All Knowing, the Wise.

verses.content: وَإِذْ أَسَرَّ النَّبِيُّ إِلَىٰ بَعْضِ أَزْوَاجِهِ حَدِيثًا فَلَمَّا نَبَّأَتْ بِهِ وَأَظْهَرَهُ اللَّهُ عَلَيْهِ عَرَّفَ بَعْضَهُ وَأَعْرَضَ عَن بَعْضٍ ۖ فَلَمَّا نَبَّأَهَا بِهِ قَالَتْ مَنْ أَنبَأَكَ هَـٰذَا ۖ قَالَ نَبَّأَنِيَ الْعَلِيمُ الْخَبِيرُ
verses.translation: And when the Holy Prophet confided a matter to one of his wives; so when she disclosed it and Allah conveyed this to the Holy Prophet, he told her part of it and held back a part; so when the Holy Prophet informed her about it, she said, “Who informed you?”; he said, “The All Knowing, the All Aware has informed me.”

verses.content: إِن تَتُوبَا إِلَى اللَّهِ فَقَدْ صَغَتْ قُلُوبُكُمَا ۖ وَإِن تَظَاهَرَا عَلَيْهِ فَإِنَّ اللَّهَ هُوَ مَوْلَاهُ وَجِبْرِيلُ وَصَالِحُ الْمُؤْمِنِينَ ۖ وَالْمَلَائِكَةُ بَعْدَ ذَٰلِكَ ظَهِيرٌ
verses.translation: If you both, the wives of the Holy Prophet, incline towards Allah, for indeed your hearts have deviated a little; and if you come together against him (the Holy Prophet – peace and blessings be upon him) then indeed Allah is his Supporter, and Jibreel and the virtuous believers are also his aides; and in addition the angels are also his aides. (Allah has created several supporters for the believers.)

verses.content: عَسَىٰ رَبُّهُ إِن طَلَّقَكُنَّ أَن يُبْدِلَهُ أَزْوَاجًا خَيْرًا مِّنكُنَّ مُسْلِمَاتٍ مُّؤْمِنَاتٍ قَانِتَاتٍ تَائِبَاتٍ عَابِدَاتٍ سَائِحَاتٍ ثَيِّبَاتٍ وَأَبْكَارًا
verses.translation: It is likely that, if he divorces you, his Lord will give him wives better than you in your place -widows and maidens who are obedient, believing, respectful, penitent, serving and fasting.

verses.content: يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا قُوا أَنفُسَكُمْ وَأَهْلِيكُمْ نَارًا وَقُودُهَا النَّاسُ وَالْحِجَارَةُ عَلَيْهَا مَلَائِكَةٌ غِلَاظٌ شِدَادٌ لَّا يَعْصُونَ اللَّهَ مَا أَمَرَهُمْ وَيَفْعَلُونَ مَا يُؤْمَرُونَ
verses.translation: O People who Believe! Save yourselves and your families from the fire, the fuel of which is men and stones – appointed over it are the extremely strict angels, who do not refuse the command of Allah and carry out whatever they are commanded.

verses.content: يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا لَا تَعْتَذِرُوا الْيَوْمَ ۖ إِنَّمَا تُجْزَوْنَ مَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ
verses.translation: “O disbelievers! Do not feign excuses this day; you will only be repaid what you used to do.”

verses.content: يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا تُوبُوا إِلَى اللَّهِ تَوْبَةً نَّصُوحًا عَسَىٰ رَبُّكُمْ أَن يُكَفِّرَ عَنكُمْ سَيِّئَاتِكُمْ وَيُدْخِلَكُمْ جَنَّاتٍ تَجْرِي مِن تَحْتِهَا الْأَنْهَارُ يَوْمَ لَا يُخْزِي اللَّهُ النَّبِيَّ وَالَّذِينَ آمَنُوا مَعَهُ ۖ نُورُهُمْ يَسْعَىٰ بَيْنَ أَيْدِيهِمْ وَبِأَيْمَانِهِمْ يَقُولُونَ رَبَّنَا أَتْمِمْ لَنَا نُورَنَا وَاغْفِرْ لَنَا ۖ إِنَّكَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدِيرٌ
verses.translation: O People who Believe! Incline towards Allah in a repentance that becomes a guidance for the future; it is likely that your Lord will relieve you of your sins and admit you into Gardens beneath which rivers flow – on the day when Allah will not humble the Prophet and the believers along with him; their light will be running ahead of them and on their right; they will say, “Our Lord! Perfect our light for us, and forgive us; indeed You are Able to do all things.”

verses.content: يَا أَيُّهَا النَّبِيُّ جَاهِدِ الْكُفَّارَ وَالْمُنَافِقِينَ وَاغْلُظْ عَلَيْهِمْ ۚ وَمَأْوَاهُمْ جَهَنَّمُ ۖ وَبِئْسَ الْمَصِيرُ
verses.translation: O dear Prophet (Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him), wage holy war against the disbelievers and the hypocrites, and be strict with them; and their destination is hell; and what a wretched outcome!

verses.content: ضَرَبَ اللَّهُ مَثَلًا لِّلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا امْرَأَتَ نُوحٍ وَامْرَأَتَ لُوطٍ ۖ كَانَتَا تَحْتَ عَبْدَيْنِ مِنْ عِبَادِنَا صَالِحَيْنِ فَخَانَتَاهُمَا فَلَمْ يُغْنِيَا عَنْهُمَا مِنَ اللَّهِ شَيْئًا وَقِيلَ ادْخُلَا النَّارَ مَعَ الدَّاخِلِينَ
verses.translation: Allah illustrates the example of the disbelievers – the wife of Nooh and the wife of Lut; they were bonded in marriage to two of Our bondmen deserving Our proximity – they then betrayed them so they did not benefit them the least against Allah and it was declared, “Both of you women enter the fire, along with others who enter.”

verses.content: وَضَرَبَ اللَّهُ مَثَلًا لِّلَّذِينَ آمَنُوا امْرَأَتَ فِرْعَوْنَ إِذْ قَالَتْ رَبِّ ابْنِ لِي عِندَكَ بَيْتًا فِي الْجَنَّةِ وَنَجِّنِي مِن فِرْعَوْنَ وَعَمَلِهِ وَنَجِّنِي مِنَ الْقَوْمِ الظَّالِمِينَ
verses.translation: And Allah illustrates an example of the Muslims – the wife of Firaun; when she prayed, “My Lord! Build a house for me near You, in Paradise, and deliver me from Firaun and his works, and rescue me from the unjust people.”

verses.content: وَمَرْيَمَ ابْنَتَ عِمْرَانَ الَّتِي أَحْصَنَتْ فَرْجَهَا فَنَفَخْنَا فِيهِ مِن رُّوحِنَا وَصَدَّقَتْ بِكَلِمَاتِ رَبِّهَا وَكُتُبِهِ وَكَانَتْ مِنَ الْقَانِتِينَ
verses.translation: And the example of Maryam the daughter of Imran, who guarded her chastity – We therefore breathed into her a Spirit from Ourselves – and she testified for the Words of her Lord and His Books, and was among the obedient.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ تَبَارَكَ الَّذِي بِيَدِهِ الْمُلْكُ وَهُوَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدِيرٌ
verses.translation: Most Auspicious is He in Whose control is the entire kingship; and He is Able to do all things.

verses.content: الَّذِي خَلَقَ الْمَوْتَ وَالْحَيَاةَ لِيَبْلُوَكُمْ أَيُّكُمْ أَحْسَنُ عَمَلًا ۚ وَهُوَ الْعَزِيزُ الْغَفُورُ
verses.translation: The One Who created death and life to test you – who among you has the better deeds; and He only is the Most Honourable, the Oft Forgiving.

verses.content: الَّذِي خَلَقَ سَبْعَ سَمَاوَاتٍ طِبَاقًا ۖ مَّا تَرَىٰ فِي خَلْقِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ مِن تَفَاوُتٍ ۖ فَارْجِعِ الْبَصَرَ هَلْ تَرَىٰ مِن فُطُورٍ
verses.translation: The One Who created the seven heavens atop each other; do you see any discrepancy in the creation of the Most Gracious? Therefore lift your gaze – do you see any cracks?

verses.content: ثُمَّ ارْجِعِ الْبَصَرَ كَرَّتَيْنِ يَنقَلِبْ إِلَيْكَ الْبَصَرُ خَاسِئًا وَهُوَ حَسِيرٌ
verses.translation: Then lift your gaze again, your gaze will return towards you, unsuccessful and weak.

verses.content: وَلَقَدْ زَيَّنَّا السَّمَاءَ الدُّنْيَا بِمَصَابِيحَ وَجَعَلْنَاهَا رُجُومًا لِّلشَّيَاطِينِ ۖ وَأَعْتَدْنَا لَهُمْ عَذَابَ السَّعِيرِ
verses.translation: And indeed We have beautified the lower heaven with lamps, and have made them weapons against the devils, and have kept prepared for them the punishment of the blazing fire.

verses.content: وَلِلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا بِرَبِّهِمْ عَذَابُ جَهَنَّمَ ۖ وَبِئْسَ الْمَصِيرُ
verses.translation: And for those who disbelieved in their Lord, is the punishment of hell; and what a wretched outcome!

verses.content: إِذَا أُلْقُوا فِيهَا سَمِعُوا لَهَا شَهِيقًا وَهِيَ تَفُورُ
verses.translation: They will hear it hissing when they will be thrown into it, and it is boiling.

verses.content: تَكَادُ تَمَيَّزُ مِنَ الْغَيْظِ ۖ كُلَّمَا أُلْقِيَ فِيهَا فَوْجٌ سَأَلَهُمْ خَزَنَتُهَا أَلَمْ يَأْتِكُمْ نَذِيرٌ
verses.translation: As if about to explode with rage; whenever a group is thrown into it, the guardians of hell will ask them, “Did not a Herald of Warning come to you?”

verses.content: قَالُوا بَلَىٰ قَدْ جَاءَنَا نَذِيرٌ فَكَذَّبْنَا وَقُلْنَا مَا نَزَّلَ اللَّهُ مِن شَيْءٍ إِنْ أَنتُمْ إِلَّا فِي ضَلَالٍ كَبِيرٍ
verses.translation: They will say, “Yes, why not – indeed a Herald of Warning did come to us – in response we denied and said ‘Allah has not sent down anything – you are not except in a great error’.”

verses.content: وَقَالُوا لَوْ كُنَّا نَسْمَعُ أَوْ نَعْقِلُ مَا كُنَّا فِي أَصْحَابِ السَّعِيرِ
verses.translation: And they will say, “Had we listened or understood, we would not have been among the people of hell.”

verses.content: فَاعْتَرَفُوا بِذَنبِهِمْ فَسُحْقًا لِّأَصْحَابِ السَّعِيرِ
verses.translation: So now they admit their sins! Therefore accursed be the people of hell!

verses.content: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ يَخْشَوْنَ رَبَّهُم بِالْغَيْبِ لَهُم مَّغْفِرَةٌ وَأَجْرٌ كَبِيرٌ
verses.translation: Indeed for those who fear their Lord without seeing is forgiveness, and a great reward.

verses.content: وَأَسِرُّوا قَوْلَكُمْ أَوِ اجْهَرُوا بِهِ ۖ إِنَّهُ عَلِيمٌ بِذَاتِ الصُّدُورِ
verses.translation: And whether you speak softly or proclaim it aloud; He indeed knows what lies within the hearts!

verses.content: أَلَا يَعْلَمُ مَنْ خَلَقَ وَهُوَ اللَّطِيفُ الْخَبِيرُ
verses.translation: What! Will He Who has created not know? Whereas He knows every detail, the All Aware!

verses.content: هُوَ الَّذِي جَعَلَ لَكُمُ الْأَرْضَ ذَلُولًا فَامْشُوا فِي مَنَاكِبِهَا وَكُلُوا مِن رِّزْقِهِ ۖ وَإِلَيْهِ النُّشُورُ
verses.translation: It is He Who subjected the earth for you, therefore tread its paths and eat from Allah’s sustenance; and towards Him is the resurrection.

verses.content: أَأَمِنتُم مَّن فِي السَّمَاءِ أَن يَخْسِفَ بِكُمُ الْأَرْضَ فَإِذَا هِيَ تَمُورُ
verses.translation: Have you become unafraid of the One Who controls the heavens, that He will not cause you to sink into the earth when it trembles?

verses.content: أَمْ أَمِنتُم مَّن فِي السَّمَاءِ أَن يُرْسِلَ عَلَيْكُمْ حَاصِبًا ۖ فَسَتَعْلَمُونَ كَيْفَ نَذِيرِ
verses.translation: Or have you become unafraid of the One Who controls the heavens, that He will not send a torrent of stones upon you? So now you will realise, how My warning turned out!

verses.content: وَلَقَدْ كَذَّبَ الَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِهِمْ فَكَيْفَ كَانَ نَكِيرِ
verses.translation: And indeed those before them had denied – therefore how did My rejection turn out!

verses.content: أَوَلَمْ يَرَوْا إِلَى الطَّيْرِ فَوْقَهُمْ صَافَّاتٍ وَيَقْبِضْنَ ۚ مَا يُمْسِكُهُنَّ إِلَّا الرَّحْمَـٰنُ ۚ إِنَّهُ بِكُلِّ شَيْءٍ بَصِيرٌ
verses.translation: And did they not see the birds above them, spreading and closing their wings? None except the Most Gracious holds them up; indeed He sees all things.

verses.content: أَمَّنْ هَـٰذَا الَّذِي هُوَ جُندٌ لَّكُمْ يَنصُرُكُم مِّن دُونِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ ۚ إِنِ الْكَافِرُونَ إِلَّا فِي غُرُورٍ
verses.translation: Or which army do you have that will help you against the Most Gracious? The disbelievers are in nothing except an illusion.

verses.content: أَمَّنْ هَـٰذَا الَّذِي يَرْزُقُكُمْ إِنْ أَمْسَكَ رِزْقَهُ ۚ بَل لَّجُّوا فِي عُتُوٍّ وَنُفُورٍ
verses.translation: Or who is such that will give you sustenance if Allah stops His sustenance? In fact they persist in rebellion and hatred.

verses.content: أَفَمَن يَمْشِي مُكِبًّا عَلَىٰ وَجْهِهِ أَهْدَىٰ أَمَّن يَمْشِي سَوِيًّا عَلَىٰ صِرَاطٍ مُّسْتَقِيمٍ
verses.translation: So is one who walks inverted upon his face more rightly guided, or one who walks upright on the Straight Path?

verses.content: قُلْ هُوَ الَّذِي أَنشَأَكُمْ وَجَعَلَ لَكُمُ السَّمْعَ وَالْأَبْصَارَ وَالْأَفْئِدَةَ ۖ قَلِيلًا مَّا تَشْكُرُونَ
verses.translation: Proclaim (O dear Prophet Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him), “It is He Who created you, and made ears and eyes and hearts for you; very little thanks do you offer!”

verses.content: قُلْ هُوَ الَّذِي ذَرَأَكُمْ فِي الْأَرْضِ وَإِلَيْهِ تُحْشَرُونَ
verses.translation: Say, “It is He Who has spread you out in the earth, and towards Him you will be raised.”

verses.content: وَيَقُولُونَ مَتَىٰ هَـٰذَا الْوَعْدُ إِن كُنتُمْ صَادِقِينَ
verses.translation: And they say, “When will this promise come, if you are truthful?”

verses.content: قُلْ إِنَّمَا الْعِلْمُ عِندَ اللَّهِ وَإِنَّمَا أَنَا نَذِيرٌ مُّبِينٌ
verses.translation: Proclaim, “Surely Allah has its knowledge; and I am only a Herald of plain warning.”

verses.content: فَلَمَّا رَأَوْهُ زُلْفَةً سِيئَتْ وُجُوهُ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا وَقِيلَ هَـٰذَا الَّذِي كُنتُم بِهِ تَدَّعُونَ
verses.translation: So when they will see it close, the faces of the disbelievers will become ghastly, and it will be declared, “This is what you were demanding.”

verses.content: قُلْ أَرَأَيْتُمْ إِنْ أَهْلَكَنِيَ اللَّهُ وَمَن مَّعِيَ أَوْ رَحِمَنَا فَمَن يُجِيرُ الْكَافِرِينَ مِنْ عَذَابٍ أَلِيمٍ
verses.translation: Say (O dear Prophet Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him), “What is your opinion –Allah may either destroy me and those with me, or have mercy on us – so who is such that will protect the disbelievers from the painful punishment?”

verses.content: قُلْ هُوَ الرَّحْمَـٰنُ آمَنَّا بِهِ وَعَلَيْهِ تَوَكَّلْنَا ۖ فَسَتَعْلَمُونَ مَنْ هُوَ فِي ضَلَالٍ مُّبِينٍ
verses.translation: Proclaim, “He only is the Most Gracious – we have accepted faith in Him and have relied only upon Him; so you will now realise who is in open error.”

verses.content: قُلْ أَرَأَيْتُمْ إِنْ أَصْبَحَ مَاؤُكُمْ غَوْرًا فَمَن يَأْتِيكُم بِمَاءٍ مَّعِينٍ
verses.translation: Say, “What is your opinion – if in the morning all your water were to sink into the earth, then who is such who can bring you water flowing before you?”

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ ن ۚ وَالْقَلَمِ وَمَا يَسْطُرُونَ
verses.translation: Nuun* – by oath of the pen and by oath of what is written by it. (Alphabet of the Arabic language; Allah and to whomever He reveals, know their precise meanings.)

verses.content: مَا أَنتَ بِنِعْمَةِ رَبِّكَ بِمَجْنُونٍ
verses.translation: You are not insane, by the munificence of your Lord.

verses.content: وَإِنَّ لَكَ لَأَجْرًا غَيْرَ مَمْنُونٍ
verses.translation: And indeed for you is an unlimited reward.

verses.content: وَإِنَّكَ لَعَلَىٰ خُلُقٍ عَظِيمٍ
verses.translation: And indeed you possess an exemplary character.

verses.content: فَسَتُبْصِرُ وَيُبْصِرُونَ
verses.translation: So very soon, you will see and they too will realise –

verses.content: بِأَييِّكُمُ الْمَفْتُونُ
verses.translation: - That who among you was insane.

verses.content: إِنَّ رَبَّكَ هُوَ أَعْلَمُ بِمَن ضَلَّ عَن سَبِيلِهِ وَهُوَ أَعْلَمُ بِالْمُهْتَدِينَ
verses.translation: Indeed your Lord well knows those who have strayed from His path, and He well knows those who are upon guidance.

verses.content: فَلَا تُطِعِ الْمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.translation: Therefore do not listen to the deniers.

verses.content: وَدُّوا لَوْ تُدْهِنُ فَيُدْهِنُونَ
verses.translation: They wish that in some way you may yield, so they too might soften their stand.

verses.content: وَلَا تُطِعْ كُلَّ حَلَّافٍ مَّهِينٍ
verses.translation: Nor ever listen to any excessive oath maker, ignoble person.

verses.content: هَمَّازٍ مَّشَّاءٍ بِنَمِيمٍ
verses.translation: The excessively insulting one, spreader of spite.

verses.content: مَّنَّاعٍ لِّلْخَيْرِ مُعْتَدٍ أَثِيمٍ
verses.translation: One who excessively forbids the good, transgressor, sinner.

verses.content: عُتُلٍّ بَعْدَ ذَٰلِكَ زَنِيمٍ
verses.translation: Foul mouthed, and in addition to all this, of improper lineage.

verses.content: أَن كَانَ ذَا مَالٍ وَبَنِينَ
verses.translation: Because he* has some wealth and sons. (Walid bin Mugaira, who cursed the Holy Prophet.)

verses.content: إِذَا تُتْلَىٰ عَلَيْهِ آيَاتُنَا قَالَ أَسَاطِيرُ الْأَوَّلِينَ
verses.translation: When Our verses are recited to him, he says, “These are stories of earlier people.”

verses.content: سَنَسِمُهُ عَلَى الْخُرْطُومِ
verses.translation: We will soon singe his pig-nose.

verses.content: إِنَّا بَلَوْنَاهُمْ كَمَا بَلَوْنَا أَصْحَابَ الْجَنَّةِ إِذْ أَقْسَمُوا لَيَصْرِمُنَّهَا مُصْبِحِينَ
verses.translation: We have indeed tested them the way We had tested the owners of the garden when they swore that they would reap its harvest the next morning.

verses.content: وَلَا يَسْتَثْنُونَ
verses.translation: And they did not say, “If Allah wills”.

verses.content: فَطَافَ عَلَيْهَا طَائِفٌ مِّن رَّبِّكَ وَهُمْ نَائِمُونَ
verses.translation: So an envoy from your Lord completed his round upon the garden, whilst they were sleeping.

verses.content: فَأَصْبَحَتْ كَالصَّرِيمِ
verses.translation: So in the morning it became as if harvested.

verses.content: فَتَنَادَوْا مُصْبِحِينَ
verses.translation: They then called out to each other at daybreak.

verses.content: أَنِ اغْدُوا عَلَىٰ حَرْثِكُمْ إِن كُنتُمْ صَارِمِينَ
verses.translation: That, “Go to your fields at early morn, if you want to harvest.”

verses.content: فَانطَلَقُوا وَهُمْ يَتَخَافَتُونَ
verses.translation: So they went off, while whispering to one another.

verses.content: أَن لَّا يَدْخُلَنَّهَا الْيَوْمَ عَلَيْكُم مِّسْكِينٌ
verses.translation: “Make sure that no needy person enters your garden this day.”

verses.content: وَغَدَوْا عَلَىٰ حَرْدٍ قَادِرِينَ
verses.translation: And they left at early morn, assuming they were in control of their purpose.

verses.content: فَلَمَّا رَأَوْهَا قَالُوا إِنَّا لَضَالُّونَ
verses.translation: Then when they saw it, they said, “We have indeed strayed.”

verses.content: بَلْ نَحْنُ مَحْرُومُونَ
verses.translation: “In fact, we are unfortunate.”

verses.content: قَالَ أَوْسَطُهُمْ أَلَمْ أَقُل لَّكُمْ لَوْلَا تُسَبِّحُونَ
verses.translation: The best among them said, “Did I not tell you, ‘Why do you not proclaim His purity?’”

verses.content: قَالُوا سُبْحَانَ رَبِّنَا إِنَّا كُنَّا ظَالِمِينَ
verses.translation: They said, “Purity is to our Lord – we have indeed been unjust.”

verses.content: فَأَقْبَلَ بَعْضُهُمْ عَلَىٰ بَعْضٍ يَتَلَاوَمُونَ
verses.translation: So they came towards each other, blaming.

verses.content: قَالُوا يَا وَيْلَنَا إِنَّا كُنَّا طَاغِينَ
verses.translation: They said, “Woe to us – we were indeed rebellious.”

verses.content: عَسَىٰ رَبُّنَا أَن يُبْدِلَنَا خَيْرًا مِّنْهَا إِنَّا إِلَىٰ رَبِّنَا رَاغِبُونَ
verses.translation: “Hopefully, our Lord will give us a better replacement than this – we now incline towards our Lord.”

verses.content: كَذَٰلِكَ الْعَذَابُ ۖ وَلَعَذَابُ الْآخِرَةِ أَكْبَرُ ۚ لَوْ كَانُوا يَعْلَمُونَ
verses.translation: Such is the punishment; and indeed the punishment of the Hereafter is the greatest, if only they knew!

verses.content: إِنَّ لِلْمُتَّقِينَ عِندَ رَبِّهِمْ جَنَّاتِ النَّعِيمِ
verses.translation: Indeed for the pious, with their Lord, are Gardens of Serenity.

verses.content: أَفَنَجْعَلُ الْمُسْلِمِينَ كَالْمُجْرِمِينَ
verses.translation: Shall We equate the Muslims to the guilty?

verses.content: مَا لَكُمْ كَيْفَ تَحْكُمُونَ
verses.translation: What is the matter with you? What sort of a judgement you impose!

verses.content: أَمْ لَكُمْ كِتَابٌ فِيهِ تَدْرُسُونَ
verses.translation: Is there a Book for you, from which you read?

verses.content: إِنَّ لَكُمْ فِيهِ لَمَا تَخَيَّرُونَ
verses.translation: - That for you in it is whatever you like?

verses.content: أَمْ لَكُمْ أَيْمَانٌ عَلَيْنَا بَالِغَةٌ إِلَىٰ يَوْمِ الْقِيَامَةِ ۙ إِنَّ لَكُمْ لَمَا تَحْكُمُونَ
verses.translation: Or is it that you have a covenant from Us, right up to the Day of Judgement, that you will get all what you claim?

verses.content: سَلْهُمْ أَيُّهُم بِذَٰلِكَ زَعِيمٌ
verses.translation: Ask them, who among them is a guarantor for it?

verses.content: أَمْ لَهُمْ شُرَكَاءُ فَلْيَأْتُوا بِشُرَكَائِهِمْ إِن كَانُوا صَادِقِينَ
verses.translation: Or is it that they have partners in worship? So they should bring their appointed partners, if they are truthful.

verses.content: يَوْمَ يُكْشَفُ عَن سَاقٍ وَيُدْعَوْنَ إِلَى السُّجُودِ فَلَا يَسْتَطِيعُونَ
verses.translation: On the day when the Shin* will be exposed and they will be called to prostrate themselves, they will be unable. (Used as a metaphor)

verses.content: خَاشِعَةً أَبْصَارُهُمْ تَرْهَقُهُمْ ذِلَّةٌ ۖ وَقَدْ كَانُوا يُدْعَوْنَ إِلَى السُّجُودِ وَهُمْ سَالِمُونَ
verses.translation: With lowered eyes, disgrace overcoming them; and indeed they used to be called to prostrate themselves whilst they were healthy.

verses.content: فَذَرْنِي وَمَن يُكَذِّبُ بِهَـٰذَا الْحَدِيثِ ۖ سَنَسْتَدْرِجُهُم مِّنْ حَيْثُ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ
verses.translation: Therefore leave the one who denies this matter, to Me; We shall soon steadily take them away, from a place they do not know.

verses.content: وَأُمْلِي لَهُمْ ۚ إِنَّ كَيْدِي مَتِينٌ
verses.translation: And I will give them respite; indeed My plan is very solid.

verses.content: أَمْ تَسْأَلُهُمْ أَجْرًا فَهُم مِّن مَّغْرَمٍ مُّثْقَلُونَ
verses.translation: Or is it that you (O dear Prophet Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him) ask any fee from them, so they are burdened with the penalty?

verses.content: أَمْ عِندَهُمُ الْغَيْبُ فَهُمْ يَكْتُبُونَ
verses.translation: Or that they possess the hidden, so they are writing it?

verses.content: فَاصْبِرْ لِحُكْمِ رَبِّكَ وَلَا تَكُن كَصَاحِبِ الْحُوتِ إِذْ نَادَىٰ وَهُوَ مَكْظُومٌ
verses.translation: Therefore wait for your Lord’s command, and do not be like the one of the fish; who cried out when he was distraught. (Prophet Yunus – peace be upon him.)

verses.content: لَّوْلَا أَن تَدَارَكَهُ نِعْمَةٌ مِّن رَّبِّهِ لَنُبِذَ بِالْعَرَاءِ وَهُوَ مَذْمُومٌ
verses.translation: Were it not for his Lord’s favour that reached him, he would have surely been cast onto the desolate land, reproached.

verses.content: فَاجْتَبَاهُ رَبُّهُ فَجَعَلَهُ مِنَ الصَّالِحِينَ
verses.translation: His Lord therefore chose him and made him among those deserving His proximity.

verses.content: وَإِن يَكَادُ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا لَيُزْلِقُونَكَ بِأَبْصَارِهِمْ لَمَّا سَمِعُوا الذِّكْرَ وَيَقُولُونَ إِنَّهُ لَمَجْنُونٌ
verses.translation: And indeed the disbelievers seem as if they would topple you with their evil gaze when they hear the Qur’an, and they say, “He is indeed insane.”

verses.content: وَمَا هُوَ إِلَّا ذِكْرٌ لِّلْعَالَمِينَ
verses.translation: Whereas it is not but an advice to the entire creation!

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ الْحَاقَّةُ
verses.translation: The true event!

verses.content: مَا الْحَاقَّةُ
verses.translation: How tremendous is the true event!

verses.content: وَمَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا الْحَاقَّةُ
verses.translation: And what have you understood, how tremendous the true event is!

verses.content: كَذَّبَتْ ثَمُودُ وَعَادٌ بِالْقَارِعَةِ
verses.translation: The tribes of Thamud and A’ad denied the event of great dismay. (The Day of Resurrection)

verses.content: فَأَمَّا ثَمُودُ فَأُهْلِكُوا بِالطَّاغِيَةِ
verses.translation: So regarding the Thamud, they were destroyed by a terrible scream.

verses.content: وَأَمَّا عَادٌ فَأُهْلِكُوا بِرِيحٍ صَرْصَرٍ عَاتِيَةٍ
verses.translation: And as for A’ad, they were destroyed by a severe thundering windstorm.

verses.content: سَخَّرَهَا عَلَيْهِمْ سَبْعَ لَيَالٍ وَثَمَانِيَةَ أَيَّامٍ حُسُومًا فَتَرَى الْقَوْمَ فِيهَا صَرْعَىٰ كَأَنَّهُمْ أَعْجَازُ نَخْلٍ خَاوِيَةٍ
verses.translation: He forced it upon them with strength, consecutively for seven nights and eight days – so you would see those people overthrown in it, like trunks of date palms fallen down.

verses.content: فَهَلْ تَرَىٰ لَهُم مِّن بَاقِيَةٍ
verses.translation: So do you see any survivor among them?

verses.content: وَجَاءَ فِرْعَوْنُ وَمَن قَبْلَهُ وَالْمُؤْتَفِكَاتُ بِالْخَاطِئَةِ
verses.translation: And Firaun, and those before him, and the dwellings that were inverted and thrown, had brought error.

verses.content: فَعَصَوْا رَسُولَ رَبِّهِمْ فَأَخَذَهُمْ أَخْذَةً رَّابِيَةً
verses.translation: They therefore disobeyed the Noble Messengers of their Lord – so He seized them with an intense seizure.

verses.content: إِنَّا لَمَّا طَغَى الْمَاءُ حَمَلْنَاكُمْ فِي الْجَارِيَةِ
verses.translation: Indeed when the water swelled up, We boarded you onto the ship.

verses.content: لِنَجْعَلَهَا لَكُمْ تَذْكِرَةً وَتَعِيَهَا أُذُنٌ وَاعِيَةٌ
verses.translation: In order to make it a remembrance for you, and in order that the ears that store may remember.

verses.content: فَإِذَا نُفِخَ فِي الصُّورِ نَفْخَةٌ وَاحِدَةٌ
verses.translation: So when the Trumpet will be blown, with a sudden single blow.

verses.content: وَحُمِلَتِ الْأَرْضُ وَالْجِبَالُ فَدُكَّتَا دَكَّةً وَاحِدَةً
verses.translation: And the earth and the mountains will be lifted up and crushed with a single crush.

verses.content: فَيَوْمَئِذٍ وَقَعَتِ الْوَاقِعَةُ
verses.translation: So that is the day when the forthcoming event will occur.

verses.content: وَانشَقَّتِ السَّمَاءُ فَهِيَ يَوْمَئِذٍ وَاهِيَةٌ
verses.translation: And the heaven will split asunder – so on that day it will be unstable.

verses.content: وَالْمَلَكُ عَلَىٰ أَرْجَائِهَا ۚ وَيَحْمِلُ عَرْشَ رَبِّكَ فَوْقَهُمْ يَوْمَئِذٍ ثَمَانِيَةٌ
verses.translation: And the angels will be on its sides; and on that day, eight angels will carry the Throne of your Lord above them.

verses.content: يَوْمَئِذٍ تُعْرَضُونَ لَا تَخْفَىٰ مِنكُمْ خَافِيَةٌ
verses.translation: On that day all of you will be brought forth, so none among you wishing to hide will be able to hide.

verses.content: فَأَمَّا مَنْ أُوتِيَ كِتَابَهُ بِيَمِينِهِ فَيَقُولُ هَاؤُمُ اقْرَءُوا كِتَابِيَهْ
verses.translation: So whoever is given his book in his right hand – he will say, “Take, read my account!”

verses.content: إِنِّي ظَنَنتُ أَنِّي مُلَاقٍ حِسَابِيَهْ
verses.translation: “I was certain that I will confront my account.”

verses.content: فَهُوَ فِي عِيشَةٍ رَّاضِيَةٍ
verses.translation: He is therefore in the desired serenity.

verses.content: فِي جَنَّةٍ عَالِيَةٍ
verses.translation: In a lofty Garden –

verses.content: قُطُوفُهَا دَانِيَةٌ
verses.translation: The fruit clusters of which are hanging down.

verses.content: كُلُوا وَاشْرَبُوا هَنِيئًا بِمَا أَسْلَفْتُمْ فِي الْأَيَّامِ الْخَالِيَةِ
verses.translation: “Eat and drink with pleasure – the reward of what you sent ahead, in the past days.”

verses.content: وَأَمَّا مَنْ أُوتِيَ كِتَابَهُ بِشِمَالِهِ فَيَقُولُ يَا لَيْتَنِي لَمْ أُوتَ كِتَابِيَهْ
verses.translation: And whoever is given his book in his left hand – he will say, “Alas, if only my account were not given to me!”

verses.content: وَلَمْ أَدْرِ مَا حِسَابِيَهْ
verses.translation: “And had never come to know my account!”

verses.content: يَا لَيْتَهَا كَانَتِ الْقَاضِيَةَ
verses.translation: “Alas, if only it had been just death.”

verses.content: مَا أَغْنَىٰ عَنِّي مَالِيَهْ ۜ
verses.translation: “My wealth did not in the least benefit me.”

verses.content: هَلَكَ عَنِّي سُلْطَانِيَهْ
verses.translation: “All my power has vanished.”

verses.content: خُذُوهُ فَغُلُّوهُ
verses.translation: It will be said, “Seize him, and shackle him.”

verses.content: ثُمَّ الْجَحِيمَ صَلُّوهُ
verses.translation: “Then hurl him into the blazing fire.”

verses.content: ثُمَّ فِي سِلْسِلَةٍ ذَرْعُهَا سَبْعُونَ ذِرَاعًا فَاسْلُكُوهُ
verses.translation: “Then bind him inside a chain which is seventy arm-lengths.”

verses.content: إِنَّهُ كَانَ لَا يُؤْمِنُ بِاللَّهِ الْعَظِيمِ
verses.translation: “Indeed he refused to accept faith in Allah, the Greatest.”

verses.content: وَلَا يَحُضُّ عَلَىٰ طَعَامِ الْمِسْكِينِ
verses.translation: “And did not urge to feed the needy.”

verses.content: فَلَيْسَ لَهُ الْيَوْمَ هَاهُنَا حَمِيمٌ
verses.translation: “So he does not have any friend here this day.”

verses.content: وَلَا طَعَامٌ إِلَّا مِنْ غِسْلِينٍ
verses.translation: “Nor any food except the pus discharged from the people of hell.”

verses.content: لَّا يَأْكُلُهُ إِلَّا الْخَاطِئُونَ
verses.translation: “Which none except the guilty shall eat.”

verses.content: فَلَا أُقْسِمُ بِمَا تُبْصِرُونَ
verses.translation: So by oath of the things you see.

verses.content: وَمَا لَا تُبْصِرُونَ
verses.translation: And by oath of those you do not see.

verses.content: إِنَّهُ لَقَوْلُ رَسُولٍ كَرِيمٍ
verses.translation: This Qur’an is the speech of Allah with a gracious Noble Messenger.

verses.content: وَمَا هُوَ بِقَوْلِ شَاعِرٍ ۚ قَلِيلًا مَّا تُؤْمِنُونَ
verses.translation: And it is not the speech of a poet; how little do you believe!

verses.content: وَلَا بِقَوْلِ كَاهِنٍ ۚ قَلِيلًا مَّا تَذَكَّرُونَ
verses.translation: Nor is it the speech of a soothsayer; how little do you ponder!

verses.content: تَنزِيلٌ مِّن رَّبِّ الْعَالَمِينَ
verses.translation: Sent down by the Lord Of The Creation.

verses.content: وَلَوْ تَقَوَّلَ عَلَيْنَا بَعْضَ الْأَقَاوِيلِ
verses.translation: And had he fabricated just one matter upon Us –

verses.content: لَأَخَذْنَا مِنْهُ بِالْيَمِينِ
verses.translation: We would have definitely taken revenge from him.

verses.content: ثُمَّ لَقَطَعْنَا مِنْهُ الْوَتِينَ
verses.translation: Then would have cut off his heart’s artery.

verses.content: فَمَا مِنكُم مِّنْ أَحَدٍ عَنْهُ حَاجِزِينَ
verses.translation: Then none among you would be his saviour.

verses.content: وَإِنَّهُ لَتَذْكِرَةٌ لِّلْمُتَّقِينَ
verses.translation: And indeed this Qur’an is an advice for the pious.

verses.content: وَإِنَّا لَنَعْلَمُ أَنَّ مِنكُم مُّكَذِّبِينَ
verses.translation: And indeed We know that some among you are deniers.

verses.content: وَإِنَّهُ لَحَسْرَةٌ عَلَى الْكَافِرِينَ
verses.translation: And indeed it is a despair for the disbelievers.

verses.content: وَإِنَّهُ لَحَقُّ الْيَقِينِ
verses.translation: And indeed it is a certain Truth.

verses.content: فَسَبِّحْ بِاسْمِ رَبِّكَ الْعَظِيمِ
verses.translation: Therefore (O dear Prophet Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him), proclaim the purity of your Lord, the Greatest.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ سَأَلَ سَائِلٌ بِعَذَابٍ وَاقِعٍ
verses.translation: A requester seeks the punishment that will take place –

verses.content: لِّلْكَافِرِينَ لَيْسَ لَهُ دَافِعٌ
verses.translation: - Upon the disbelievers – the punishment that none can avert.

verses.content: مِّنَ اللَّهِ ذِي الْمَعَارِجِ
verses.translation: From Allah, the Lord of all pinnacles.

verses.content: تَعْرُجُ الْمَلَائِكَةُ وَالرُّوحُ إِلَيْهِ فِي يَوْمٍ كَانَ مِقْدَارُهُ خَمْسِينَ أَلْفَ سَنَةٍ
verses.translation: The angels and Jibreel, ascend towards Him – the punishment will befall on a day which spans fifty thousand years.

verses.content: فَاصْبِرْ صَبْرًا جَمِيلًا
verses.translation: Therefore patiently endure, in the best manner (O dear Prophet Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him).

verses.content: إِنَّهُمْ يَرَوْنَهُ بَعِيدًا
verses.translation: They deem it to be remote.

verses.content: وَنَرَاهُ قَرِيبًا
verses.translation: Whereas We see it impending.

verses.content: يَوْمَ تَكُونُ السَّمَاءُ كَالْمُهْلِ
verses.translation: The day when the sky will be like molten silver.

verses.content: وَتَكُونُ الْجِبَالُ كَالْعِهْنِ
verses.translation: And the hills will be light as wool.

verses.content: وَلَا يَسْأَلُ حَمِيمٌ حَمِيمًا
verses.translation: And no friend will ask concerning his friend.

verses.content: يُبَصَّرُونَهُمْ ۚ يَوَدُّ الْمُجْرِمُ لَوْ يَفْتَدِي مِنْ عَذَابِ يَوْمِئِذٍ بِبَنِيهِ
verses.translation: They will be seeing them; the guilty will wish if only he could redeem himself from the punishment of that day, by offering his sons.

verses.content: وَصَاحِبَتِهِ وَأَخِيهِ
verses.translation: And his wife and his brother.

verses.content: وَفَصِيلَتِهِ الَّتِي تُؤْوِيهِ
verses.translation: And the family in which he was.

verses.content: وَمَن فِي الْأَرْضِ جَمِيعًا ثُمَّ يُنجِيهِ
verses.translation: And all those who are in the earth – then only if the redemption saves him!

verses.content: كَلَّا ۖ إِنَّهَا لَظَىٰ
verses.translation: Never! That is indeed a blazing fire.

verses.content: نَزَّاعَةً لِّلشَّوَىٰ
verses.translation: A fire that melts the hide.

verses.content: تَدْعُو مَنْ أَدْبَرَ وَتَوَلَّىٰ
verses.translation: It calls out to him who reverted and turned away.

verses.content: وَجَمَعَ فَأَوْعَىٰ
verses.translation: And accumulated wealth and hoarded it.

verses.content: إِنَّ الْإِنسَانَ خُلِقَ هَلُوعًا
verses.translation: Indeed man is created very impatient, greedy.

verses.content: إِذَا مَسَّهُ الشَّرُّ جَزُوعًا
verses.translation: Very nervous when touched by misfortune.

verses.content: وَإِذَا مَسَّهُ الْخَيْرُ مَنُوعًا
verses.translation: And refraining, when good reaches him.

verses.content: إِلَّا الْمُصَلِّينَ
verses.translation: Except those who establish prayer.

verses.content: الَّذِينَ هُمْ عَلَىٰ صَلَاتِهِمْ دَائِمُونَ
verses.translation: Those who are regular in their prayers.

verses.content: وَالَّذِينَ فِي أَمْوَالِهِمْ حَقٌّ مَّعْلُومٌ
verses.translation: And those in whose wealth exists a recognised right,

verses.content: لِّلسَّائِلِ وَالْمَحْرُومِ
verses.translation: For those who beg, and for the needy who cannot even ask.

verses.content: وَالَّذِينَ يُصَدِّقُونَ بِيَوْمِ الدِّينِ
verses.translation: And those who believe the Day of Judgement to be true.

verses.content: وَالَّذِينَ هُم مِّنْ عَذَابِ رَبِّهِم مُّشْفِقُونَ
verses.translation: And those who fear the punishment of their Lord.

verses.content: إِنَّ عَذَابَ رَبِّهِمْ غَيْرُ مَأْمُونٍ
verses.translation: Indeed the punishment of their Lord is not a thing to be unafraid of!

verses.content: وَالَّذِينَ هُمْ لِفُرُوجِهِمْ حَافِظُونَ
verses.translation: And those who protect their private organs (from adultery).

verses.content: إِلَّا عَلَىٰ أَزْوَاجِهِمْ أَوْ مَا مَلَكَتْ أَيْمَانُهُمْ فَإِنَّهُمْ غَيْرُ مَلُومِينَ
verses.translation: Except with their wives and the bondwomen in their possession, for there is no reproach on them.

verses.content: فَمَنِ ابْتَغَىٰ وَرَاءَ ذَٰلِكَ فَأُولَـٰئِكَ هُمُ الْعَادُونَ
verses.translation: So those who desire more than this – it is they who are the transgressors.

verses.content: وَالَّذِينَ هُمْ لِأَمَانَاتِهِمْ وَعَهْدِهِمْ رَاعُونَ
verses.translation: And those who protect the property entrusted to them, and their agreements.

verses.content: وَالَّذِينَ هُم بِشَهَادَاتِهِمْ قَائِمُونَ
verses.translation: And those who are firm upon their testimonies.

verses.content: وَالَّذِينَ هُمْ عَلَىٰ صَلَاتِهِمْ يُحَافِظُونَ
verses.translation: And those who protect their prayers.

verses.content: أُولَـٰئِكَ فِي جَنَّاتٍ مُّكْرَمُونَ
verses.translation: It is these who will be honoured in Gardens.

verses.content: فَمَالِ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا قِبَلَكَ مُهْطِعِينَ
verses.translation: So what is the matter with these disbelievers, that they stare at you (O dear Prophet Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him)?

verses.content: عَنِ الْيَمِينِ وَعَنِ الشِّمَالِ عِزِينَ
verses.translation: From the right and the left, in groups?

verses.content: أَيَطْمَعُ كُلُّ امْرِئٍ مِّنْهُمْ أَن يُدْخَلَ جَنَّةَ نَعِيمٍ
verses.translation: Does every man among them aspire to be admitted into the Garden of serenity?

verses.content: كَلَّا ۖ إِنَّا خَلَقْنَاهُم مِّمَّا يَعْلَمُونَ
verses.translation: Never! We have indeed created them from a thing they know.

verses.content: فَلَا أُقْسِمُ بِرَبِّ الْمَشَارِقِ وَالْمَغَارِبِ إِنَّا لَقَادِرُونَ
verses.translation: So I swear by the Lord of every East and every West, that We are indeed Able.

verses.content: عَلَىٰ أَن نُّبَدِّلَ خَيْرًا مِّنْهُمْ وَمَا نَحْنُ بِمَسْبُوقِينَ
verses.translation: To replace them by those better than them; and none can escape from Us.

verses.content: فَذَرْهُمْ يَخُوضُوا وَيَلْعَبُوا حَتَّىٰ يُلَاقُوا يَوْمَهُمُ الَّذِي يُوعَدُونَ
verses.translation: Therefore leave them, involved in their indecencies and play, till they confront their day which they are promised.

verses.content: يَوْمَ يَخْرُجُونَ مِنَ الْأَجْدَاثِ سِرَاعًا كَأَنَّهُمْ إِلَىٰ نُصُبٍ يُوفِضُونَ
verses.translation: A day when they will come out of the graves in haste, as if rushing towards their goals.

verses.content: خَاشِعَةً أَبْصَارُهُمْ تَرْهَقُهُمْ ذِلَّةٌ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ الْيَوْمُ الَّذِي كَانُوا يُوعَدُونَ
verses.translation: With lowered eyes, disgrace overcoming them; this is the day, which they had been promised.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ إِنَّا أَرْسَلْنَا نُوحًا إِلَىٰ قَوْمِهِ أَنْ أَنذِرْ قَوْمَكَ مِن قَبْلِ أَن يَأْتِيَهُمْ عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٌ
verses.translation: Indeed We sent Nooh towards his people saying that, “Warn your people before the painful punishment comes upon them.”

verses.content: قَالَ يَا قَوْمِ إِنِّي لَكُمْ نَذِيرٌ مُّبِينٌ
verses.translation: He said, “O my people! I am indeed a Herald of clear warnings to you.”

verses.content: أَنِ اعْبُدُوا اللَّهَ وَاتَّقُوهُ وَأَطِيعُونِ
verses.translation: “That you must worship Allah and fear Him, and obey me.”

verses.content: يَغْفِرْ لَكُم مِّن ذُنُوبِكُمْ وَيُؤَخِّرْكُمْ إِلَىٰ أَجَلٍ مُّسَمًّى ۚ إِنَّ أَجَلَ اللَّهِ إِذَا جَاءَ لَا يُؤَخَّرُ ۖ لَوْ كُنتُمْ تَعْلَمُونَ
verses.translation: “He will forgive you some of your sins, and give you respite up to an appointed term; indeed the promise of Allah cannot be averted when it arrives; if only you knew.”

verses.content: قَالَ رَبِّ إِنِّي دَعَوْتُ قَوْمِي لَيْلًا وَنَهَارًا
verses.translation: He said, “My Lord! I invited my people night and day.”

verses.content: فَلَمْ يَزِدْهُمْ دُعَائِي إِلَّا فِرَارًا
verses.translation: “So for them, my calling them increased their fleeing away.”

verses.content: وَإِنِّي كُلَّمَا دَعَوْتُهُمْ لِتَغْفِرَ لَهُمْ جَعَلُوا أَصَابِعَهُمْ فِي آذَانِهِمْ وَاسْتَغْشَوْا ثِيَابَهُمْ وَأَصَرُّوا وَاسْتَكْبَرُوا اسْتِكْبَارًا
verses.translation: “And whenever I called them, so that You may forgive them, they always thrust their fingers into their ears, and covered themselves with their clothes, and remained stubborn and were extremely haughty.”

verses.content: ثُمَّ إِنِّي دَعَوْتُهُمْ جِهَارًا
verses.translation: “I then called them openly.”

verses.content: ثُمَّ إِنِّي أَعْلَنتُ لَهُمْ وَأَسْرَرْتُ لَهُمْ إِسْرَارًا
verses.translation: “Then I also told them publicly and also spoke to them softly in private.”

verses.content: فَقُلْتُ اسْتَغْفِرُوا رَبَّكُمْ إِنَّهُ كَانَ غَفَّارًا
verses.translation: “I therefore told them, ‘Seek forgiveness from your Lord; He is indeed Most Forgiving.’

verses.content: يُرْسِلِ السَّمَاءَ عَلَيْكُم مِّدْرَارًا
verses.translation: ‘He will send down abundant rain for you from the sky.’

verses.content: وَيُمْدِدْكُم بِأَمْوَالٍ وَبَنِينَ وَيَجْعَل لَّكُمْ جَنَّاتٍ وَيَجْعَل لَّكُمْ أَنْهَارًا
verses.translation: ‘And will aid you with wealth and sons, and will create gardens for you and cause rivers to flow for you.’

verses.content: مَّا لَكُمْ لَا تَرْجُونَ لِلَّهِ وَقَارًا
verses.translation: ‘What is the matter with you, that you do not desire honour from Allah?’

verses.content: وَقَدْ خَلَقَكُمْ أَطْوَارًا
verses.translation: ‘Whereas it is He Who created you in different stages?’

verses.content: أَلَمْ تَرَوْا كَيْفَ خَلَقَ اللَّهُ سَبْعَ سَمَاوَاتٍ طِبَاقًا
verses.translation: ‘Do you not see how Allah has created the seven heavens atop each other?’

verses.content: وَجَعَلَ الْقَمَرَ فِيهِنَّ نُورًا وَجَعَلَ الشَّمْسَ سِرَاجًا
verses.translation: ‘And in them, has illuminated the moon, and made the sun a lamp?’

verses.content: وَاللَّهُ أَنبَتَكُم مِّنَ الْأَرْضِ نَبَاتًا
verses.translation: ‘And it is Allah Who made you grow like vegetation from the earth.’

verses.content: ثُمَّ يُعِيدُكُمْ فِيهَا وَيُخْرِجُكُمْ إِخْرَاجًا
verses.translation: ‘And He will then take you back to it, and again remove you from it.”

verses.content: وَاللَّهُ جَعَلَ لَكُمُ الْأَرْضَ بِسَاطًا
verses.translation: ‘And it is Allah Who made the earth a bed for you.’

verses.content: لِّتَسْلُكُوا مِنْهَا سُبُلًا فِجَاجًا
verses.translation: ‘So that you may tread the wide roads in it.’”

verses.content: قَالَ نُوحٌ رَّبِّ إِنَّهُمْ عَصَوْنِي وَاتَّبَعُوا مَن لَّمْ يَزِدْهُ مَالُهُ وَوَلَدُهُ إِلَّا خَسَارًا
verses.translation: Prayed Nooh, “O my Lord! They have disobeyed me, and they follow the one whose wealth and children increase nothing for him except ruin.”

verses.content: وَمَكَرُوا مَكْرًا كُبَّارًا
verses.translation: “And they carried out a very sinister scheme.”

verses.content: وَقَالُوا لَا تَذَرُنَّ آلِهَتَكُمْ وَلَا تَذَرُنَّ وَدًّا وَلَا سُوَاعًا وَلَا يَغُوثَ وَيَعُوقَ وَنَسْرًا
verses.translation: “And they said, ‘Do not ever abandon your Gods – and never abandon Wadd, or Suwa – or Yaghuth or Yauq or Nasr.’”

verses.content: وَقَدْ أَضَلُّوا كَثِيرًا ۖ وَلَا تَزِدِ الظَّالِمِينَ إِلَّا ضَلَالًا
verses.translation: “And they have misled a large number; and (I pray that) You increase nothing for the unjust except error.”

verses.content: مِّمَّا خَطِيئَاتِهِمْ أُغْرِقُوا فَأُدْخِلُوا نَارًا فَلَمْ يَجِدُوا لَهُم مِّن دُونِ اللَّهِ أَنصَارًا
verses.translation: Because of their sins they were drowned and then put into the fire; so they did not find any supporter for themselves against Allah. (Punishment in the grave is proven by this verse.)

verses.content: وَقَالَ نُوحٌ رَّبِّ لَا تَذَرْ عَلَى الْأَرْضِ مِنَ الْكَافِرِينَ دَيَّارًا
verses.translation: And prayed Nooh, “O my Lord! Do not leave any of the disbelievers dwelling in the land.”

verses.content: إِنَّكَ إِن تَذَرْهُمْ يُضِلُّوا عِبَادَكَ وَلَا يَلِدُوا إِلَّا فَاجِرًا كَفَّارًا
verses.translation: “Indeed, if You spare them, they will mislead your bondmen – and their descendants, if any, will be none except the wicked, very ungrateful.”

verses.content: رَّبِّ اغْفِرْ لِي وَلِوَالِدَيَّ وَلِمَن دَخَلَ بَيْتِيَ مُؤْمِنًا وَلِلْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَالْمُؤْمِنَاتِ وَلَا تَزِدِ الظَّالِمِينَ إِلَّا تَبَارًا
verses.translation: “O my Lord! Forgive me, and my parents, and the believers who are in my house, and all other Muslim men and Muslim women; and do not increase anything for the unjust except ruin.”

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ قُلْ أُوحِيَ إِلَيَّ أَنَّهُ اسْتَمَعَ نَفَرٌ مِّنَ الْجِنِّ فَقَالُوا إِنَّا سَمِعْنَا قُرْآنًا عَجَبًا
verses.translation: Proclaim (O dear Prophet Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him), “I have received the divine revelation that some jinns attentively listened to my recitation, so they said, ‘We have heard a unique Qur’an.’

verses.content: يَهْدِي إِلَى الرُّشْدِ فَآمَنَّا بِهِ ۖ وَلَن نُّشْرِكَ بِرَبِّنَا أَحَدًا
verses.translation: ‘That guides to the path of goodness, we have therefore accepted faith in it; and we shall never ascribe anyone as a partner to our Lord.’

verses.content: وَأَنَّهُ تَعَالَىٰ جَدُّ رَبِّنَا مَا اتَّخَذَ صَاحِبَةً وَلَا وَلَدًا
verses.translation: ‘And that our Lord’s Majesty is Supreme – He has neither chosen a wife nor a child.’

verses.content: وَأَنَّهُ كَانَ يَقُولُ سَفِيهُنَا عَلَى اللَّهِ شَطَطًا
verses.translation: ‘And that the fool among us used to utter false exaggerations against Allah.’

verses.content: وَأَنَّا ظَنَنَّا أَن لَّن تَقُولَ الْإِنسُ وَالْجِنُّ عَلَى اللَّهِ كَذِبًا
verses.translation: ‘Whereas we thought that men and jinns would never fabricate a lie against Allah!’

verses.content: وَأَنَّهُ كَانَ رِجَالٌ مِّنَ الْإِنسِ يَعُوذُونَ بِرِجَالٍ مِّنَ الْجِنِّ فَزَادُوهُمْ رَهَقًا
verses.translation: ‘And indeed some men among humans used to take the protection of some men among jinns, so it further increased their haughtiness.’

verses.content: وَأَنَّهُمْ ظَنُّوا كَمَا ظَنَنتُمْ أَن لَّن يَبْعَثَ اللَّهُ أَحَدًا
verses.translation: ‘And that they assumed, like you humans assume, that Allah would not send any Noble Messenger.’

verses.content: وَأَنَّا لَمَسْنَا السَّمَاءَ فَوَجَدْنَاهَا مُلِئَتْ حَرَسًا شَدِيدًا وَشُهُبًا
verses.translation: ‘And we reached the sky, so we found it strongly guarded and filled with comets.’

verses.content: وَأَنَّا كُنَّا نَقْعُدُ مِنْهَا مَقَاعِدَ لِلسَّمْعِ ۖ فَمَن يَسْتَمِعِ الْآنَ يَجِدْ لَهُ شِهَابًا رَّصَدًا
verses.translation: ‘And that we sometimes used to sit in some places in the sky, to listen; so whoever now listens finds a fiery comet waiting for him.’

verses.content: وَأَنَّا لَا نَدْرِي أَشَرٌّ أُرِيدَ بِمَن فِي الْأَرْضِ أَمْ أَرَادَ بِهِمْ رَبُّهُمْ رَشَدًا
verses.translation: ‘And we do not know whether harm is intended for those on the earth, or whether their Lord intends goodness for them.’

verses.content: وَأَنَّا مِنَّا الصَّالِحُونَ وَمِنَّا دُونَ ذَٰلِكَ ۖ كُنَّا طَرَائِقَ قِدَدًا
verses.translation: ‘And among us some are virtuous and some are the other type; we are split into several branches.’

verses.content: وَأَنَّا ظَنَنَّا أَن لَّن نُّعْجِزَ اللَّهَ فِي الْأَرْضِ وَلَن نُّعْجِزَهُ هَرَبًا
verses.translation: ‘And we are certain that we cannot defeat Allah in the earth, nor can we run out of His grasp.’

verses.content: وَأَنَّا لَمَّا سَمِعْنَا الْهُدَىٰ آمَنَّا بِهِ ۖ فَمَن يُؤْمِن بِرَبِّهِ فَلَا يَخَافُ بَخْسًا وَلَا رَهَقًا
verses.translation: ‘And that when we heard the guidance, we accepted faith in it; so whoever accepts faith in his Lord, has no fear – neither of any loss nor of any injustice.’

verses.content: وَأَنَّا مِنَّا الْمُسْلِمُونَ وَمِنَّا الْقَاسِطُونَ ۖ فَمَنْ أَسْلَمَ فَأُولَـٰئِكَ تَحَرَّوْا رَشَدًا
verses.translation: ‘And that some among us are Muslims and some are the unjust; and whoever has accepted Islam – it is they who have thought rightly.’

verses.content: وَأَمَّا الْقَاسِطُونَ فَكَانُوا لِجَهَنَّمَ حَطَبًا
verses.translation: ‘And as for the unjust – they are the fuel of hell.’”

verses.content: وَأَن لَّوِ اسْتَقَامُوا عَلَى الطَّرِيقَةِ لَأَسْقَيْنَاهُم مَّاءً غَدَقًا
verses.translation: And proclaim (O dear Prophet Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him), “I have received the divine revelation that ‘Had they remained upright on the straight path, We would have given them abundant water.’

verses.content: لِّنَفْتِنَهُمْ فِيهِ ۚ وَمَن يُعْرِضْ عَن ذِكْرِ رَبِّهِ يَسْلُكْهُ عَذَابًا صَعَدًا
verses.translation: ‘In order to test them with it; and whoever turns away from the remembrance of his Lord – He will put him in a punishment that keeps on increasing.’

verses.content: وَأَنَّ الْمَسَاجِدَ لِلَّهِ فَلَا تَدْعُوا مَعَ اللَّهِ أَحَدًا
verses.translation: ‘And that the mosques are for Allah only – therefore do not worship anyone along with Allah.’

verses.content: وَأَنَّهُ لَمَّا قَامَ عَبْدُ اللَّهِ يَدْعُوهُ كَادُوا يَكُونُونَ عَلَيْهِ لِبَدًا
verses.translation: ‘And that when Allah’s bondman stood up to worship Him, the jinns had almost crowded upon him.’”

verses.content: قُلْ إِنَّمَا أَدْعُو رَبِّي وَلَا أُشْرِكُ بِهِ أَحَدًا
verses.translation: Say (O dear Prophet Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him), “I worship only Allah, and I do not ascribe any partner to Him.”

verses.content: قُلْ إِنِّي لَا أَمْلِكُ لَكُمْ ضَرًّا وَلَا رَشَدًا
verses.translation: Proclaim (O dear Prophet Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him), “I am not the master of any harm or benefit for you.”

verses.content: قُلْ إِنِّي لَن يُجِيرَنِي مِنَ اللَّهِ أَحَدٌ وَلَنْ أَجِدَ مِن دُونِهِ مُلْتَحَدًا
verses.translation: Say, “No one will ever save me from Allah, and other than Him, I will not find any refuge.”

verses.content: إِلَّا بَلَاغًا مِّنَ اللَّهِ وَرِسَالَاتِهِ ۚ وَمَن يَعْصِ اللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُ فَإِنَّ لَهُ نَارَ جَهَنَّمَ خَالِدِينَ فِيهَا أَبَدًا
verses.translation: “I only convey the commands from Allah, and His messages; and whoever disobeys the commands of Allah and His Noble Messenger – then indeed for him is the fire of hell, in which they will remain for ever and ever.”

verses.content: حَتَّىٰ إِذَا رَأَوْا مَا يُوعَدُونَ فَسَيَعْلَمُونَ مَنْ أَضْعَفُ نَاصِرًا وَأَقَلُّ عَدَدًا
verses.translation: Till the time when they will see what they are promised – so they will now come to know whose aide is weak, and who is lesser in number.

verses.content: قُلْ إِنْ أَدْرِي أَقَرِيبٌ مَّا تُوعَدُونَ أَمْ يَجْعَلُ لَهُ رَبِّي أَمَدًا
verses.translation: Say (O dear Prophet Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him), “I do not know whether what you are promised is close or if my Lord will postpone it for a while.”

verses.content: عَالِمُ الْغَيْبِ فَلَا يُظْهِرُ عَلَىٰ غَيْبِهِ أَحَدًا
verses.translation: The All Knowing of all the hidden does not give anyone the control over His secrets.

verses.content: إِلَّا مَنِ ارْتَضَىٰ مِن رَّسُولٍ فَإِنَّهُ يَسْلُكُ مِن بَيْنِ يَدَيْهِ وَمِنْ خَلْفِهِ رَصَدًا
verses.translation: Except to His chosen Noble Messengers – so He appoints guards in front and behind him. (Allah gave the knowledge of the hidden to the Holy Prophet – peace and blessings be upon him.)

verses.content: لِّيَعْلَمَ أَن قَدْ أَبْلَغُوا رِسَالَاتِ رَبِّهِمْ وَأَحَاطَ بِمَا لَدَيْهِمْ وَأَحْصَىٰ كُلَّ شَيْءٍ عَدَدًا
verses.translation: In order to see that they have conveyed the messages of their Lord – and His knowledge encompasses all whatever they have, and He has kept all things accounted for.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ يَا أَيُّهَا الْمُزَّمِّلُ
verses.translation: O the One Wrapped in piety! (Prophet Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him)

verses.content: قُمِ اللَّيْلَ إِلَّا قَلِيلًا
verses.translation: Stand up for worship during the night, except for some part of it.

verses.content: نِّصْفَهُ أَوِ انقُصْ مِنْهُ قَلِيلًا
verses.translation: For half the night, or reduce some from it.

verses.content: أَوْ زِدْ عَلَيْهِ وَرَتِّلِ الْقُرْآنَ تَرْتِيلًا
verses.translation: Or increase a little upon it, and recite the Qur’an slowly in stages.

verses.content: إِنَّا سَنُلْقِي عَلَيْكَ قَوْلًا ثَقِيلًا
verses.translation: Indeed We shall soon ordain a heavy responsibility upon you.

verses.content: إِنَّ نَاشِئَةَ اللَّيْلِ هِيَ أَشَدُّ وَطْئًا وَأَقْوَمُ قِيلًا
verses.translation: Indeed getting up in the night is tougher, and the words flow with strength.

verses.content: إِنَّ لَكَ فِي النَّهَارِ سَبْحًا طَوِيلًا
verses.translation: Indeed you have a lot of matters during the day.

verses.content: وَاذْكُرِ اسْمَ رَبِّكَ وَتَبَتَّلْ إِلَيْهِ تَبْتِيلًا
verses.translation: And remember the name of your Lord and, leaving others, devote yourself solely to Him.

verses.content: رَّبُّ الْمَشْرِقِ وَالْمَغْرِبِ لَا إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ فَاتَّخِذْهُ وَكِيلًا
verses.translation: Lord of the East and Lord of the West – there is no God except Him, therefore make Him your sole Trustee of affairs.

verses.content: وَاصْبِرْ عَلَىٰ مَا يَقُولُونَ وَاهْجُرْهُمْ هَجْرًا جَمِيلًا
verses.translation: And patiently endure upon what the disbelievers say, and leave them for good.

verses.content: وَذَرْنِي وَالْمُكَذِّبِينَ أُولِي النَّعْمَةِ وَمَهِّلْهُمْ قَلِيلًا
verses.translation: And leave them to Me – these wealthy deniers – and give them some respite.

verses.content: إِنَّ لَدَيْنَا أَنكَالًا وَجَحِيمًا
verses.translation: Indeed We have heavy fetters and a blazing fire.

verses.content: وَطَعَامًا ذَا غُصَّةٍ وَعَذَابًا أَلِيمًا
verses.translation: And food that chokes, and a painful punishment.

verses.content: يَوْمَ تَرْجُفُ الْأَرْضُ وَالْجِبَالُ وَكَانَتِ الْجِبَالُ كَثِيبًا مَّهِيلًا
verses.translation: On a day when the earth and the mountains will tremble, and the mountains turn into dunes of flowing sand.

verses.content: إِنَّا أَرْسَلْنَا إِلَيْكُمْ رَسُولًا شَاهِدًا عَلَيْكُمْ كَمَا أَرْسَلْنَا إِلَىٰ فِرْعَوْنَ رَسُولًا
verses.translation: We have indeed sent a Noble Messenger towards you, a present witness over you – the way We had sent a Noble Messenger towards Firaun.

verses.content: فَعَصَىٰ فِرْعَوْنُ الرَّسُولَ فَأَخَذْنَاهُ أَخْذًا وَبِيلًا
verses.translation: In response Firaun disobeyed the Noble Messenger, so We seized him with a severe seizure.

verses.content: فَكَيْفَ تَتَّقُونَ إِن كَفَرْتُمْ يَوْمًا يَجْعَلُ الْوِلْدَانَ شِيبًا
verses.translation: So how will you save yourselves, if you disbelieve, on a day that will turn children old?

verses.content: السَّمَاءُ مُنفَطِرٌ بِهِ ۚ كَانَ وَعْدُهُ مَفْعُولًا
verses.translation: The heaven will split asunder with its grief; the promise of Allah will surely occur.

verses.content: إِنَّ هَـٰذِهِ تَذْكِرَةٌ ۖ فَمَن شَاءَ اتَّخَذَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِ سَبِيلًا
verses.translation: This is indeed an advice; so whoever wishes may take the path towards his Lord.

verses.content: إِنَّ رَبَّكَ يَعْلَمُ أَنَّكَ تَقُومُ أَدْنَىٰ مِن ثُلُثَيِ اللَّيْلِ وَنِصْفَهُ وَثُلُثَهُ وَطَائِفَةٌ مِّنَ الَّذِينَ مَعَكَ ۚ وَاللَّهُ يُقَدِّرُ اللَّيْلَ وَالنَّهَارَ ۚ عَلِمَ أَن لَّن تُحْصُوهُ فَتَابَ عَلَيْكُمْ ۖ فَاقْرَءُوا مَا تَيَسَّرَ مِنَ الْقُرْآنِ ۚ عَلِمَ أَن سَيَكُونُ مِنكُم مَّرْضَىٰ ۙ وَآخَرُونَ يَضْرِبُونَ فِي الْأَرْضِ يَبْتَغُونَ مِن فَضْلِ اللَّهِ ۙ وَآخَرُونَ يُقَاتِلُونَ فِي سَبِيلِ اللَّهِ ۖ فَاقْرَءُوا مَا تَيَسَّرَ مِنْهُ ۚ وَأَقِيمُوا الصَّلَاةَ وَآتُوا الزَّكَاةَ وَأَقْرِضُوا اللَّهَ قَرْضًا حَسَنًا ۚ وَمَا تُقَدِّمُوا لِأَنفُسِكُم مِّنْ خَيْرٍ تَجِدُوهُ عِندَ اللَّهِ هُوَ خَيْرًا وَأَعْظَمَ أَجْرًا ۚ وَاسْتَغْفِرُوا اللَّهَ ۖ إِنَّ اللَّهَ غَفُورٌ رَّحِيمٌ
verses.translation: Indeed your Lord knows that you stand up in prayer, sometimes almost two-thirds of the night, and sometimes half the night or sometimes a third of it – and also a group of those along with you; Allah keeps measure of the night and day; He knows that you, O Muslims, will not be able to measure the night, so He has inclined towards you with mercy – therefore recite from the Qur’an as much as is easy for you; He knows that soon some of you will fall ill, and some will travel in the land seeking the munificence of Allah, and some will be fighting in Allah’s cause; therefore recite from the Qur’an as much as is easy for you, and establish prayer and pay the obligatory charity, and lend an excellent loan to Allah; and whatever good you send ahead for yourselves, you will find it with Allah, better and having a great reward; and seek forgiveness from Allah; indeed Allah is Oft Forgiving, Most Merciful.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ يَا أَيُّهَا الْمُدَّثِّرُ
verses.translation: O the Cloaked One! (Prophet Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him)

verses.content: قُمْ فَأَنذِرْ
verses.translation: Rise up and warn!

verses.content: وَرَبَّكَ فَكَبِّرْ
verses.translation: And proclaim the Purity of your Lord.

verses.content: وَثِيَابَكَ فَطَهِّرْ
verses.translation: And keep your clothes clean.

verses.content: وَالرُّجْزَ فَاهْجُرْ
verses.translation: And stay away from idols.

verses.content: وَلَا تَمْنُن تَسْتَكْثِرُ
verses.translation: And do not favour others in order to receive more.

verses.content: وَلِرَبِّكَ فَاصْبِرْ
verses.translation: And for the sake of your Lord, patiently endure.

verses.content: فَإِذَا نُقِرَ فِي النَّاقُورِ
verses.translation: So when the Trumpet will be blown.

verses.content: فَذَٰلِكَ يَوْمَئِذٍ يَوْمٌ عَسِيرٌ
verses.translation: So that is a tough day.

verses.content: عَلَى الْكَافِرِينَ غَيْرُ يَسِيرٍ
verses.translation: Not easy upon the disbelievers.

verses.content: ذَرْنِي وَمَنْ خَلَقْتُ وَحِيدًا
verses.translation: Leave him to Me, the one whom I created single.

verses.content: وَجَعَلْتُ لَهُ مَالًا مَّمْدُودًا
verses.translation: And gave him vast wealth.

verses.content: وَبَنِينَ شُهُودًا
verses.translation: And gave him sons present before him.

verses.content: وَمَهَّدتُّ لَهُ تَمْهِيدًا
verses.translation: And made several preparations for him.

verses.content: ثُمَّ يَطْمَعُ أَنْ أَزِيدَ
verses.translation: Yet he desires that I should give more.

verses.content: كَلَّا ۖ إِنَّهُ كَانَ لِآيَاتِنَا عَنِيدًا
verses.translation: Never! For he is an enemy to Our signs!

verses.content: سَأُرْهِقُهُ صَعُودًا
verses.translation: Soon I shall mount him on Saood, the hill of fire.

verses.content: إِنَّهُ فَكَّرَ وَقَدَّرَ
verses.translation: Indeed he thought, and inwardly decided.

verses.content: فَقُتِلَ كَيْفَ قَدَّرَ
verses.translation: So accursed be he, how evilly did he decide!

verses.content: ثُمَّ قُتِلَ كَيْفَ قَدَّرَ
verses.translation: Again accursed be he, how evilly did he decide!

verses.content: ثُمَّ نَظَرَ
verses.translation: He then dared to lift his gaze.

verses.content: ثُمَّ عَبَسَ وَبَسَرَ
verses.translation: Then frowned and grimaced.

verses.content: ثُمَّ أَدْبَرَ وَاسْتَكْبَرَ
verses.translation: Then he turned away, and was haughty.

verses.content: فَقَالَ إِنْ هَـٰذَا إِلَّا سِحْرٌ يُؤْثَرُ
verses.translation: And said, “This is nothing but magic learnt from earlier men.”

verses.content: إِنْ هَـٰذَا إِلَّا قَوْلُ الْبَشَرِ
verses.translation: “This is nothing but the speech of a man.”

verses.content: سَأُصْلِيهِ سَقَرَ
verses.translation: I will soon fling him into hell.

verses.content: وَمَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا سَقَرُ
verses.translation: And what have you understood, what hell is!

verses.content: لَا تُبْقِي وَلَا تَذَرُ
verses.translation: It neither leaves, nor spares.

verses.content: لَوَّاحَةٌ لِّلْبَشَرِ
verses.translation: It strips away the hide of man.

verses.content: عَلَيْهَا تِسْعَةَ عَشَرَ
verses.translation: Above it are nineteen guards.

verses.content: وَمَا جَعَلْنَا أَصْحَابَ النَّارِ إِلَّا مَلَائِكَةً ۙ وَمَا جَعَلْنَا عِدَّتَهُمْ إِلَّا فِتْنَةً لِّلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا لِيَسْتَيْقِنَ الَّذِينَ أُوتُوا الْكِتَابَ وَيَزْدَادَ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا إِيمَانًا ۙ وَلَا يَرْتَابَ الَّذِينَ أُوتُوا الْكِتَابَ وَالْمُؤْمِنُونَ ۙ وَلِيَقُولَ الَّذِينَ فِي قُلُوبِهِم مَّرَضٌ وَالْكَافِرُونَ مَاذَا أَرَادَ اللَّهُ بِهَـٰذَا مَثَلًا ۚ كَذَٰلِكَ يُضِلُّ اللَّهُ مَن يَشَاءُ وَيَهْدِي مَن يَشَاءُ ۚ وَمَا يَعْلَمُ جُنُودَ رَبِّكَ إِلَّا هُوَ ۚ وَمَا هِيَ إِلَّا ذِكْرَىٰ لِلْبَشَرِ
verses.translation: We have not appointed the guards of hell, except angels; and did not keep this number except to test the disbelievers – in order that the People given the Book(s) may be convinced, and to increase the faith of the believers – and so that the People given the Book(s) and the Muslims may not have any doubt – and so that those in whose hearts is a disease and the disbelievers, may say, “What does Allah mean by this amazing example?” This is how Allah sends astray whomever He wills, and guides whomever He wills; and no one knows the armies of Allah except Him; and this is not but an advice to man.

verses.content: كَلَّا وَالْقَمَرِ
verses.translation: Yes, never!* By oath of the moon. (Hell will never spare the disbelievers).

verses.content: وَاللَّيْلِ إِذْ أَدْبَرَ
verses.translation: And by oath of the night when it turns back.

verses.content: وَالصُّبْحِ إِذَا أَسْفَرَ
verses.translation: And by oath of the morning, when it spreads light.

verses.content: إِنَّهَا لَإِحْدَى الْكُبَرِ
verses.translation: Indeed hell is one of the greatest entities.

verses.content: نَذِيرًا لِّلْبَشَرِ
verses.translation: Warn the men.

verses.content: لِمَن شَاءَ مِنكُمْ أَن يَتَقَدَّمَ أَوْ يَتَأَخَّرَ
verses.translation: For the one among you who wishes to come forward or stay back.

verses.content: كُلُّ نَفْسٍ بِمَا كَسَبَتْ رَهِينَةٌ
verses.translation: Every soul is mortgaged for its own deeds.

verses.content: إِلَّا أَصْحَابَ الْيَمِينِ
verses.translation: Except those on the right side.

verses.content: فِي جَنَّاتٍ يَتَسَاءَلُونَ
verses.translation: In Gardens, they seek answers,

verses.content: عَنِ الْمُجْرِمِينَ
verses.translation: - From the guilty.

verses.content: مَا سَلَكَكُمْ فِي سَقَرَ
verses.translation: “What took you into the hell?”

verses.content: قَالُوا لَمْ نَكُ مِنَ الْمُصَلِّينَ
verses.translation: They said, “We never used to offer the prayer.”

verses.content: وَلَمْ نَكُ نُطْعِمُ الْمِسْكِينَ
verses.translation: “Nor used to feed the needy.”

verses.content: وَكُنَّا نَخُوضُ مَعَ الْخَائِضِينَ
verses.translation: “And used to dwell on evil matters with those who think evilly.”

verses.content: وَكُنَّا نُكَذِّبُ بِيَوْمِ الدِّينِ
verses.translation: “And used to deny the Day of Justice.”

verses.content: حَتَّىٰ أَتَانَا الْيَقِينُ
verses.translation: “Till death overcame us.”

verses.content: فَمَا تَنفَعُهُمْ شَفَاعَةُ الشَّافِعِينَ
verses.translation: So the intercession of the intercessors will not benefit them. (The disbelievers will not have any intercessor.)

verses.content: فَمَا لَهُمْ عَنِ التَّذْكِرَةِ مُعْرِضِينَ
verses.translation: So what is the matter with them that they turn away from the advice?

verses.content: كَأَنَّهُمْ حُمُرٌ مُّسْتَنفِرَةٌ
verses.translation: As if they were startled donkeys –

verses.content: فَرَّتْ مِن قَسْوَرَةٍ
verses.translation: Fleeing away from a lion.

verses.content: بَلْ يُرِيدُ كُلُّ امْرِئٍ مِّنْهُمْ أَن يُؤْتَىٰ صُحُفًا مُّنَشَّرَةً
verses.translation: Rather each one of them desires that he should be given open Books.

verses.content: كَلَّا ۖ بَل لَّا يَخَافُونَ الْآخِرَةَ
verses.translation: Never! In fact they do not fear the Hereafter.

verses.content: كَلَّا إِنَّهُ تَذْكِرَةٌ
verses.translation: Yes indeed, this is an advice.

verses.content: فَمَن شَاءَ ذَكَرَهُ
verses.translation: So whoever wills may heed advice from it.

verses.content: وَمَا يَذْكُرُونَ إِلَّا أَن يَشَاءَ اللَّهُ ۚ هُوَ أَهْلُ التَّقْوَىٰ وَأَهْلُ الْمَغْفِرَةِ
verses.translation: And what advice will they heed, except if Allah wills? Only He deserves to be feared, and His only is the greatness of forgiving.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ لَا أُقْسِمُ بِيَوْمِ الْقِيَامَةِ
verses.translation: I swear by the Day of Resurrection.

verses.content: وَلَا أُقْسِمُ بِالنَّفْسِ اللَّوَّامَةِ
verses.translation: And by oath of the soul that reproaches itself.

verses.content: أَيَحْسَبُ الْإِنسَانُ أَلَّن نَّجْمَعَ عِظَامَهُ
verses.translation: Does man assume that We will never assemble his bones?

verses.content: بَلَىٰ قَادِرِينَ عَلَىٰ أَن نُّسَوِّيَ بَنَانَهُ
verses.translation: Surely yes, why not? We can properly make all his phalanxes.

verses.content: بَلْ يُرِيدُ الْإِنسَانُ لِيَفْجُرَ أَمَامَهُ
verses.translation: In fact man wishes to commit evil in front of Him!

verses.content: يَسْأَلُ أَيَّانَ يَوْمُ الْقِيَامَةِ
verses.translation: He asks, “When will be the Day of Resurrection?”

verses.content: فَإِذَا بَرِقَ الْبَصَرُ
verses.translation: So when the eyes will be blinded by light.

verses.content: وَخَسَفَ الْقَمَرُ
verses.translation: And the moon will be eclipsed.

verses.content: وَجُمِعَ الشَّمْسُ وَالْقَمَرُ
verses.translation: And the sun and the moon will be united.

verses.content: يَقُولُ الْإِنسَانُ يَوْمَئِذٍ أَيْنَ الْمَفَرُّ
verses.translation: On that day man will cry out, “Where shall I flee?”

verses.content: كَلَّا لَا وَزَرَ
verses.translation: Never! There is no refuge!

verses.content: إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ يَوْمَئِذٍ الْمُسْتَقَرُّ
verses.translation: On that day, the station is only towards your Lord.

verses.content: يُنَبَّأُ الْإِنسَانُ يَوْمَئِذٍ بِمَا قَدَّمَ وَأَخَّرَ
verses.translation: On that day, man will be informed of all what he sent ahead and left behind.

verses.content: بَلِ الْإِنسَانُ عَلَىٰ نَفْسِهِ بَصِيرَةٌ
verses.translation: In fact, man himself is keeping an eye on his state of affairs!

verses.content: وَلَوْ أَلْقَىٰ مَعَاذِيرَهُ
verses.translation: And even if he presents all the excuses he has, none will be listened to.

verses.content: لَا تُحَرِّكْ بِهِ لِسَانَكَ لِتَعْجَلَ بِهِ
verses.translation: O dear Prophet (Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him), do not cause your tongue to move along with the Qur’an in order to learn it faster.

verses.content: إِنَّ عَلَيْنَا جَمْعَهُ وَقُرْآنَهُ
verses.translation: Indeed assembling the Qur’an and reading it are upon Us.

verses.content: فَإِذَا قَرَأْنَاهُ فَاتَّبِعْ قُرْآنَهُ
verses.translation: So when We have read it, you should thereupon follow what is read.

verses.content: ثُمَّ إِنَّ عَلَيْنَا بَيَانَهُ
verses.translation: Then indeed, to explain its details to you is upon Us.

verses.content: كَلَّا بَلْ تُحِبُّونَ الْعَاجِلَةَ
verses.translation: None except you, O disbelievers – you love what you have, the fleeting one.

verses.content: وَتَذَرُونَ الْآخِرَةَ
verses.translation: And you have forsaken the Hereafter.

verses.content: وُجُوهٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ نَّاضِرَةٌ
verses.translation: On that day, some faces will shine with freshness.

verses.content: إِلَىٰ رَبِّهَا نَاظِرَةٌ
verses.translation: Looking toward their Lord.

verses.content: وَوُجُوهٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ بَاسِرَةٌ
verses.translation: And on that day some faces will be ghastly.

verses.content: تَظُنُّ أَن يُفْعَلَ بِهَا فَاقِرَةٌ
verses.translation: Knowing that they will be subjected to a torment that breaks the backs.

verses.content: كَلَّا إِذَا بَلَغَتِ التَّرَاقِيَ
verses.translation: Yes indeed, when the soul will reach up to the throat.

verses.content: وَقِيلَ مَنْ ۜ رَاقٍ
verses.translation: And they will say, “Is there any one – any magician?”

verses.content: وَظَنَّ أَنَّهُ الْفِرَاقُ
verses.translation: And he will realise that this is the parting.

verses.content: وَالْتَفَّتِ السَّاقُ بِالسَّاقِ
verses.translation: And one shin will curl up with the other shin.

verses.content: إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ يَوْمَئِذٍ الْمَسَاقُ
verses.translation: On that day, the herding will be only towards your Lord.

verses.content: فَلَا صَدَّقَ وَلَا صَلَّىٰ
verses.translation: Neither did he believe it to be true, nor did he offer the prayer.

verses.content: وَلَـٰكِن كَذَّبَ وَتَوَلَّىٰ
verses.translation: But he denied and turned away.

verses.content: ثُمَّ ذَهَبَ إِلَىٰ أَهْلِهِ يَتَمَطَّىٰ
verses.translation: Then he went back to his home in pride.

verses.content: أَوْلَىٰ لَكَ فَأَوْلَىٰ
verses.translation: Your ruin has come close, still closer.

verses.content: ثُمَّ أَوْلَىٰ لَكَ فَأَوْلَىٰ
verses.translation: Again your ruin has come close, still closer.

verses.content: أَيَحْسَبُ الْإِنسَانُ أَن يُتْرَكَ سُدًى
verses.translation: Does man assume that he will be let loose?

verses.content: أَلَمْ يَكُ نُطْفَةً مِّن مَّنِيٍّ يُمْنَىٰ
verses.translation: Was he not just a drop of the semen that is discharged?

verses.content: ثُمَّ كَانَ عَلَقَةً فَخَلَقَ فَسَوَّىٰ
verses.translation: He then became a clot – so Allah created him, then made him proper.

verses.content: فَجَعَلَ مِنْهُ الزَّوْجَيْنِ الذَّكَرَ وَالْأُنثَىٰ
verses.translation: So created from him a pair, the male and female.

verses.content: أَلَيْسَ ذَٰلِكَ بِقَادِرٍ عَلَىٰ أَن يُحْيِيَ الْمَوْتَىٰ
verses.translation: So will He, Who has done all this, not be able to revive the dead?

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ هَلْ أَتَىٰ عَلَى الْإِنسَانِ حِينٌ مِّنَ الدَّهْرِ لَمْ يَكُن شَيْئًا مَّذْكُورًا
verses.translation: Indeed there has been a time for man, when even his name did not exist anywhere.

verses.content: إِنَّا خَلَقْنَا الْإِنسَانَ مِن نُّطْفَةٍ أَمْشَاجٍ نَّبْتَلِيهِ فَجَعَلْنَاهُ سَمِيعًا بَصِيرًا
verses.translation: Indeed We have created man from mixed semen; in order to test him – We therefore made him hearing, knowing.

verses.content: إِنَّا هَدَيْنَاهُ السَّبِيلَ إِمَّا شَاكِرًا وَإِمَّا كَفُورًا
verses.translation: We have indeed shown him the way – whether he is grateful or ingrate.

verses.content: إِنَّا أَعْتَدْنَا لِلْكَافِرِينَ سَلَاسِلَ وَأَغْلَالًا وَسَعِيرًا
verses.translation: We have indeed kept prepared chains, and shackles and a blazing fire for the disbelievers.

verses.content: إِنَّ الْأَبْرَارَ يَشْرَبُونَ مِن كَأْسٍ كَانَ مِزَاجُهَا كَافُورًا
verses.translation: Indeed the virtuous will drink from a cup, containing a mixture of Kafoor.

verses.content: عَيْنًا يَشْرَبُ بِهَا عِبَادُ اللَّهِ يُفَجِّرُونَهَا تَفْجِيرًا
verses.translation: The Kafoor is a spring, from which the chosen bondmen of Allah will drink, causing it to flow wherever they wish inside their palaces.

verses.content: يُوفُونَ بِالنَّذْرِ وَيَخَافُونَ يَوْمًا كَانَ شَرُّهُ مُسْتَطِيرًا
verses.translation: They fulfil their pledges, and fear a day the evil of which is widespread.

verses.content: وَيُطْعِمُونَ الطَّعَامَ عَلَىٰ حُبِّهِ مِسْكِينًا وَيَتِيمًا وَأَسِيرًا
verses.translation: And out of His love, they give food to the needy, the orphan and the prisoner.

verses.content: إِنَّمَا نُطْعِمُكُمْ لِوَجْهِ اللَّهِ لَا نُرِيدُ مِنكُمْ جَزَاءً وَلَا شُكُورًا
verses.translation: They say to them, “We give you food, only for the sake of Allah – we do not seek any reward or thanks from you.”

verses.content: إِنَّا نَخَافُ مِن رَّبِّنَا يَوْمًا عَبُوسًا قَمْطَرِيرًا
verses.translation: “Indeed we fear from our Lord a day which is extremely bitter, most severe.”

verses.content: فَوَقَاهُمُ اللَّهُ شَرَّ ذَٰلِكَ الْيَوْمِ وَلَقَّاهُمْ نَضْرَةً وَسُرُورًا
verses.translation: So Allah saved them from the evil of that day, and gave them freshness and joy.

verses.content: وَجَزَاهُم بِمَا صَبَرُوا جَنَّةً وَحَرِيرًا
verses.translation: And gave them Paradise and silk clothes, as a reward for their patience.

verses.content: مُّتَّكِئِينَ فِيهَا عَلَى الْأَرَائِكِ ۖ لَا يَرَوْنَ فِيهَا شَمْسًا وَلَا زَمْهَرِيرًا
verses.translation: Reclining in it, upon thrones; they will not see the hot sunshine in it, nor the bitter cold.

verses.content: وَدَانِيَةً عَلَيْهِمْ ظِلَالُهَا وَذُلِّلَتْ قُطُوفُهَا تَذْلِيلًا
verses.translation: And its shade will cover them, and its fruit clusters brought down low for them.

verses.content: وَيُطَافُ عَلَيْهِم بِآنِيَةٍ مِّن فِضَّةٍ وَأَكْوَابٍ كَانَتْ قَوَارِيرَا
verses.translation: Rounds of silver cups and silver beakers, looking like glass, will be presented upon them.

verses.content: قَوَارِيرَ مِن فِضَّةٍ قَدَّرُوهَا تَقْدِيرًا
verses.translation: Glass made from silver, which the servers have filled up to the measure.

verses.content: وَيُسْقَوْنَ فِيهَا كَأْسًا كَانَ مِزَاجُهَا زَنجَبِيلًا
verses.translation: And in Paradise they will be given to drink cups, filled with a mixture of ginger.

verses.content: عَيْنًا فِيهَا تُسَمَّىٰ سَلْسَبِيلًا
verses.translation: Which is a spring in Paradise called Salsabeel.

verses.content: وَيَطُوفُ عَلَيْهِمْ وِلْدَانٌ مُّخَلَّدُونَ إِذَا رَأَيْتَهُمْ حَسِبْتَهُمْ لُؤْلُؤًا مَّنثُورًا
verses.translation: Immortal youths shall surround them, waiting upon them; when you see them, you would think they are scattered pearls.

verses.content: وَإِذَا رَأَيْتَ ثَمَّ رَأَيْتَ نَعِيمًا وَمُلْكًا كَبِيرًا
verses.translation: And when you look towards it, you will see serenity and a great kingdom.

verses.content: عَالِيَهُمْ ثِيَابُ سُندُسٍ خُضْرٌ وَإِسْتَبْرَقٌ ۖ وَحُلُّوا أَسَاوِرَ مِن فِضَّةٍ وَسَقَاهُمْ رَبُّهُمْ شَرَابًا طَهُورًا
verses.translation: In it they adorn clothes of fine green silk and gold embroidery; and they are given silver bracelets to wear; and their Lord gave them pure wine to drink.

verses.content: إِنَّ هَـٰذَا كَانَ لَكُمْ جَزَاءً وَكَانَ سَعْيُكُم مَّشْكُورًا
verses.translation: It will be said to them, “This is your reward – indeed your efforts have been appreciated.”

verses.content: إِنَّا نَحْنُ نَزَّلْنَا عَلَيْكَ الْقُرْآنَ تَنزِيلًا
verses.translation: Indeed We have sent down the Qur’an upon you, in stages.

verses.content: فَاصْبِرْ لِحُكْمِ رَبِّكَ وَلَا تُطِعْ مِنْهُمْ آثِمًا أَوْ كَفُورًا
verses.translation: Therefore stay patient upon your Lord’s command, and do not listen to any of the sinners or ingrates among them.

verses.content: وَاذْكُرِ اسْمَ رَبِّكَ بُكْرَةً وَأَصِيلًا
verses.translation: And remember the name of your Lord morning and evening.

verses.content: وَمِنَ اللَّيْلِ فَاسْجُدْ لَهُ وَسَبِّحْهُ لَيْلًا طَوِيلًا
verses.translation: And prostrate for Him in a part of the night, and proclaim His purity into the long night.

verses.content: إِنَّ هَـٰؤُلَاءِ يُحِبُّونَ الْعَاجِلَةَ وَيَذَرُونَ وَرَاءَهُمْ يَوْمًا ثَقِيلًا
verses.translation: Indeed these people love what they have, the fleeting one, and have forsaken the immensely important day behind them.

verses.content: نَّحْنُ خَلَقْنَاهُمْ وَشَدَدْنَا أَسْرَهُمْ ۖ وَإِذَا شِئْنَا بَدَّلْنَا أَمْثَالَهُمْ تَبْدِيلًا
verses.translation: It is We Who created them, and strengthened their skeleton; and We can replace them with others like them, whenever We will.

verses.content: إِنَّ هَـٰذِهِ تَذْكِرَةٌ ۖ فَمَن شَاءَ اتَّخَذَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِ سَبِيلًا
verses.translation: This is indeed an advice; so whoever wishes may take the path towards his Lord.
