verses.content: وَمَا تَشَاءُونَ إِلَّا أَن يَشَاءَ اللَّهُ ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ كَانَ عَلِيمًا حَكِيمًا
verses.translation: And what will you wish, except if Allah wills; indeed Allah is All Knowing, Wise.

verses.content: يُدْخِلُ مَن يَشَاءُ فِي رَحْمَتِهِ ۚ وَالظَّالِمِينَ أَعَدَّ لَهُمْ عَذَابًا أَلِيمًا
verses.translation: He admits into His mercy, whomever He wills; and for the unjust He has kept prepared a painful punishment.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ وَالْمُرْسَلَاتِ عُرْفًا
verses.translation: By oath of those that are sent, one after the other. (The verses of the Holy Qur’an or the angels or the winds).

verses.content: فَالْعَاصِفَاتِ عَصْفًا
verses.translation: Then by oath of those that push with a strong gust.

verses.content: وَالنَّاشِرَاتِ نَشْرًا
verses.translation: Then by oath of those that lift and carry.

verses.content: فَالْفَارِقَاتِ فَرْقًا
verses.translation: Then by those that clearly differentiate the right and wrong.

verses.content: فَالْمُلْقِيَاتِ ذِكْرًا
verses.translation: And then by those that instil Remembrance into the hearts.

verses.content: عُذْرًا أَوْ نُذْرًا
verses.translation: To complete the argument or to warn.

verses.content: إِنَّمَا تُوعَدُونَ لَوَاقِعٌ
verses.translation: Indeed what you are promised, will surely befall.

verses.content: فَإِذَا النُّجُومُ طُمِسَتْ
verses.translation: So when the lights of the stars are put out.

verses.content: وَإِذَا السَّمَاءُ فُرِجَتْ
verses.translation: And when the sky is split apart.

verses.content: وَإِذَا الْجِبَالُ نُسِفَتْ
verses.translation: And when the mountains are made into dust and blown away.

verses.content: وَإِذَا الرُّسُلُ أُقِّتَتْ
verses.translation: And when the time of the Noble Messengers arrives.

verses.content: لِأَيِّ يَوْمٍ أُجِّلَتْ
verses.translation: For which day were they appointed?

verses.content: لِيَوْمِ الْفَصْلِ
verses.translation: For the Day of Decision.

verses.content: وَمَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا يَوْمُ الْفَصْلِ
verses.translation: And what do you know, what the Day of Decision is!

verses.content: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.translation: Ruin is for the deniers on that day!

verses.content: أَلَمْ نُهْلِكِ الْأَوَّلِينَ
verses.translation: Did We not destroy the earlier people?

verses.content: ثُمَّ نُتْبِعُهُمُ الْآخِرِينَ
verses.translation: We shall then send the latter after them.

verses.content: كَذَٰلِكَ نَفْعَلُ بِالْمُجْرِمِينَ
verses.translation: This is how We deal with the guilty.

verses.content: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.translation: Ruin is for the deniers on that day!

verses.content: أَلَمْ نَخْلُقكُّم مِّن مَّاءٍ مَّهِينٍ
verses.translation: Did We not create you from an abject fluid?

verses.content: فَجَعَلْنَاهُ فِي قَرَارٍ مَّكِينٍ
verses.translation: We then kept it in a safe place.

verses.content: إِلَىٰ قَدَرٍ مَّعْلُومٍ
verses.translation: For a known calculated term.

verses.content: فَقَدَرْنَا فَنِعْمَ الْقَادِرُونَ
verses.translation: We then calculated; so how excellently do We control!

verses.content: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.translation: Ruin is for the deniers on that day!

verses.content: أَلَمْ نَجْعَلِ الْأَرْضَ كِفَاتًا
verses.translation: Did We not make the earth a storehouse?

verses.content: أَحْيَاءً وَأَمْوَاتًا
verses.translation: For the living and the dead among you?

verses.content: وَجَعَلْنَا فِيهَا رَوَاسِيَ شَامِخَاتٍ وَأَسْقَيْنَاكُم مَّاءً فُرَاتًا
verses.translation: And We placed high mountains as anchors in it and gave you sweet water to drink.

verses.content: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.translation: Ruin is for the deniers on that day!

verses.content: انطَلِقُوا إِلَىٰ مَا كُنتُم بِهِ تُكَذِّبُونَ
verses.translation: “Move towards what you used to deny!”

verses.content: انطَلِقُوا إِلَىٰ ظِلٍّ ذِي ثَلَاثِ شُعَبٍ
verses.translation: “Move towards the shadow of the smoke having three branches.”

verses.content: لَّا ظَلِيلٍ وَلَا يُغْنِي مِنَ اللَّهَبِ
verses.translation: “Which neither gives shade, nor saves from the flame.”

verses.content: إِنَّهَا تَرْمِي بِشَرَرٍ كَالْقَصْرِ
verses.translation: Indeed hell throws up sparks like huge castles.

verses.content: كَأَنَّهُ جِمَالَتٌ صُفْرٌ
verses.translation: Seeming like yellow camels.

verses.content: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.translation: Ruin is for the deniers on that day!

verses.content: هَـٰذَا يَوْمُ لَا يَنطِقُونَ
verses.translation: This is a day in which they will not be able to speak.

verses.content: وَلَا يُؤْذَنُ لَهُمْ فَيَعْتَذِرُونَ
verses.translation: Nor will they be given permission to present excuses.

verses.content: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.translation: Ruin is for the deniers on that day!

verses.content: هَـٰذَا يَوْمُ الْفَصْلِ ۖ جَمَعْنَاكُمْ وَالْأَوَّلِينَ
verses.translation: This is the Day of Decision; We have gathered you and all the earlier men.

verses.content: فَإِن كَانَ لَكُمْ كَيْدٌ فَكِيدُونِ
verses.translation: If you now have any conspiracy, carry it out on Me.

verses.content: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.translation: Ruin is for the deniers on that day!

verses.content: إِنَّ الْمُتَّقِينَ فِي ظِلَالٍ وَعُيُونٍ
verses.translation: Indeed the pious are in shade and springs.

verses.content: وَفَوَاكِهَ مِمَّا يَشْتَهُونَ
verses.translation: And among fruits whichever they may desire.

verses.content: كُلُوا وَاشْرَبُوا هَنِيئًا بِمَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ
verses.translation: “Eat and drink with pleasure, the reward of your deeds.”

verses.content: إِنَّا كَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِي الْمُحْسِنِينَ
verses.translation: This is how We reward the virtuous.

verses.content: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.translation: Ruin is for the deniers on that day!

verses.content: كُلُوا وَتَمَتَّعُوا قَلِيلًا إِنَّكُم مُّجْرِمُونَ
verses.translation: “Eat and enjoy for a while – indeed you are guilty.”

verses.content: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.translation: Ruin is for the deniers on that day!

verses.content: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمُ ارْكَعُوا لَا يَرْكَعُونَ
verses.translation: And when it is said to them, “Offer the prayer” – they do not!

verses.content: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.translation: Ruin is for the deniers on that day!

verses.content: فَبِأَيِّ حَدِيثٍ بَعْدَهُ يُؤْمِنُونَ
verses.translation: So after this, in what matter will they believe?

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ عَمَّ يَتَسَاءَلُونَ
verses.translation: What are they questioning each other about?

verses.content: عَنِ النَّبَإِ الْعَظِيمِ
verses.translation: About the great tidings!

verses.content: الَّذِي هُمْ فِيهِ مُخْتَلِفُونَ
verses.translation: Regarding which they hold different views.

verses.content: كَلَّا سَيَعْلَمُونَ
verses.translation: Surely yes, they will soon come to know!

verses.content: ثُمَّ كَلَّا سَيَعْلَمُونَ
verses.translation: Again surely yes, they will soon come to know!

verses.content: أَلَمْ نَجْعَلِ الْأَرْضَ مِهَادًا
verses.translation: Did We not make the earth a bed?

verses.content: وَالْجِبَالَ أَوْتَادًا
verses.translation: And the mountains as pegs?

verses.content: وَخَلَقْنَاكُمْ أَزْوَاجًا
verses.translation: And it is We who created you in pairs.

verses.content: وَجَعَلْنَا نَوْمَكُمْ سُبَاتًا
verses.translation: And made your sleep a rest.

verses.content: وَجَعَلْنَا اللَّيْلَ لِبَاسًا
verses.translation: And made the night a cover.

verses.content: وَجَعَلْنَا النَّهَارَ مَعَاشًا
verses.translation: And made the day for seeking livelihood.

verses.content: وَبَنَيْنَا فَوْقَكُمْ سَبْعًا شِدَادًا
verses.translation: And built seven strong roofs above you.

verses.content: وَجَعَلْنَا سِرَاجًا وَهَّاجًا
verses.translation: And have kept a very bright lamp in it.

verses.content: وَأَنزَلْنَا مِنَ الْمُعْصِرَاتِ مَاءً ثَجَّاجًا
verses.translation: And then sent down hard rain from the water bearing clouds.

verses.content: لِّنُخْرِجَ بِهِ حَبًّا وَنَبَاتًا
verses.translation: In order to produce grain and plants with it.

verses.content: وَجَنَّاتٍ أَلْفَافًا
verses.translation: And dense gardens.

verses.content: إِنَّ يَوْمَ الْفَصْلِ كَانَ مِيقَاتًا
verses.translation: Indeed the Day of Decision is a time fixed.

verses.content: يَوْمَ يُنفَخُ فِي الصُّورِ فَتَأْتُونَ أَفْوَاجًا
verses.translation: The day when the Trumpet will be blown – you will therefore come forth in multitudes.

verses.content: وَفُتِحَتِ السَّمَاءُ فَكَانَتْ أَبْوَابًا
verses.translation: And the heaven will be opened – it therefore becomes like gates.

verses.content: وَسُيِّرَتِ الْجِبَالُ فَكَانَتْ سَرَابًا
verses.translation: And the mountains will be moved – they will therefore become like mirages.

verses.content: إِنَّ جَهَنَّمَ كَانَتْ مِرْصَادًا
verses.translation: Indeed hell is lying in ambush.

verses.content: لِّلطَّاغِينَ مَآبًا
verses.translation: The destination of the rebellious.

verses.content: لَّابِثِينَ فِيهَا أَحْقَابًا
verses.translation: They will remain in it for ages.

verses.content: لَّا يَذُوقُونَ فِيهَا بَرْدًا وَلَا شَرَابًا
verses.translation: They will neither taste anything cool in it, nor anything to drink.

verses.content: إِلَّا حَمِيمًا وَغَسَّاقًا
verses.translation: Except hot boiling water and hot pus discharged from the people of hell.

verses.content: جَزَاءً وِفَاقًا
verses.translation: The reward to each is according to what he is.

verses.content: إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا لَا يَرْجُونَ حِسَابًا
verses.translation: Indeed they had no fear of the account.

verses.content: وَكَذَّبُوا بِآيَاتِنَا كِذَّابًا
verses.translation: And they denied Our signs to the extreme.

verses.content: وَكُلَّ شَيْءٍ أَحْصَيْنَاهُ كِتَابًا
verses.translation: And We have kept recorded everything in a Book, accounted for.

verses.content: فَذُوقُوا فَلَن نَّزِيدَكُمْ إِلَّا عَذَابًا
verses.translation: Therefore taste it now – We shall not increase anything for you except the punishment.

verses.content: إِنَّ لِلْمُتَّقِينَ مَفَازًا
verses.translation: Indeed the place of success is for the pious.

verses.content: حَدَائِقَ وَأَعْنَابًا
verses.translation: Gardens and grapes.

verses.content: وَكَوَاعِبَ أَتْرَابًا
verses.translation: And maidens of a single age.

verses.content: وَكَأْسًا دِهَاقًا
verses.translation: And an overflowing cup.

verses.content: لَّا يَسْمَعُونَ فِيهَا لَغْوًا وَلَا كِذَّابًا
verses.translation: In which they shall neither hear lewd talk, nor any lie.

verses.content: جَزَاءً مِّن رَّبِّكَ عَطَاءً حِسَابًا
verses.translation: A reward from your Lord – a grossly sufficient bestowal.

verses.content: رَّبِّ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا الرَّحْمَـٰنِ ۖ لَا يَمْلِكُونَ مِنْهُ خِطَابًا
verses.translation: Lord of the heavens and the earth, and all whatever is between them – the Most Gracious – with Whom no one will have the right to talk.

verses.content: يَوْمَ يَقُومُ الرُّوحُ وَالْمَلَائِكَةُ صَفًّا ۖ لَّا يَتَكَلَّمُونَ إِلَّا مَنْ أَذِنَ لَهُ الرَّحْمَـٰنُ وَقَالَ صَوَابًا
verses.translation: The day when Jibreel and all the angels will stand in rows; none will be able to speak except one whom the Most Gracious commands and who spoke rightly. (Prophet Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him – will be the first to be granted permission to intercede.)

verses.content: ذَٰلِكَ الْيَوْمُ الْحَقُّ ۖ فَمَن شَاءَ اتَّخَذَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِ مَآبًا
verses.translation: That is the True Day; therefore whoever wills may take the path towards his Lord.

verses.content: إِنَّا أَنذَرْنَاكُمْ عَذَابًا قَرِيبًا يَوْمَ يَنظُرُ الْمَرْءُ مَا قَدَّمَتْ يَدَاهُ وَيَقُولُ الْكَافِرُ يَا لَيْتَنِي كُنتُ تُرَابًا
verses.translation: We warn you of a punishment that has come near; a day on which man will see what his own hands have sent ahead, and the disbeliever will say, “Alas – if only I were dust!”

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ وَالنَّازِعَاتِ غَرْقًا
verses.translation: By oath of those who harshly pull out the soul. (Of the disbeliever)

verses.content: وَالنَّاشِطَاتِ نَشْطًا
verses.translation: And who softly release the soul. (Of the believer)

verses.content: وَالسَّابِحَاتِ سَبْحًا
verses.translation: And who glide with ease.

verses.content: فَالسَّابِقَاتِ سَبْقًا
verses.translation: And who quickly present themselves.

verses.content: فَالْمُدَبِّرَاتِ أَمْرًا
verses.translation: And who plan the implementation.

verses.content: يَوْمَ تَرْجُفُ الرَّاجِفَةُ
verses.translation: On the day when the trembling one will tremble. (The disbelievers will certainly taste the punishment.)

verses.content: تَتْبَعُهَا الرَّادِفَةُ
verses.translation: And the following event will come after it.

verses.content: قُلُوبٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ وَاجِفَةٌ
verses.translation: Many a heart will flutter on that day!

verses.content: أَبْصَارُهَا خَاشِعَةٌ
verses.translation: Unable to lift their gaze.

verses.content: يَقُولُونَ أَإِنَّا لَمَرْدُودُونَ فِي الْحَافِرَةِ
verses.translation: The disbelievers say, “Will we really return to our former state?”

verses.content: أَإِذَا كُنَّا عِظَامًا نَّخِرَةً
verses.translation: “When we have become decayed bones?”

verses.content: قَالُوا تِلْكَ إِذًا كَرَّةٌ خَاسِرَةٌ
verses.translation: They said, “So this return is an obvious loss!”

verses.content: فَإِنَّمَا هِيَ زَجْرَةٌ وَاحِدَةٌ
verses.translation: So that is not but a single shout.

verses.content: فَإِذَا هُم بِالسَّاهِرَةِ
verses.translation: So they will immediately be in an open plain.

verses.content: هَلْ أَتَاكَ حَدِيثُ مُوسَىٰ
verses.translation: Did the news of Moosa reach you?

verses.content: إِذْ نَادَاهُ رَبُّهُ بِالْوَادِ الْمُقَدَّسِ طُوًى
verses.translation: When his Lord called him in the holy valley of Tuwa.

verses.content: اذْهَبْ إِلَىٰ فِرْعَوْنَ إِنَّهُ طَغَىٰ
verses.translation: That “Go to Firaun – he has rebelled.”

verses.content: فَقُلْ هَل لَّكَ إِلَىٰ أَن تَزَكَّىٰ
verses.translation: “Tell him ‘Do you have the inclination to become pure?’

verses.content: وَأَهْدِيَكَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ فَتَخْشَىٰ
verses.translation: ‘And I may guide you to your Lord, so that you may fear.’”

verses.content: فَأَرَاهُ الْآيَةَ الْكُبْرَىٰ
verses.translation: So Moosa showed him a magnificent sign.

verses.content: فَكَذَّبَ وَعَصَىٰ
verses.translation: In response, he denied and disobeyed.

verses.content: ثُمَّ أَدْبَرَ يَسْعَىٰ
verses.translation: He then turned away, striving in his effort.

verses.content: فَحَشَرَ فَنَادَىٰ
verses.translation: So he gathered the people, and proclaimed.

verses.content: فَقَالَ أَنَا رَبُّكُمُ الْأَعْلَىٰ
verses.translation: And then said, “I am your most supreme lord.”

verses.content: فَأَخَذَهُ اللَّهُ نَكَالَ الْآخِرَةِ وَالْأُولَىٰ
verses.translation: Allah therefore seized him, in the punishment of this world and the Hereafter.

verses.content: إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَعِبْرَةً لِّمَن يَخْشَىٰ
verses.translation: Indeed in this is a lesson for one who fears.

verses.content: أَأَنتُمْ أَشَدُّ خَلْقًا أَمِ السَّمَاءُ ۚ بَنَاهَا
verses.translation: Do you think that it is harder to create you or the heavens? Allah has created it.

verses.content: رَفَعَ سَمْكَهَا فَسَوَّاهَا
verses.translation: He raised its roof and made it proper.

verses.content: وَأَغْطَشَ لَيْلَهَا وَأَخْرَجَ ضُحَاهَا
verses.translation: And He made its night dark, and started its light.

verses.content: وَالْأَرْضَ بَعْدَ ذَٰلِكَ دَحَاهَا
verses.translation: And after it spread out the earth.

verses.content: أَخْرَجَ مِنْهَا مَاءَهَا وَمَرْعَاهَا
verses.translation: And from it produced its water and its pasture.

verses.content: وَالْجِبَالَ أَرْسَاهَا
verses.translation: And solidified the mountains.

verses.content: مَتَاعًا لَّكُمْ وَلِأَنْعَامِكُمْ
verses.translation: In order to benefit you and your cattle.

verses.content: فَإِذَا جَاءَتِ الطَّامَّةُ الْكُبْرَىٰ
verses.translation: So when the greatest universal disaster arrives,

verses.content: يَوْمَ يَتَذَكَّرُ الْإِنسَانُ مَا سَعَىٰ
verses.translation: On that day man will recall all what he strove for.

verses.content: وَبُرِّزَتِ الْجَحِيمُ لِمَن يَرَىٰ
verses.translation: And hell will be made visible to all those who can see.

verses.content: فَأَمَّا مَن طَغَىٰ
verses.translation: So for one who rebelled,

verses.content: وَآثَرَ الْحَيَاةَ الدُّنْيَا
verses.translation: And preferred the worldly life,

verses.content: فَإِنَّ الْجَحِيمَ هِيَ الْمَأْوَىٰ
verses.translation: Then indeed hell only is his destination.

verses.content: وَأَمَّا مَنْ خَافَ مَقَامَ رَبِّهِ وَنَهَى النَّفْسَ عَنِ الْهَوَىٰ
verses.translation: And for one who feared to stand before his Lord and restrained his soul from desire,

verses.content: فَإِنَّ الْجَنَّةَ هِيَ الْمَأْوَىٰ
verses.translation: Then indeed Paradise only is his destination.

verses.content: يَسْأَلُونَكَ عَنِ السَّاعَةِ أَيَّانَ مُرْسَاهَا
verses.translation: They (the disbelievers) ask you regarding the Last Day, as to when is its appointed time.

verses.content: فِيمَ أَنتَ مِن ذِكْرَاهَا
verses.translation: What concern do you have regarding its explanation? (You are not bound to tell them)

verses.content: إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ مُنتَهَاهَا
verses.translation: Towards your Lord only is its conclusion.

verses.content: إِنَّمَا أَنتَ مُنذِرُ مَن يَخْشَاهَا
verses.translation: You are but a Herald of Warning, for one who fears it.

verses.content: كَأَنَّهُمْ يَوْمَ يَرَوْنَهَا لَمْ يَلْبَثُوا إِلَّا عَشِيَّةً أَوْ ضُحَاهَا
verses.translation: The day when they will see it, it will seem as if they had not stayed on earth except for an evening or its morning.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ عَبَسَ وَتَوَلَّىٰ
verses.translation: He frowned and turned away.

verses.content: أَن جَاءَهُ الْأَعْمَىٰ
verses.translation: Because the blind man had come in his august presence.

verses.content: وَمَا يُدْرِيكَ لَعَلَّهُ يَزَّكَّىٰ
verses.translation: And what do you know, he may be of the pure!

verses.content: أَوْ يَذَّكَّرُ فَتَنفَعَهُ الذِّكْرَىٰ
verses.translation: Or that he may accept advice, so the advice may benefit him.

verses.content: أَمَّا مَنِ اسْتَغْنَىٰ
verses.translation: For him who does not care,

verses.content: فَأَنتَ لَهُ تَصَدَّىٰ
verses.translation: So you are after him!

verses.content: وَمَا عَلَيْكَ أَلَّا يَزَّكَّىٰ
verses.translation: And you have nothing to lose if he does not become pure.

verses.content: وَأَمَّا مَن جَاءَكَ يَسْعَىٰ
verses.translation: And for him who came to you striving,

verses.content: وَهُوَ يَخْشَىٰ
verses.translation: And whereas he fears,

verses.content: فَأَنتَ عَنْهُ تَلَهَّىٰ
verses.translation: So you leave him, and are engrossed elsewhere!

verses.content: كَلَّا إِنَّهَا تَذْكِرَةٌ
verses.translation: Not this way – this is the advice.

verses.content: فَمَن شَاءَ ذَكَرَهُ
verses.translation: So whoever wishes may remember it.

verses.content: فِي صُحُفٍ مُّكَرَّمَةٍ
verses.translation: On honourable pages.

verses.content: مَّرْفُوعَةٍ مُّطَهَّرَةٍ
verses.translation: Exalted, pure.

verses.content: بِأَيْدِي سَفَرَةٍ
verses.translation: Written by the hands of emissaries.

verses.content: كِرَامٍ بَرَرَةٍ
verses.translation: Who are noble, virtuous.

verses.content: قُتِلَ الْإِنسَانُ مَا أَكْفَرَهُ
verses.translation: May man be slain – how ungrateful he is!

verses.content: مِنْ أَيِّ شَيْءٍ خَلَقَهُ
verses.translation: From what did He create him?

verses.content: مِن نُّطْفَةٍ خَلَقَهُ فَقَدَّرَهُ
verses.translation: From a drop of liquid; He created him and then set several measures for him.

verses.content: ثُمَّ السَّبِيلَ يَسَّرَهُ
verses.translation: Then eased the way for him.

verses.content: ثُمَّ أَمَاتَهُ فَأَقْبَرَهُ
verses.translation: Then gave him death, so had him put in the grave.

verses.content: ثُمَّ إِذَا شَاءَ أَنشَرَهُ
verses.translation: Then, when He willed, He brought him out. (As during the night of Holy Prophet’s ascension, when all the Prophets gathered behind him in the Al Aqsa mosque in Jerusalem. Or when Allah will raise everyone on the Day of Resurrection.)

verses.content: كَلَّا لَمَّا يَقْضِ مَا أَمَرَهُ
verses.translation: Not one – he has not yet completed what he was commanded.

verses.content: فَلْيَنظُرِ الْإِنسَانُ إِلَىٰ طَعَامِهِ
verses.translation: So man must look at his food.

verses.content: أَنَّا صَبَبْنَا الْمَاءَ صَبًّا
verses.translation: That We watered it in abundance.

verses.content: ثُمَّ شَقَقْنَا الْأَرْضَ شَقًّا
verses.translation: Then We split the earth properly.

verses.content: فَأَنبَتْنَا فِيهَا حَبًّا
verses.translation: Thereby produced grain in it.

verses.content: وَعِنَبًا وَقَضْبًا
verses.translation: And grapes and fodder,

verses.content: وَزَيْتُونًا وَنَخْلًا
verses.translation: And olives and date palms,

verses.content: وَحَدَائِقَ غُلْبًا
verses.translation: And dense gardens,

verses.content: وَفَاكِهَةً وَأَبًّا
verses.translation: And fruits and grass,

verses.content: مَّتَاعًا لَّكُمْ وَلِأَنْعَامِكُمْ
verses.translation: In order to benefit you and your cattle.

verses.content: فَإِذَا جَاءَتِ الصَّاخَّةُ
verses.translation: So when the deafening Shout arrives,

verses.content: يَوْمَ يَفِرُّ الْمَرْءُ مِنْ أَخِيهِ
verses.translation: On that day man will run away from his brother.

verses.content: وَأُمِّهِ وَأَبِيهِ
verses.translation: And from his mother and father,

verses.content: وَصَاحِبَتِهِ وَبَنِيهِ
verses.translation: And from his wife and sons.

verses.content: لِكُلِّ امْرِئٍ مِّنْهُمْ يَوْمَئِذٍ شَأْنٌ يُغْنِيهِ
verses.translation: On that day, each one has just one issue, which is enough for him.

verses.content: وُجُوهٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ مُّسْفِرَةٌ
verses.translation: Many a face will be glittering on that day.

verses.content: ضَاحِكَةٌ مُّسْتَبْشِرَةٌ
verses.translation: Laughing, rejoicing.

verses.content: وَوُجُوهٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ عَلَيْهَا غَبَرَةٌ
verses.translation: And many a face will be covered with dust on that day.

verses.content: تَرْهَقُهَا قَتَرَةٌ
verses.translation: Blackness overcoming them.

verses.content: أُولَـٰئِكَ هُمُ الْكَفَرَةُ الْفَجَرَةُ
verses.translation: It is they, the disbelievers, the sinners.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ إِذَا الشَّمْسُ كُوِّرَتْ
verses.translation: When the sunlight is rolled up.

verses.content: وَإِذَا النُّجُومُ انكَدَرَتْ
verses.translation: And when the stars fall down.

verses.content: وَإِذَا الْجِبَالُ سُيِّرَتْ
verses.translation: And when the mountains are driven.

verses.content: وَإِذَا الْعِشَارُ عُطِّلَتْ
verses.translation: And when milch camels roam abandoned.

verses.content: وَإِذَا الْوُحُوشُ حُشِرَتْ
verses.translation: And when wild animals are herded together.

verses.content: وَإِذَا الْبِحَارُ سُجِّرَتْ
verses.translation: And when the seas are set afire.

verses.content: وَإِذَا النُّفُوسُ زُوِّجَتْ
verses.translation: And when the souls are paired.

verses.content: وَإِذَا الْمَوْءُودَةُ سُئِلَتْ
verses.translation: And when the girl-child who was buried alive is asked.

verses.content: بِأَيِّ ذَنبٍ قُتِلَتْ
verses.translation: Upon what sin was she killed for.

verses.content: وَإِذَا الصُّحُفُ نُشِرَتْ
verses.translation: And when the Records of Account are laid bare.

verses.content: وَإِذَا السَّمَاءُ كُشِطَتْ
verses.translation: And when the heaven is torn away.

verses.content: وَإِذَا الْجَحِيمُ سُعِّرَتْ
verses.translation: And when hell is further enflamed.

verses.content: وَإِذَا الْجَنَّةُ أُزْلِفَتْ
verses.translation: And when Paradise is brought near.

verses.content: عَلِمَتْ نَفْسٌ مَّا أَحْضَرَتْ
verses.translation: Every soul will then come know what it has brought.

verses.content: فَلَا أُقْسِمُ بِالْخُنَّسِ
verses.translation: So by oath of those that revolve. (The planets.)

verses.content: الْجَوَارِ الْكُنَّسِ
verses.translation: Who move straight and stop.

verses.content: وَاللَّيْلِ إِذَا عَسْعَسَ
verses.translation: And by oath of the night when it turns back.

verses.content: وَالصُّبْحِ إِذَا تَنَفَّسَ
verses.translation: And by oath of the morning when it takes birth.

verses.content: إِنَّهُ لَقَوْلُ رَسُولٍ كَرِيمٍ
verses.translation: This is indeed the recitation of an honoured Noble Messenger. (Angel Jibreel – peace and blessings be upon him.)

verses.content: ذِي قُوَّةٍ عِندَ ذِي الْعَرْشِ مَكِينٍ
verses.translation: The mighty, the honoured in the presence of the Lord of the Throne.

verses.content: مُّطَاعٍ ثَمَّ أَمِينٍ
verses.translation: The one who is obeyed, and trustworthy. (Other angels obey angel Jibreel).

verses.content: وَمَا صَاحِبُكُم بِمَجْنُونٍ
verses.translation: And your companion is not insane.

verses.content: وَلَقَدْ رَآهُ بِالْأُفُقِ الْمُبِينِ
verses.translation: And indeed he saw him on the clear horizon. (Prophet Mohammed saw Angel Jibreel in his true shape – peace and blessings be upon them).

verses.content: وَمَا هُوَ عَلَى الْغَيْبِ بِضَنِينٍ
verses.translation: And this Prophet is not miserly upon the hidden. (Allah gave the knowledge of the hidden to the Holy Prophet – peace and blessings be upon him.)

verses.content: وَمَا هُوَ بِقَوْلِ شَيْطَانٍ رَّجِيمٍ
verses.translation: And the Qur’an is not the recitation of Satan the outcast.

verses.content: فَأَيْنَ تَذْهَبُونَ
verses.translation: So where are you going?

verses.content: إِنْ هُوَ إِلَّا ذِكْرٌ لِّلْعَالَمِينَ
verses.translation: That is but an advice to the entire creation!

verses.content: لِمَن شَاءَ مِنكُمْ أَن يَسْتَقِيمَ
verses.translation: For the one among you who wishes to become upright.

verses.content: وَمَا تَشَاءُونَ إِلَّا أَن يَشَاءَ اللَّهُ رَبُّ الْعَالَمِينَ
verses.translation: And what will you wish, except if Allah wills – the Lord of the Creation.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ إِذَا السَّمَاءُ انفَطَرَتْ
verses.translation: When the heaven splits open.

verses.content: وَإِذَا الْكَوَاكِبُ انتَثَرَتْ
verses.translation: And when the stars fall down.

verses.content: وَإِذَا الْبِحَارُ فُجِّرَتْ
verses.translation: And when the oceans are swept away.

verses.content: وَإِذَا الْقُبُورُ بُعْثِرَتْ
verses.translation: And when the graves are overturned.

verses.content: عَلِمَتْ نَفْسٌ مَّا قَدَّمَتْ وَأَخَّرَتْ
verses.translation: Every soul will come to know what it has sent ahead and what it left behind.

verses.content: يَا أَيُّهَا الْإِنسَانُ مَا غَرَّكَ بِرَبِّكَ الْكَرِيمِ
verses.translation: O man! What has deceived you away from your Lord, the Most Beneficent?

verses.content: الَّذِي خَلَقَكَ فَسَوَّاكَ فَعَدَلَكَ
verses.translation: The One Who created you, then moulded you, then made you proper?

verses.content: فِي أَيِّ صُورَةٍ مَّا شَاءَ رَكَّبَكَ
verses.translation: He moulded you into whatever shape He willed.

verses.content: كَلَّا بَلْ تُكَذِّبُونَ بِالدِّينِ
verses.translation: Not at all – but rather you deny the establishment of Justice.

verses.content: وَإِنَّ عَلَيْكُمْ لَحَافِظِينَ
verses.translation: And indeed there are some guardians over you.

verses.content: كِرَامًا كَاتِبِينَ
verses.translation: The honourable recorders.

verses.content: يَعْلَمُونَ مَا تَفْعَلُونَ
verses.translation: Knowing all what you may do.

verses.content: إِنَّ الْأَبْرَارَ لَفِي نَعِيمٍ
verses.translation: Indeed the virtuous are in serenity.

verses.content: وَإِنَّ الْفُجَّارَ لَفِي جَحِيمٍ
verses.translation: And indeed the sinners are in hell.

verses.content: يَصْلَوْنَهَا يَوْمَ الدِّينِ
verses.translation: They will enter it on the Day of Justice.

verses.content: وَمَا هُمْ عَنْهَا بِغَائِبِينَ
verses.translation: And will not be able to hide from it.

verses.content: وَمَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا يَوْمُ الدِّينِ
verses.translation: And what do you know – of what sort is the Day of Justice!

verses.content: ثُمَّ مَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا يَوْمُ الدِّينِ
verses.translation: Again, what do you know – of what sort is the Day of Justice!

verses.content: يَوْمَ لَا تَمْلِكُ نَفْسٌ لِّنَفْسٍ شَيْئًا ۖ وَالْأَمْرُ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلَّهِ
verses.translation: The day on which no soul will have the authority over any other soul; and on that day, the entire command belongs to Allah.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ وَيْلٌ لِّلْمُطَفِّفِينَ
verses.translation: Ruin is for the defrauders. (Those who measure less.)

verses.content: الَّذِينَ إِذَا اكْتَالُوا عَلَى النَّاسِ يَسْتَوْفُونَ
verses.translation: Those who when they take the measure from others, take it in full!

verses.content: وَإِذَا كَالُوهُمْ أَو وَّزَنُوهُمْ يُخْسِرُونَ
verses.translation: Whereas when they give others after measuring or weighing, they give them less!

verses.content: أَلَا يَظُنُّ أُولَـٰئِكَ أَنَّهُم مَّبْعُوثُونَ
verses.translation: What! Do they not expect that they will be raised?

verses.content: لِيَوْمٍ عَظِيمٍ
verses.translation: (To be raised) for a Great Day?

verses.content: يَوْمَ يَقُومُ النَّاسُ لِرَبِّ الْعَالَمِينَ
verses.translation: The day when everyone will stand before the Lord Of The Creation.

verses.content: كَلَّا إِنَّ كِتَابَ الْفُجَّارِ لَفِي سِجِّينٍ
verses.translation: Indeed, the record of the disbelievers is in the lowest place, the Sijjeen.

verses.content: وَمَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا سِجِّينٌ
verses.translation: And what do you know, how (wretched) the Sijjeen is!

verses.content: كِتَابٌ مَّرْقُومٌ
verses.translation: The record is a sealed text.

verses.content: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.translation: Ruin is for the deniers on that day!

verses.content: الَّذِينَ يُكَذِّبُونَ بِيَوْمِ الدِّينِ
verses.translation: Those who deny the Day of Justice.

verses.content: وَمَا يُكَذِّبُ بِهِ إِلَّا كُلُّ مُعْتَدٍ أَثِيمٍ
verses.translation: And none will deny it, except every transgressor, rebel.

verses.content: إِذَا تُتْلَىٰ عَلَيْهِ آيَاتُنَا قَالَ أَسَاطِيرُ الْأَوَّلِينَ
verses.translation: When you recite Our verses to him, he says, “Stories of earlier men!”

verses.content: كَلَّا ۖ بَلْ ۜ رَانَ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِهِم مَّا كَانُوا يَكْسِبُونَ
verses.translation: Not at all – but rather their earnings have heaped rust upon their hearts.

verses.content: كَلَّا إِنَّهُمْ عَن رَّبِّهِمْ يَوْمَئِذٍ لَّمَحْجُوبُونَ
verses.translation: Yes indeed – they will be deprived of seeing their Lord on that day.

verses.content: ثُمَّ إِنَّهُمْ لَصَالُو الْجَحِيمِ
verses.translation: Then indeed they have to enter hell.

verses.content: ثُمَّ يُقَالُ هَـٰذَا الَّذِي كُنتُم بِهِ تُكَذِّبُونَ
verses.translation: It will then be said, “This is what you used to deny.”

verses.content: كَلَّا إِنَّ كِتَابَ الْأَبْرَارِ لَفِي عِلِّيِّينَ
verses.translation: Indeed the record of the virtuous is in the highest place, the Illiyin.

verses.content: وَمَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا عِلِّيُّونَ
verses.translation: And what do you know what the Illiyoon are!

verses.content: كِتَابٌ مَّرْقُومٌ
verses.translation: The record is a sealed text.

verses.content: يَشْهَدُهُ الْمُقَرَّبُونَ
verses.translation: Which is witnessed by the close ones.

verses.content: إِنَّ الْأَبْرَارَ لَفِي نَعِيمٍ
verses.translation: Indeed the virtuous are in serenity.

verses.content: عَلَى الْأَرَائِكِ يَنظُرُونَ
verses.translation: On thrones, watching.

verses.content: تَعْرِفُ فِي وُجُوهِهِمْ نَضْرَةَ النَّعِيمِ
verses.translation: You will recognise the freshness of serenity on their faces.

verses.content: يُسْقَوْنَ مِن رَّحِيقٍ مَّخْتُومٍ
verses.translation: They will be given pure wine to drink, which is kept preserved, sealed.

verses.content: خِتَامُهُ مِسْكٌ ۚ وَفِي ذَٰلِكَ فَلْيَتَنَافَسِ الْمُتَنَافِسُونَ
verses.translation: Its seal is upon musk; and for this should those who crave be eager.

verses.content: وَمِزَاجُهُ مِن تَسْنِيمٍ
verses.translation: And it is mixed with Tasneem.

verses.content: عَيْنًا يَشْرَبُ بِهَا الْمُقَرَّبُونَ
verses.translation: The spring from which drink the ones close to Allah.

verses.content: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ أَجْرَمُوا كَانُوا مِنَ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا يَضْحَكُونَ
verses.translation: Indeed the guilty used to laugh at the believers.

verses.content: وَإِذَا مَرُّوا بِهِمْ يَتَغَامَزُونَ
verses.translation: And when the believers used to pass by, they used to gesture at each other with their eyes.

verses.content: وَإِذَا انقَلَبُوا إِلَىٰ أَهْلِهِمُ انقَلَبُوا فَكِهِينَ
verses.translation: And whilst returning to their homes, they used to return rejoicing.

verses.content: وَإِذَا رَأَوْهُمْ قَالُوا إِنَّ هَـٰؤُلَاءِ لَضَالُّونَ
verses.translation: And upon seeing the Muslims, they used to say, “Indeed they have gone astray.”

verses.content: وَمَا أُرْسِلُوا عَلَيْهِمْ حَافِظِينَ
verses.translation: Whereas they have not at all been sent as guardians over them.

verses.content: فَالْيَوْمَ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا مِنَ الْكُفَّارِ يَضْحَكُونَ
verses.translation: So this day it is the believers who laugh at the disbelievers.

verses.content: عَلَى الْأَرَائِكِ يَنظُرُونَ
verses.translation: On high thrones, watching.

verses.content: هَلْ ثُوِّبَ الْكُفَّارُ مَا كَانُوا يَفْعَلُونَ
verses.translation: Did not the disbelievers get repaid for what they used to do?

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ إِذَا السَّمَاءُ انشَقَّتْ
verses.translation: When the heaven breaks apart.

verses.content: وَأَذِنَتْ لِرَبِّهَا وَحُقَّتْ
verses.translation: And it listens to the command of its Lord – and that befits it.

verses.content: وَإِذَا الْأَرْضُ مُدَّتْ
verses.translation: And when the earth is spread out.

verses.content: وَأَلْقَتْ مَا فِيهَا وَتَخَلَّتْ
verses.translation: And it unburdens itself of all that is in it, and becomes empty.

verses.content: وَأَذِنَتْ لِرَبِّهَا وَحُقَّتْ
verses.translation: And it listens to the command of its Lord – and that befits it.

verses.content: يَا أَيُّهَا الْإِنسَانُ إِنَّكَ كَادِحٌ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ كَدْحًا فَمُلَاقِيهِ
verses.translation: O man, indeed you have to surely run towards your Lord, and to meet him.

verses.content: فَأَمَّا مَنْ أُوتِيَ كِتَابَهُ بِيَمِينِهِ
verses.translation: So whoever is given his record of deeds in his right hand –

verses.content: فَسَوْفَ يُحَاسَبُ حِسَابًا يَسِيرًا
verses.translation: Soon an easy account will be taken from him.

verses.content: وَيَنقَلِبُ إِلَىٰ أَهْلِهِ مَسْرُورًا
verses.translation: And he will return to his family rejoicing.

verses.content: وَأَمَّا مَنْ أُوتِيَ كِتَابَهُ وَرَاءَ ظَهْرِهِ
verses.translation: And whoever is given his record of deeds behind his back –

verses.content: فَسَوْفَ يَدْعُو ثُبُورًا
verses.translation: Soon he will pray for death.

verses.content: وَيَصْلَىٰ سَعِيرًا
verses.translation: And will go into the blazing fire.

verses.content: إِنَّهُ كَانَ فِي أَهْلِهِ مَسْرُورًا
verses.translation: Indeed he used to rejoice in his home.

verses.content: إِنَّهُ ظَنَّ أَن لَّن يَحُورَ
verses.translation: He assumed that he does not have to return.

verses.content: بَلَىٰ إِنَّ رَبَّهُ كَانَ بِهِ بَصِيرًا
verses.translation: Surely yes, why not? Indeed his Lord is seeing him.

verses.content: فَلَا أُقْسِمُ بِالشَّفَقِ
verses.translation: So by oath of the late evening’s light.

verses.content: وَاللَّيْلِ وَمَا وَسَقَ
verses.translation: And by oath of the night and all that gathers in it.

verses.content: وَالْقَمَرِ إِذَا اتَّسَقَ
verses.translation: And by oath of the moon when it is full.

verses.content: لَتَرْكَبُنَّ طَبَقًا عَن طَبَقٍ
verses.translation: You will surely go up level by level.

verses.content: فَمَا لَهُمْ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ
verses.translation: What is the matter with them that they do not accept faith?

verses.content: وَإِذَا قُرِئَ عَلَيْهِمُ الْقُرْآنُ لَا يَسْجُدُونَ ۩
verses.translation: And when the Qur’an is recited to them, they do not fall prostrate? (Command of Prostration # 13)

verses.content: بَلِ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا يُكَذِّبُونَ
verses.translation: In fact the disbelievers keep denying.

verses.content: وَاللَّهُ أَعْلَمُ بِمَا يُوعُونَ
verses.translation: And Allah well knows what they conceal in their hearts.

verses.content: فَبَشِّرْهُم بِعَذَابٍ أَلِيمٍ
verses.translation: Therefore give them the glad tidings of a painful punishment.

verses.content: إِلَّا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَعَمِلُوا الصَّالِحَاتِ لَهُمْ أَجْرٌ غَيْرُ مَمْنُونٍ
verses.translation: Except those who believed and did good deeds – for them is a reward that will never end.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ وَالسَّمَاءِ ذَاتِ الْبُرُوجِ
verses.translation: By oath of the heaven which contains the constellations.

verses.content: وَالْيَوْمِ الْمَوْعُودِ
verses.translation: And by oath of the Promised Day.

verses.content: وَشَاهِدٍ وَمَشْهُودٍ
verses.translation: And by oath of the day that is a witness and by oath of a day in which the people present themselves.

verses.content: قُتِلَ أَصْحَابُ الْأُخْدُودِ
verses.translation: Accursed be the People of the Ditch!

verses.content: النَّارِ ذَاتِ الْوَقُودِ
verses.translation: The people of the fuelled blazing fire.

verses.content: إِذْ هُمْ عَلَيْهَا قُعُودٌ
verses.translation: When they were sitting at its edge.

verses.content: وَهُمْ عَلَىٰ مَا يَفْعَلُونَ بِالْمُؤْمِنِينَ شُهُودٌ
verses.translation: And they themselves are witnesses to what they were doing to the Muslims!

verses.content: وَمَا نَقَمُوا مِنْهُمْ إِلَّا أَن يُؤْمِنُوا بِاللَّهِ الْعَزِيزِ الْحَمِيدِ
verses.translation: And what did they dislike from the Muslims, except that the Muslims accepted faith in Allah the Most Honourable, the Most Praiseworthy?

verses.content: الَّذِي لَهُ مُلْكُ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ ۚ وَاللَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيْءٍ شَهِيدٌ
verses.translation: To Him only belongs the kingship of the heavens and the earth; and Allah is a Witness over all things.

verses.content: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ فَتَنُوا الْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَالْمُؤْمِنَاتِ ثُمَّ لَمْ يَتُوبُوا فَلَهُمْ عَذَابُ جَهَنَّمَ وَلَهُمْ عَذَابُ الْحَرِيقِ
verses.translation: Indeed those who troubled the Muslim men and Muslim women, and then did not repent – for them is the punishment of hell, and for them is the punishment of fire.

verses.content: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَعَمِلُوا الصَّالِحَاتِ لَهُمْ جَنَّاتٌ تَجْرِي مِن تَحْتِهَا الْأَنْهَارُ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ الْفَوْزُ الْكَبِيرُ
verses.translation: Indeed those who believed and did good deeds – for them are Gardens beneath which rivers flow; this is the great success.

verses.content: إِنَّ بَطْشَ رَبِّكَ لَشَدِيدٌ
verses.translation: Indeed the seizure of your Lord is very severe.

verses.content: إِنَّهُ هُوَ يُبْدِئُ وَيُعِيدُ
verses.translation: Indeed it is He Who initiates and redoes.

verses.content: وَهُوَ الْغَفُورُ الْوَدُودُ
verses.translation: And He only is the Oft Forgiving, the Beloved of His bondmen.

verses.content: ذُو الْعَرْشِ الْمَجِيدُ
verses.translation: Master of the Honourable Throne.

verses.content: فَعَّالٌ لِّمَا يُرِيدُ
verses.translation: Always doing whatever He wills.

verses.content: هَلْ أَتَاكَ حَدِيثُ الْجُنُودِ
verses.translation: Did the story of the armies reach you?

verses.content: فِرْعَوْنَ وَثَمُودَ
verses.translation: (The armies of) Firaun and the tribe of Thamud.

verses.content: بَلِ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا فِي تَكْذِيبٍ
verses.translation: In fact the disbelievers are in denial.

verses.content: وَاللَّهُ مِن وَرَائِهِم مُّحِيطٌ
verses.translation: And Allah is after them, has them surrounded.

verses.content: بَلْ هُوَ قُرْآنٌ مَّجِيدٌ
verses.translation: In fact it (what they deny) is the Noble Qur’an.

verses.content: فِي لَوْحٍ مَّحْفُوظٍ
verses.translation: In the Preserved Tablet.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ وَالسَّمَاءِ وَالطَّارِقِ
verses.translation: By oath of the heaven, and by oath of the nightly arriver.

verses.content: وَمَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا الطَّارِقُ
verses.translation: And have you understood what the nightly arriver is?

verses.content: النَّجْمُ الثَّاقِبُ
verses.translation: The very brightly shining star!

verses.content: إِن كُلُّ نَفْسٍ لَّمَّا عَلَيْهَا حَافِظٌ
verses.translation: There is not a soul that does not have a guardian over it.

verses.content: فَلْيَنظُرِ الْإِنسَانُ مِمَّ خُلِقَ
verses.translation: So man must consider from what he has been created.

verses.content: خُلِقَ مِن مَّاءٍ دَافِقٍ
verses.translation: Created from a gushing fluid.

verses.content: يَخْرُجُ مِن بَيْنِ الصُّلْبِ وَالتَّرَائِبِ
verses.translation: That is issued from between the backs and the ribs.

verses.content: إِنَّهُ عَلَىٰ رَجْعِهِ لَقَادِرٌ
verses.translation: Indeed Allah is Able to return him.

verses.content: يَوْمَ تُبْلَى السَّرَائِرُ
verses.translation: A day when the secrets will be examined.

verses.content: فَمَا لَهُ مِن قُوَّةٍ وَلَا نَاصِرٍ
verses.translation: So man will neither have any strength nor any aide.

verses.content: وَالسَّمَاءِ ذَاتِ الرَّجْعِ
verses.translation: By oath of the sky from which comes down the rain.

verses.content: وَالْأَرْضِ ذَاتِ الصَّدْعِ
verses.translation: And by oath of the earth which flourishes with it.

verses.content: إِنَّهُ لَقَوْلٌ فَصْلٌ
verses.translation: Indeed the Qur’an is a decisive Word.

verses.content: وَمَا هُوَ بِالْهَزْلِ
verses.translation: And is not a matter of amusement.

verses.content: إِنَّهُمْ يَكِيدُونَ كَيْدًا
verses.translation: Indeed the disbelievers carry out their evil schemes.

verses.content: وَأَكِيدُ كَيْدًا
verses.translation: And I secretly plan.

verses.content: فَمَهِّلِ الْكَافِرِينَ أَمْهِلْهُمْ رُوَيْدًا
verses.translation: Therefore give them some respite – give them some time.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ سَبِّحِ اسْمَ رَبِّكَ الْأَعْلَى
verses.translation: Proclaim the Purity of your Lord, the Supreme.

verses.content: الَّذِي خَلَقَ فَسَوَّىٰ
verses.translation: The One Who created, and then made proper.

verses.content: وَالَّذِي قَدَّرَ فَهَدَىٰ
verses.translation: And the One Who kept proper measure and then guided.

verses.content: وَالَّذِي أَخْرَجَ الْمَرْعَىٰ
verses.translation: The One Who produced pasture.

verses.content: فَجَعَلَهُ غُثَاءً أَحْوَىٰ
verses.translation: Then made it dry and dark.

verses.content: سَنُقْرِئُكَ فَلَا تَنسَىٰ
verses.translation: We shall now make you read (O dear Prophet Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him), so you will not forget.

verses.content: إِلَّا مَا شَاءَ اللَّهُ ۚ إِنَّهُ يَعْلَمُ الْجَهْرَ وَمَا يَخْفَىٰ
verses.translation: Except what Allah wills; indeed He knows all the evident and all the concealed.

verses.content: وَنُيَسِّرُكَ لِلْيُسْرَىٰ
verses.translation: And We shall create the means of ease for you.

verses.content: فَذَكِّرْ إِن نَّفَعَتِ الذِّكْرَىٰ
verses.translation: Therefore advise, if advising is beneficial.

verses.content: سَيَذَّكَّرُ مَن يَخْشَىٰ
verses.translation: Soon whoever fears will heed advice.

verses.content: وَيَتَجَنَّبُهَا الْأَشْقَى
verses.translation: And the most wicked will stay away from it.

verses.content: الَّذِي يَصْلَى النَّارَ الْكُبْرَىٰ
verses.translation: The one who will enter the biggest fire.

verses.content: ثُمَّ لَا يَمُوتُ فِيهَا وَلَا يَحْيَىٰ
verses.translation: Then he neither dies in it, nor lives.

verses.content: قَدْ أَفْلَحَ مَن تَزَكَّىٰ
verses.translation: Indeed successful is the one who became pure.

verses.content: وَذَكَرَ اسْمَ رَبِّهِ فَصَلَّىٰ
verses.translation: And who mentioned the name of his Lord, then offered prayer.

verses.content: بَلْ تُؤْثِرُونَ الْحَيَاةَ الدُّنْيَا
verses.translation: But rather you prefer the life of this world!

verses.content: وَالْآخِرَةُ خَيْرٌ وَأَبْقَىٰ
verses.translation: Whereas the Hereafter is better and everlasting.

verses.content: إِنَّ هَـٰذَا لَفِي الصُّحُفِ الْأُولَىٰ
verses.translation: Indeed this is in the former scriptures.

verses.content: صُحُفِ إِبْرَاهِيمَ وَمُوسَىٰ
verses.translation: In the Books of Ibrahim and Moosa.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ هَلْ أَتَاكَ حَدِيثُ الْغَاشِيَةِ
verses.translation: Certainly the news of the calamity that will overwhelm has come to you!

verses.content: وُجُوهٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ خَاشِعَةٌ
verses.translation: Many a face will be disgraced on that day.

verses.content: عَامِلَةٌ نَّاصِبَةٌ
verses.translation: Labouring, striving hard.

verses.content: تَصْلَىٰ نَارًا حَامِيَةً
verses.translation: (Yet) Going into the blazing fire.

verses.content: تُسْقَىٰ مِنْ عَيْنٍ آنِيَةٍ
verses.translation: Made to drink water from the boiling hot spring.

verses.content: لَّيْسَ لَهُمْ طَعَامٌ إِلَّا مِن ضَرِيعٍ
verses.translation: There is no food for them except thorns of fire.

verses.content: لَّا يُسْمِنُ وَلَا يُغْنِي مِن جُوعٍ
verses.translation: Which neither give strength nor satisfy the hunger.

verses.content: وُجُوهٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ نَّاعِمَةٌ
verses.translation: Many a face will be in serenity on that day.

verses.content: لِّسَعْيِهَا رَاضِيَةٌ
verses.translation: Rejoicing over their efforts.

verses.content: فِي جَنَّةٍ عَالِيَةٍ
verses.translation: In a high Garden.

verses.content: لَّا تَسْمَعُ فِيهَا لَاغِيَةً
verses.translation: In which they will not hear any lewd speech.

verses.content: فِيهَا عَيْنٌ جَارِيَةٌ
verses.translation: In it is a flowing spring.

verses.content: فِيهَا سُرُرٌ مَّرْفُوعَةٌ
verses.translation: In which are high thrones.

verses.content: وَأَكْوَابٌ مَّوْضُوعَةٌ
verses.translation: And chosen goblets.

verses.content: وَنَمَارِقُ مَصْفُوفَةٌ
verses.translation: And arranged carpets.

verses.content: وَزَرَابِيُّ مَبْثُوثَةٌ
verses.translation: And linen spread out.

verses.content: أَفَلَا يَنظُرُونَ إِلَى الْإِبِلِ كَيْفَ خُلِقَتْ
verses.translation: So do they not see the camel – how it has been created?

verses.content: وَإِلَى السَّمَاءِ كَيْفَ رُفِعَتْ
verses.translation: And the heaven – how it has been raised?

verses.content: وَإِلَى الْجِبَالِ كَيْفَ نُصِبَتْ
verses.translation: And the mountains – how they have been established?

verses.content: وَإِلَى الْأَرْضِ كَيْفَ سُطِحَتْ
verses.translation: And the earth – how it has been spread out?

verses.content: فَذَكِّرْ إِنَّمَا أَنتَ مُذَكِّرٌ
verses.translation: Therefore advise; indeed you are a proclaimer of advice. (The Holy Prophet is a Remembrance from Allah.)

verses.content: لَّسْتَ عَلَيْهِم بِمُصَيْطِرٍ
verses.translation: You are not at all a guardian over them.

verses.content: إِلَّا مَن تَوَلَّىٰ وَكَفَرَ
verses.translation: Except whoever turns away and disbelieves –

verses.content: فَيُعَذِّبُهُ اللَّهُ الْعَذَابَ الْأَكْبَرَ
verses.translation: So Allah will mete out to him the greatest punishment.

verses.content: إِنَّ إِلَيْنَا إِيَابَهُمْ
verses.translation: Indeed only towards Us is their return

verses.content: ثُمَّ إِنَّ عَلَيْنَا حِسَابَهُم
verses.translation: Then indeed only upon Us is their reckoning.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ وَالْفَجْرِ
verses.translation: By oath of the (particular) dawn.

verses.content: وَلَيَالٍ عَشْرٍ
verses.translation: And by oath of ten nights.

verses.content: وَالشَّفْعِ وَالْوَتْرِ
verses.translation: And by oath of the even and the odd.

verses.content: وَاللَّيْلِ إِذَا يَسْرِ
verses.translation: And by oath of the night when it recedes

verses.content: هَلْ فِي ذَٰلِكَ قَسَمٌ لِّذِي حِجْرٍ
verses.translation: Why is there an oath in this, for the intelligent?

verses.content: أَلَمْ تَرَ كَيْفَ فَعَلَ رَبُّكَ بِعَادٍ
verses.translation: Did you not see how did your Lord deal with (the tribe of) Aad?

verses.content: إِرَمَ ذَاتِ الْعِمَادِ
verses.translation: (And) the tall giants of Iram?

verses.content: الَّتِي لَمْ يُخْلَقْ مِثْلُهَا فِي الْبِلَادِ
verses.translation: Like whom no one else was born in the cities.

verses.content: وَثَمُودَ الَّذِينَ جَابُوا الصَّخْرَ بِالْوَادِ
verses.translation: And the tribe of Thamud, who hewed rocks in the valley.

verses.content: وَفِرْعَوْنَ ذِي الْأَوْتَادِ
verses.translation: And with Firaun, who used to crucify.

verses.content: الَّذِينَ طَغَوْا فِي الْبِلَادِ
verses.translation: Those who rebelled in the cities,

verses.content: فَأَكْثَرُوا فِيهَا الْفَسَادَ
verses.translation: And who then spread a lot of turmoil in them.

verses.content: فَصَبَّ عَلَيْهِمْ رَبُّكَ سَوْطَ عَذَابٍ
verses.translation: Therefore your Lord struck them hard with the means of punishment.

verses.content: إِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَبِالْمِرْصَادِ
verses.translation: Indeed nothing is hidden from the sight of your Lord.

verses.content: فَأَمَّا الْإِنسَانُ إِذَا مَا ابْتَلَاهُ رَبُّهُ فَأَكْرَمَهُ وَنَعَّمَهُ فَيَقُولُ رَبِّي أَكْرَمَنِ
verses.translation: So man, whenever his Lord tests him by giving him honour and favours – thereupon he says, “My Lord has honoured me.”

verses.content: وَأَمَّا إِذَا مَا ابْتَلَاهُ فَقَدَرَ عَلَيْهِ رِزْقَهُ فَيَقُولُ رَبِّي أَهَانَنِ
verses.translation: And if He tests him and restricts his livelihood – thereupon he says, “My Lord has degraded me!”

verses.content: كَلَّا ۖ بَل لَّا تُكْرِمُونَ الْيَتِيمَ
verses.translation: Not at all – but rather you do not honour the orphan.

verses.content: وَلَا تَحَاضُّونَ عَلَىٰ طَعَامِ الْمِسْكِينِ
verses.translation: And do not urge one another to feed the needy.

verses.content: وَتَأْكُلُونَ التُّرَاثَ أَكْلًا لَّمًّا
verses.translation: And you readily devour the inheritance with greed.

verses.content: وَتُحِبُّونَ الْمَالَ حُبًّا جَمًّا
verses.translation: And you harbour intense love for wealth.

verses.content: كَلَّا إِذَا دُكَّتِ الْأَرْضُ دَكًّا دَكًّا
verses.translation: Most certainly – when the earth is smashed and blown to bits.

verses.content: وَجَاءَ رَبُّكَ وَالْمَلَكُ صَفًّا صَفًّا
verses.translation: And when the command of your Lord comes – and the angels row by row,

verses.content: وَجِيءَ يَوْمَئِذٍ بِجَهَنَّمَ ۚ يَوْمَئِذٍ يَتَذَكَّرُ الْإِنسَانُ وَأَنَّىٰ لَهُ الذِّكْرَىٰ
verses.translation: And when hell is brought that day – on that day will man reflect, but where is the time now to think?

verses.content: يَقُولُ يَا لَيْتَنِي قَدَّمْتُ لِحَيَاتِي
verses.translation: He will say, “Alas – if only I had sent some good deeds ahead, during my lifetime!”

verses.content: فَيَوْمَئِذٍ لَّا يُعَذِّبُ عَذَابَهُ أَحَدٌ
verses.translation: So on that day, no one punishes like He does!

verses.content: وَلَا يُوثِقُ وَثَاقَهُ أَحَدٌ
verses.translation: And no one binds like He does!

verses.content: يَا أَيَّتُهَا النَّفْسُ الْمُطْمَئِنَّةُ
verses.translation: O the contented soul!

verses.content: ارْجِعِي إِلَىٰ رَبِّكِ رَاضِيَةً مَّرْضِيَّةً
verses.translation: Return towards your Lord – you being pleased with Him, and He pleased with you!

verses.content: فَادْخُلِي فِي عِبَادِي
verses.translation: Then enter the ranks of My chosen bondmen!

verses.content: وَادْخُلِي جَنَّتِي
verses.translation: And come into My Paradise!

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ لَا أُقْسِمُ بِهَـٰذَا الْبَلَدِ
verses.translation: I swear by this city (Mecca) –

verses.content: وَأَنتَ حِلٌّ بِهَـٰذَا الْبَلَدِ
verses.translation: For you (O dear Prophet Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him) are in this city.

verses.content: وَوَالِدٍ وَمَا وَلَدَ
verses.translation: And by oath of your forefather Ibrahim, and by you – his illustrious son!

verses.content: لَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا الْإِنسَانَ فِي كَبَدٍ
verses.translation: We have indeed created man surrounded by hardships.

verses.content: أَيَحْسَبُ أَن لَّن يَقْدِرَ عَلَيْهِ أَحَدٌ
verses.translation: Does man think that no one will ever have power over him?

verses.content: يَقُولُ أَهْلَكْتُ مَالًا لُّبَدًا
verses.translation: He says, “I destroyed vast wealth.”

verses.content: أَيَحْسَبُ أَن لَّمْ يَرَهُ أَحَدٌ
verses.translation: Does man think that no one saw him?

verses.content: أَلَمْ نَجْعَل لَّهُ عَيْنَيْنِ
verses.translation: Did We not make two eyes for him?

verses.content: وَلِسَانًا وَشَفَتَيْنِ
verses.translation: And a tongue and two lips?

verses.content: وَهَدَيْنَاهُ النَّجْدَيْنِ
verses.translation: And did We not guide him to the two elevated things?

verses.content: فَلَا اقْتَحَمَ الْعَقَبَةَ
verses.translation: So he did not quickly enter the steep valley.

verses.content: وَمَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا الْعَقَبَةُ
verses.translation: And what have you understood, what the valley is!

verses.content: فَكُّ رَقَبَةٍ
verses.translation: The freeing of a slave!

verses.content: أَوْ إِطْعَامٌ فِي يَوْمٍ ذِي مَسْغَبَةٍ
verses.translation: Or the feeding on a day of hunger.

verses.content: يَتِيمًا ذَا مَقْرَبَةٍ
verses.translation: Of a related orphan,

verses.content: أَوْ مِسْكِينًا ذَا مَتْرَبَةٍ
verses.translation: Or of a homeless needy person!

verses.content: ثُمَّ كَانَ مِنَ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَتَوَاصَوْا بِالصَّبْرِ وَتَوَاصَوْا بِالْمَرْحَمَةِ
verses.translation: And moreover to be of those who accepted faith, and who urged patience to one another and who urged graciousness to one another.

verses.content: أُولَـٰئِكَ أَصْحَابُ الْمَيْمَنَةِ
verses.translation: These are the people of the right.

verses.content: وَالَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا بِآيَاتِنَا هُمْ أَصْحَابُ الْمَشْأَمَةِ
verses.translation: And those who denied Our signs, are the people of the left.

verses.content: عَلَيْهِمْ نَارٌ مُّؤْصَدَةٌ
verses.translation: Upon them is a fire, in which they are imprisoned, closed and shut above them.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ وَالشَّمْسِ وَضُحَاهَا
verses.translation: By oath of the sun and its light

verses.content: وَالْقَمَرِ إِذَا تَلَاهَا
verses.translation: And by oath of the moon when it follows the sun

verses.content: وَالنَّهَارِ إِذَا جَلَّاهَا
verses.translation: And by oath of the day when it reveals it

verses.content: وَاللَّيْلِ إِذَا يَغْشَاهَا
verses.translation: And by oath of the night when it hides it

verses.content: وَالسَّمَاءِ وَمَا بَنَاهَا
verses.translation: And by oath of the heaven and by oath of Him Who made it.

verses.content: وَالْأَرْضِ وَمَا طَحَاهَا
verses.translation: And by oath of the earth and by oath of Him Who spread it.

verses.content: وَنَفْسٍ وَمَا سَوَّاهَا
verses.translation: And by oath of the soul and by oath of Him Who made it proper.

verses.content: فَأَلْهَمَهَا فُجُورَهَا وَتَقْوَاهَا
verses.translation: And inspired in it the knowledge of its sins and its piety.

verses.content: قَدْ أَفْلَحَ مَن زَكَّاهَا
verses.translation: Indeed successful is the one who made it pure.

verses.content: وَقَدْ خَابَ مَن دَسَّاهَا
verses.translation: And indeed failed is the one who covered it in sin.

verses.content: كَذَّبَتْ ثَمُودُ بِطَغْوَاهَا
verses.translation: The tribe of Thamud denied with rebellion.

verses.content: إِذِ انبَعَثَ أَشْقَاهَا
verses.translation: When the most wicked among them stood up in defiance.

verses.content: فَقَالَ لَهُمْ رَسُولُ اللَّهِ نَاقَةَ اللَّهِ وَسُقْيَاهَا
verses.translation: So the Noble Messenger of Allah said to them, “Stay away from the she camel of Allah, and from its turn to drink.”

verses.content: فَكَذَّبُوهُ فَعَقَرُوهَا فَدَمْدَمَ عَلَيْهِمْ رَبُّهُم بِذَنبِهِمْ فَسَوَّاهَا
verses.translation: In response they belied him, and hamstrung the she camel – so Allah put ruin over them because of their sins and flattened their dwellings.

verses.content: وَلَا يَخَافُ عُقْبَاهَا
verses.translation: And He does not fear its coming behind (to take vengeance).

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ وَاللَّيْلِ إِذَا يَغْشَىٰ
verses.translation: By oath of the night when it covers

verses.content: وَالنَّهَارِ إِذَا تَجَلَّىٰ
verses.translation: And by oath of the day when it shines

verses.content: وَمَا خَلَقَ الذَّكَرَ وَالْأُنثَىٰ
verses.translation: And by oath of the One Who created the male and the female.

verses.content: إِنَّ سَعْيَكُمْ لَشَتَّىٰ
verses.translation: Indeed your efforts differ.

verses.content: فَأَمَّا مَنْ أَعْطَىٰ وَاتَّقَىٰ
verses.translation: So for one who gave and practised piety

verses.content: وَصَدَّقَ بِالْحُسْنَىٰ
verses.translation: And believed the best matter to be true

verses.content: فَسَنُيَسِّرُهُ لِلْيُسْرَىٰ
verses.translation: So We will very soon provide him ease.

verses.content: وَأَمَّا مَن بَخِلَ وَاسْتَغْنَىٰ
verses.translation: And for him who hoarded wealth and remained carefree,

verses.content: وَكَذَّبَ بِالْحُسْنَىٰ
verses.translation: And denied the best matter,

verses.content: فَسَنُيَسِّرُهُ لِلْعُسْرَىٰ
verses.translation: So We will very soon provide him hardship.

verses.content: وَمَا يُغْنِي عَنْهُ مَالُهُ إِذَا تَرَدَّىٰ
verses.translation: His wealth will not avail him when he falls into ruin.

verses.content: إِنَّ عَلَيْنَا لَلْهُدَىٰ
verses.translation: Indeed guiding is upon Us.

verses.content: وَإِنَّ لَنَا لَلْآخِرَةَ وَالْأُولَىٰ
verses.translation: And indeed the Hereafter and this world both belong to Us.

verses.content: فَأَنذَرْتُكُمْ نَارًا تَلَظَّىٰ
verses.translation: I therefore warn you of the fire that is ablaze.

verses.content: لَا يَصْلَاهَا إِلَّا الْأَشْقَى
verses.translation: None except the most wicked will enter it.

verses.content: الَّذِي كَذَّبَ وَتَوَلَّىٰ
verses.translation: The one who denied and turned away.

verses.content: وَسَيُجَنَّبُهَا الْأَتْقَى
verses.translation: He will be far away from the most pious. (The first Caliph S. Abu Bakr Siddiq)

verses.content: الَّذِي يُؤْتِي مَالَهُ يَتَزَكَّىٰ
verses.translation: Who gives his wealth in order to be pure.

verses.content: وَمَا لِأَحَدٍ عِندَهُ مِن نِّعْمَةٍ تُجْزَىٰ
verses.translation: And no one has done a favour to him, for which he should be compensated.

verses.content: إِلَّا ابْتِغَاءَ وَجْهِ رَبِّهِ الْأَعْلَىٰ
verses.translation: He desires only to please his Lord, the Supreme.

verses.content: وَلَسَوْفَ يَرْضَىٰ
verses.translation: And indeed, soon he will be very pleased.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ وَالضُّحَىٰ
verses.translation: By oath of the late morning,

verses.content: وَاللَّيْلِ إِذَا سَجَىٰ
verses.translation: And by oath of the night when it covers,

verses.content: مَا وَدَّعَكَ رَبُّكَ وَمَا قَلَىٰ
verses.translation: Your Lord has not forsaken you nor does He dislike you!

verses.content: وَلَلْآخِرَةُ خَيْرٌ لَّكَ مِنَ الْأُولَىٰ
verses.translation: And indeed the latter is better for you than the former.

verses.content: وَلَسَوْفَ يُعْطِيكَ رَبُّكَ فَتَرْضَىٰ
verses.translation: And indeed your Lord will soon give you so much that you will be pleased. (Allah seeks to please the Holy Prophet – peace and blessings be upon him.)

verses.content: أَلَمْ يَجِدْكَ يَتِيمًا فَآوَىٰ
verses.translation: Did He not find you an orphan, so provided you shelter?

verses.content: وَوَجَدَكَ ضَالًّا فَهَدَىٰ
verses.translation: And found you deeply engrossed in His love, so directed you?

verses.content: وَوَجَدَكَ عَائِلًا فَأَغْنَىٰ
verses.translation: And found you in need, so made you prosperous?

verses.content: فَأَمَّا الْيَتِيمَ فَلَا تَقْهَرْ
verses.translation: Therefore do not oppress the orphan.

verses.content: وَأَمَّا السَّائِلَ فَلَا تَنْهَرْ
verses.translation: And do not rebuke the beggar.

verses.content: وَأَمَّا بِنِعْمَةِ رَبِّكَ فَحَدِّثْ
verses.translation: And abundantly proclaim the favours of your Lord.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ أَلَمْ نَشْرَحْ لَكَ صَدْرَكَ
verses.translation: Did We not widen your bosom?

verses.content: وَوَضَعْنَا عَنكَ وِزْرَكَ
verses.translation: And relieve you of the burden –

verses.content: الَّذِي أَنقَضَ ظَهْرَكَ
verses.translation: Which had broken your back?

verses.content: وَرَفَعْنَا لَكَ ذِكْرَكَ
verses.translation: And We have exalted your remembrance for you.

verses.content: فَإِنَّ مَعَ الْعُسْرِ يُسْرًا
verses.translation: So indeed with hardship is ease.

verses.content: إِنَّ مَعَ الْعُسْرِ يُسْرًا
verses.translation: Indeed with hardship is ease.

verses.content: فَإِذَا فَرَغْتَ فَانصَبْ
verses.translation: So when you finish the prayer, strive in supplication.

verses.content: وَإِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ فَارْغَب
verses.translation: And incline towards your Lord.

verses.content: بِّسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ وَالتِّينِ وَالزَّيْتُونِ
verses.translation: By oath of the fig and of the olive,

verses.content: وَطُورِ سِينِينَ
verses.translation: And by oath of Mount Sinai,

verses.content: وَهَـٰذَا الْبَلَدِ الْأَمِينِ
verses.translation: And by oath of this secure land,

verses.content: لَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا الْإِنسَانَ فِي أَحْسَنِ تَقْوِيمٍ
verses.translation: We have indeed created man in the best shape.

verses.content: ثُمَّ رَدَدْنَاهُ أَسْفَلَ سَافِلِينَ
verses.translation: We then turned him towards all the lowest of the low states.

verses.content: إِلَّا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَعَمِلُوا الصَّالِحَاتِ فَلَهُمْ أَجْرٌ غَيْرُ مَمْنُونٍ
verses.translation: Except those who accepted faith and did good deeds – for them is a never ending reward.

verses.content: فَمَا يُكَذِّبُكَ بَعْدُ بِالدِّينِ
verses.translation: So after this, what causes you to deny the judgement?

verses.content: أَلَيْسَ اللَّهُ بِأَحْكَمِ الْحَاكِمِينَ
verses.translation: Is not Allah the Greatest Judge upon all judges?

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ اقْرَأْ بِاسْمِ رَبِّكَ الَّذِي خَلَقَ
verses.translation: Read with the name of your Lord Who created,

verses.content: خَلَقَ الْإِنسَانَ مِنْ عَلَقٍ
verses.translation: Created man from a clot.

verses.content: اقْرَأْ وَرَبُّكَ الْأَكْرَمُ
verses.translation: Read, and your Lord only is the Most Beneficent,

verses.content: الَّذِي عَلَّمَ بِالْقَلَمِ
verses.translation: The One Who taught to write with the pen.

verses.content: عَلَّمَ الْإِنسَانَ مَا لَمْ يَعْلَمْ
verses.translation: The One Who taught man all what he did not know.

verses.content: كَلَّا إِنَّ الْإِنسَانَ لَيَطْغَىٰ
verses.translation: Yes indeed, man is surely rebellious.

verses.content: أَن رَّآهُ اسْتَغْنَىٰ
verses.translation: As he considers himself independent!

verses.content: إِنَّ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ الرُّجْعَىٰ
verses.translation: Indeed towards your Lord only is the return.

verses.content: أَرَأَيْتَ الَّذِي يَنْهَىٰ
verses.translation: What is your opinion – regarding him who forbids –

verses.content: عَبْدًا إِذَا صَلَّىٰ
verses.translation: A bondman when he offers the prayer?

verses.content: أَرَأَيْتَ إِن كَانَ عَلَى الْهُدَىٰ
verses.translation: What is your opinion – if he were upon guidance,

verses.content: أَوْ أَمَرَ بِالتَّقْوَىٰ
verses.translation: He would enjoin piety, so how good it would be!

verses.content: أَرَأَيْتَ إِن كَذَّبَ وَتَوَلَّىٰ
verses.translation: What is your opinion – if he denies and turns away, how wretched will be his state!

verses.content: أَلَمْ يَعْلَم بِأَنَّ اللَّهَ يَرَىٰ
verses.translation: Did he not realise that Allah is watching?

verses.content: كَلَّا لَئِن لَّمْ يَنتَهِ لَنَسْفَعًا بِالنَّاصِيَةِ
verses.translation: Yes certainly, if he does not desist, We will seize him by the forelock.

verses.content: نَاصِيَةٍ كَاذِبَةٍ خَاطِئَةٍ
verses.translation: A forelock that lies, is sinful.

verses.content: فَلْيَدْعُ نَادِيَهُ
verses.translation: So let him now call his gang!

verses.content: سَنَدْعُ الزَّبَانِيَةَ
verses.translation: We will now call the guards!

verses.content: كَلَّا لَا تُطِعْهُ وَاسْجُدْ وَاقْتَرِب ۩
verses.translation: Yes indeed; do not listen to him – and prostrate, and become close to Us. (Command of Prostration # 14)

verses.content: بِّسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ إِنَّا أَنزَلْنَاهُ فِي لَيْلَةِ الْقَدْرِ
verses.translation: We have indeed sent down the Qur’an in the Night of Destiny.

verses.content: وَمَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا لَيْلَةُ الْقَدْرِ
verses.translation: And what have you understood, what the Night of Destiny is!

verses.content: لَيْلَةُ الْقَدْرِ خَيْرٌ مِّنْ أَلْفِ شَهْرٍ
verses.translation: The Night of Destiny is better than a thousand months.

verses.content: تَنَزَّلُ الْمَلَائِكَةُ وَالرُّوحُ فِيهَا بِإِذْنِ رَبِّهِم مِّن كُلِّ أَمْرٍ
verses.translation: In it descend the angels and Jibreel, by the command of their Lord – for all works.

verses.content: سَلَامٌ هِيَ حَتَّىٰ مَطْلَعِ الْفَجْرِ
verses.translation: It is peace until the rising of dawn.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ لَمْ يَكُنِ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا مِنْ أَهْلِ الْكِتَابِ وَالْمُشْرِكِينَ مُنفَكِّينَ حَتَّىٰ تَأْتِيَهُمُ الْبَيِّنَةُ
verses.translation: The disbelieving People of the Book(s) and the polytheists would not have left their religion until the clear proof came to them.

verses.content: رَسُولٌ مِّنَ اللَّهِ يَتْلُو صُحُفًا مُّطَهَّرَةً
verses.translation: (The clear proof is) the Noble Messenger from Allah, who reads the pure pages.

verses.content: فِيهَا كُتُبٌ قَيِّمَةٌ
verses.translation: In which are written proper affairs.

verses.content: وَمَا تَفَرَّقَ الَّذِينَ أُوتُوا الْكِتَابَ إِلَّا مِن بَعْدِ مَا جَاءَتْهُمُ الْبَيِّنَةُ
verses.translation: Nor did the People of the Book(s) get divided until after the clear proof came to them.

verses.content: وَمَا أُمِرُوا إِلَّا لِيَعْبُدُوا اللَّهَ مُخْلِصِينَ لَهُ الدِّينَ حُنَفَاءَ وَيُقِيمُوا الصَّلَاةَ وَيُؤْتُوا الزَّكَاةَ ۚ وَذَٰلِكَ دِينُ الْقَيِّمَةِ
verses.translation: And they were ordered only to worship Allah, believing purely in Him – devoted solely (to Him), and to establish the prayer and to pay the obligatory charity – and this is the straight religion.

verses.content: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا مِنْ أَهْلِ الْكِتَابِ وَالْمُشْرِكِينَ فِي نَارِ جَهَنَّمَ خَالِدِينَ فِيهَا ۚ أُولَـٰئِكَ هُمْ شَرُّ الْبَرِيَّةِ
verses.translation: Indeed all disbelievers, the People of the Book(s) and the polytheists, are in the fire of hell – they will remain in it for ever; it is they who are the worst among the creation.

verses.content: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَعَمِلُوا الصَّالِحَاتِ أُولَـٰئِكَ هُمْ خَيْرُ الْبَرِيَّةِ
verses.translation: Indeed those who accepted faith and did good deeds – it is they who are the best among the creation.

verses.content: جَزَاؤُهُمْ عِندَ رَبِّهِمْ جَنَّاتُ عَدْنٍ تَجْرِي مِن تَحْتِهَا الْأَنْهَارُ خَالِدِينَ فِيهَا أَبَدًا ۖ رَّضِيَ اللَّهُ عَنْهُمْ وَرَضُوا عَنْهُ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ لِمَنْ خَشِيَ رَبَّهُ
verses.translation: Their reward is – with their Lord – everlasting Gardens of Eden beneath which rivers flow, in which they will abide for ever and ever; Allah is pleased with them and they are pleased with Him; this is for one who fears his Lord.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ إِذَا زُلْزِلَتِ الْأَرْضُ زِلْزَالَهَا
verses.translation: When the earth is shaken with its appointed tremor.

verses.content: وَأَخْرَجَتِ الْأَرْضُ أَثْقَالَهَا
verses.translation: And the earth throws out its burdens.

verses.content: وَقَالَ الْإِنسَانُ مَا لَهَا
verses.translation: And man says, “What has happened to it?”

verses.content: يَوْمَئِذٍ تُحَدِّثُ أَخْبَارَهَا
verses.translation: On that day earth will narrate its news,

verses.content: بِأَنَّ رَبَّكَ أَوْحَىٰ لَهَا
verses.translation: Because your Lord sent a command to it.

verses.content: يَوْمَئِذٍ يَصْدُرُ النَّاسُ أَشْتَاتًا لِّيُرَوْا أَعْمَالَهُمْ
verses.translation: On that day men will return towards their Lord, in different groups, in order to be shown their deeds.

verses.content: فَمَن يَعْمَلْ مِثْقَالَ ذَرَّةٍ خَيْرًا يَرَهُ
verses.translation: So whoever does a good deed equal to the weight of the minutest particle, will see it.

verses.content: وَمَن يَعْمَلْ مِثْقَالَ ذَرَّةٍ شَرًّا يَرَهُ
verses.translation: And whoever does an evil deed equal to the weight of the minutest particle, will see it.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ وَالْعَادِيَاتِ ضَبْحًا
verses.translation: By oath of those that sprint, breathing heavily. (The horses used in Holy War.)

verses.content: فَالْمُورِيَاتِ قَدْحًا
verses.translation: Striking stones with their hooves, sparking fire.

verses.content: فَالْمُغِيرَاتِ صُبْحًا
verses.translation: And by oath of those who raid at dawn.

verses.content: فَأَثَرْنَ بِهِ نَقْعًا
verses.translation: So thereupon raising dust.

verses.content: فَوَسَطْنَ بِهِ جَمْعًا
verses.translation: Then penetrate to the centre of the enemy army.

verses.content: إِنَّ الْإِنسَانَ لِرَبِّهِ لَكَنُودٌ
verses.translation: Indeed man is very ungrateful towards his Lord.

verses.content: وَإِنَّهُ عَلَىٰ ذَٰلِكَ لَشَهِيدٌ
verses.translation: And indeed he himself is a witness to it.

verses.content: وَإِنَّهُ لِحُبِّ الْخَيْرِ لَشَدِيدٌ
verses.translation: And indeed he loves wealth to the extreme.

verses.content: أَفَلَا يَعْلَمُ إِذَا بُعْثِرَ مَا فِي الْقُبُورِ
verses.translation: So does he not know? When those in the graves are raised,

verses.content: وَحُصِّلَ مَا فِي الصُّدُورِ
verses.translation: And all what lies in the breasts is opened –

verses.content: إِنَّ رَبَّهُم بِهِمْ يَوْمَئِذٍ لَّخَبِيرٌ
verses.translation: On that day their Lord surely knows all about them!

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ الْقَارِعَةُ
verses.translation: The event that terrifies the hearts!

verses.content: مَا الْقَارِعَةُ
verses.translation: What is the event that terrifies the hearts?

verses.content: وَمَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا الْقَارِعَةُ
verses.translation: And what have you understood, what the event that terrifies the hearts is!

verses.content: يَوْمَ يَكُونُ النَّاسُ كَالْفَرَاشِ الْمَبْثُوثِ
verses.translation: The day when men will be like scattered moths.

verses.content: وَتَكُونُ الْجِبَالُ كَالْعِهْنِ الْمَنفُوشِ
verses.translation: And mountains will be like flying wool.

verses.content: فَأَمَّا مَن ثَقُلَتْ مَوَازِينُهُ
verses.translation: So for one whose scales prove heavy,

verses.content: فَهُوَ فِي عِيشَةٍ رَّاضِيَةٍ
verses.translation: He is therefore in the desired bliss.

verses.content: وَأَمَّا مَنْ خَفَّتْ مَوَازِينُهُ
verses.translation: And for one whose scales prove light,

verses.content: فَأُمُّهُ هَاوِيَةٌ
verses.translation: He is in the lap of one that abases.

verses.content: وَمَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا هِيَهْ
verses.translation: And what have you understood, what the one that abases is!

verses.content: نَارٌ حَامِيَةٌ
verses.translation: A flaming fire!

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ أَلْهَاكُمُ التَّكَاثُرُ
verses.translation: The craving for excess wealth kept you people neglectful.

verses.content: حَتَّىٰ زُرْتُمُ الْمَقَابِرَ
verses.translation: Until you confronted the graves.

verses.content: كَلَّا سَوْفَ تَعْلَمُونَ
verses.translation: Yes certainly, you will soon realise!

verses.content: ثُمَّ كَلَّا سَوْفَ تَعْلَمُونَ
verses.translation: Again, yes certainly, you will soon realise!

verses.content: كَلَّا لَوْ تَعْلَمُونَ عِلْمَ الْيَقِينِ
verses.translation: Yes certainly, if you had believed with certainty, you would not have craved for wealth.

verses.content: لَتَرَوُنَّ الْجَحِيمَ
verses.translation: Indeed you will see hell.

verses.content: ثُمَّ لَتَرَوُنَّهَا عَيْنَ الْيَقِينِ
verses.translation: Again, indeed you will see it with certainty.

verses.content: ثُمَّ لَتُسْأَلُنَّ يَوْمَئِذٍ عَنِ النَّعِيمِ
verses.translation: Then, on that day, you will surely be questioned regarding the favours.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ وَالْعَصْرِ
verses.translation: By oath of this era of yours (O dear Prophet Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him).

verses.content: إِنَّ الْإِنسَانَ لَفِي خُسْرٍ
verses.translation: Indeed man is surely in a loss.

verses.content: إِلَّا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَعَمِلُوا الصَّالِحَاتِ وَتَوَاصَوْا بِالْحَقِّ وَتَوَاصَوْا بِالصَّبْرِ
verses.translation: Except those who accepted faith, and did good deeds and urged one another to the truth – and urged one another to have patience.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ وَيْلٌ لِّكُلِّ هُمَزَةٍ لُّمَزَةٍ
verses.translation: Ruin is for every open slanderer, backbiter.

verses.content: الَّذِي جَمَعَ مَالًا وَعَدَّدَهُ
verses.translation: Who accumulated wealth and hoarded it, counting.

verses.content: يَحْسَبُ أَنَّ مَالَهُ أَخْلَدَهُ
verses.translation: Does he think that his wealth will prolong his stay on earth forever?

verses.content: كَلَّا ۖ لَيُنبَذَنَّ فِي الْحُطَمَةِ
verses.translation: Never! He will certainly be thrown into the Crushing One.

verses.content: وَمَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا الْحُطَمَةُ
verses.translation: And what have you understood what the Crushing One is!

verses.content: نَارُ اللَّهِ الْمُوقَدَةُ
verses.translation: The fire of Allah, that is ablaze.

verses.content: الَّتِي تَطَّلِعُ عَلَى الْأَفْئِدَةِ
verses.translation: Which will climb on to the hearts.

verses.content: إِنَّهَا عَلَيْهِم مُّؤْصَدَةٌ
verses.translation: Indeed it will be shut over them.

verses.content: فِي عَمَدٍ مُّمَدَّدَةٍ
verses.translation: In extended columns.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ أَلَمْ تَرَ كَيْفَ فَعَلَ رَبُّكَ بِأَصْحَابِ الْفِيلِ
verses.translation: O dear Prophet (Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him), did you not see how did your Lord deal with the People of the Elephant?

verses.content: أَلَمْ يَجْعَلْ كَيْدَهُمْ فِي تَضْلِيلٍ
verses.translation: Did He not put their scheme into ruin?

verses.content: وَأَرْسَلَ عَلَيْهِمْ طَيْرًا أَبَابِيلَ
verses.translation: And send flocks of birds upon them,

verses.content: تَرْمِيهِم بِحِجَارَةٍ مِّن سِجِّيلٍ
verses.translation: Which hit them with stones of baked clay,

verses.content: فَجَعَلَهُمْ كَعَصْفٍ مَّأْكُولٍ
verses.translation: So He made them like the leftover devoured leaves of farms?

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ لِإِيلَافِ قُرَيْشٍ
verses.translation: Because of giving alliances to the Quraish.

verses.content: إِيلَافِهِمْ رِحْلَةَ الشِّتَاءِ وَالصَّيْفِ
verses.translation: (We) gave them alliances during both their travels of winter and summer.

verses.content: فَلْيَعْبُدُوا رَبَّ هَـٰذَا الْبَيْتِ
verses.translation: So they must worship the Lord of this House. (The Ka’aba)

verses.content: الَّذِي أَطْعَمَهُم مِّن جُوعٍ وَآمَنَهُم مِّنْ خَوْفٍ
verses.translation: The One Who gave them food in hunger, and bestowed them safety from a great fear.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ أَرَأَيْتَ الَّذِي يُكَذِّبُ بِالدِّينِ
verses.translation: Just look at him, who belies the religion!

verses.content: فَذَٰلِكَ الَّذِي يَدُعُّ الْيَتِيمَ
verses.translation: So it is he, who pushes away the orphan,

verses.content: وَلَا يَحُضُّ عَلَىٰ طَعَامِ الْمِسْكِينِ
verses.translation: And does not urge to feed the needy.

verses.content: فَوَيْلٌ لِّلْمُصَلِّينَ
verses.translation: So ruin is to those offerers of prayer –

verses.content: الَّذِينَ هُمْ عَن صَلَاتِهِمْ سَاهُونَ
verses.translation: Those who are neglectful of their prayer.

verses.content: الَّذِينَ هُمْ يُرَاءُونَ
verses.translation: Those who make a display (of their deeds).

verses.content: وَيَمْنَعُونَ الْمَاعُونَ
verses.translation: And do not let others ask for small utilities.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ إِنَّا أَعْطَيْنَاكَ الْكَوْثَرَ
verses.translation: We have indeed bestowed the Kausar* upon you (O dear prophet Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him). (*Infinite excellent qualities / the greatest number of followers / the sweet pond on the Day of Resurrection)

verses.content: فَصَلِّ لِرَبِّكَ وَانْحَرْ
verses.translation: So offer the prayers for your Lord, and perform the sacrifice.

verses.content: إِنَّ شَانِئَكَ هُوَ الْأَبْتَرُ
verses.translation: Indeed it is your enemy who is bereft of all goodness.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ قُلْ يَا أَيُّهَا الْكَافِرُونَ
verses.translation: Proclaim, (O dear prophet Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him), “O disbelievers!”

verses.content: لَا أَعْبُدُ مَا تَعْبُدُونَ
verses.translation: Neither do I worship what you worship.

verses.content: وَلَا أَنتُمْ عَابِدُونَ مَا أَعْبُدُ
verses.translation: Nor do you worship Whom I worship.

verses.content: وَلَا أَنَا عَابِدٌ مَّا عَبَدتُّمْ
verses.translation: And neither will I ever worship what you worship.

verses.content: وَلَا أَنتُمْ عَابِدُونَ مَا أَعْبُدُ
verses.translation: Nor will you worship Whom I worship.

verses.content: لَكُمْ دِينُكُمْ وَلِيَ دِينِ
verses.translation: For you is your religion, and for me is mine.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ إِذَا جَاءَ نَصْرُ اللَّهِ وَالْفَتْحُ
verses.translation: When the help and victory of Allah come,

verses.content: وَرَأَيْتَ النَّاسَ يَدْخُلُونَ فِي دِينِ اللَّهِ أَفْوَاجًا
verses.translation: And you see people entering the religion of Allah in multitudes,

verses.content: فَسَبِّحْ بِحَمْدِ رَبِّكَ وَاسْتَغْفِرْهُ ۚ إِنَّهُ كَانَ تَوَّابًا
verses.translation: Then proclaim the Purity of your Lord while praising Him, and seek forgiveness from Him; indeed He is the Most Acceptor of Repentance.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ تَبَّتْ يَدَا أَبِي لَهَبٍ وَتَبَّ
verses.translation: May both the hands of Abu Lahab be destroyed – and they are destroyed!

verses.content: مَا أَغْنَىٰ عَنْهُ مَالُهُ وَمَا كَسَبَ
verses.translation: His wealth did not benefit him in the least, nor did whatever he earned.

verses.content: سَيَصْلَىٰ نَارًا ذَاتَ لَهَبٍ
verses.translation: He will soon enter the flaming fire.

verses.content: وَامْرَأَتُهُ حَمَّالَةَ الْحَطَبِ
verses.translation: And so will his wife; carrying a bundle of firewood on her head.

verses.content: فِي جِيدِهَا حَبْلٌ مِّن مَّسَدٍ
verses.translation: A rope made from palm fibre around her neck!

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ قُلْ هُوَ اللَّهُ أَحَدٌ
verses.translation: Proclaim (O dear Prophet Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him), “He is Allah, He is One.”

verses.content: اللَّهُ الصَّمَدُ
verses.translation: “Allah is the Un-wanting.” (Perfect, does not require anything.)

verses.content: لَمْ يَلِدْ وَلَمْ يُولَدْ
verses.translation: “He has no offspring, nor is He born from anything.”

verses.content: وَلَمْ يَكُن لَّهُ كُفُوًا أَحَدٌ
verses.translation: “And there is none equal to Him.”

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ قُلْ أَعُوذُ بِرَبِّ الْفَلَقِ
verses.translation: Proclaim (O dear Prophet Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him), “I take refuge of the One Who creates the Daybreak.”

verses.content: مِن شَرِّ مَا خَلَقَ
verses.translation: “From the evil of His entire creation.”

verses.content: وَمِن شَرِّ غَاسِقٍ إِذَا وَقَبَ
verses.translation: “And from the evil of the matter that darkens when it sets.”

verses.content: وَمِن شَرِّ النَّفَّاثَاتِ فِي الْعُقَدِ
verses.translation: “And from the evil of the witches who blow into knots.”

verses.content: وَمِن شَرِّ حَاسِدٍ إِذَا حَسَدَ
verses.translation: “And from the evil of the envier when he is envious of me.”

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ قُلْ أَعُوذُ بِرَبِّ النَّاسِ
verses.translation: Proclaim (O dear Prophet Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him), “I take refuge of the One Who is the Lord of all mankind.”

verses.content: مَلِكِ النَّاسِ
verses.translation: “The King of all mankind.”

verses.content: إِلَـٰهِ النَّاسِ
verses.translation: “The God of all mankind.”

verses.content: مِن شَرِّ الْوَسْوَاسِ الْخَنَّاسِ
verses.translation: “From the evil of the one who instils evil thoughts in the hearts – and stays hidden.”

verses.content: الَّذِي يُوَسْوِسُ فِي صُدُورِ النَّاسِ
verses.translation: “Those who instil evil thoughts into the hearts of men.”

verses.content: مِنَ الْجِنَّةِ وَالنَّاسِ
verses.translation: “Among the jinns and men.”
